T02D2663b-1:261a-1: bee ro tsa n'a bhi sam bo dhi tantra sya sad britti n'a ma /
T02D2663b-1:261a-3: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi tshig 'grel zhes bya ba /
T02D2663b-1:261a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis thog ma thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas /
T02D2663b-1:261a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes des 'dul ba'i 'gro ba rnam pa gnyis su gzigs te /
T02D2663b-1:261a-6: dmigs pa dang bcas pa la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:261a-7: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:261a-8: 'dul ba'i 'gro ba de rnams la yang spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663b-1:261a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nas 'jug cing spyod pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:261a-10: sngags kyi sgo nas 'jug cing spyod pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:261a-11: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nas 'jug cing spyod pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663b-1:261a-12: dmigs pa dang bcas pa la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:261a-13: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:261a-14: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nas 'jug
T02D2663b-1:261a-15: cing spyod pa'i gdul ba'i 'gro ba dmigs pa dang
T02D2663b-1:261a-16: bcas pa la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams
T02D2663b-1:261a-20: de bzhin du gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo
T02D2663b-1:261a-21: sde khyim bdag dpa' bo la sogs pa bstan to
T02D2663b-1:261a-22: // de bzhin du zab cing rgya che la mos
T02D2663b-1:261a-23: pa'i 'dul ba'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du zab
T02D2663b-1:261a-24: cing rgya che ba'i mdo sde sdong po bkod pa
T02D2663b-1:261a-25: // dang / sa bcu dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la sogs pa rnams bstan to //
T02D2663b-1:261a-26: de bzhin du sngags kyi sgo nas 'jug cing spyod
T02D2663b-1:261a-27: pa'i gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams la yang rnam pa
T02D2663b-1:261a-28: gnyis te / dmigs pa ngang bcas pa la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:261a-29: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:261a-30: de la dmigs pa dang bcas pa la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams kyi don du /
T02D2663b-1:261a-31: 'phags pa legs par grub pa'i rgyud dang /
T02D2663b-1:261a-32: rig 'dzin gyi sde snod la sogs pa bya ba'i rgyud rnams bstan to //
T02D2663b-1:261a-33: de bzhin du zab cing rgya che bas 'dul ba'i
T02D2663b-1:261a-34: 'gro ba rnams kyi don du 'phags pa de kho
T02D2663b-1:261a-35: na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud la sogs pa bstan te
T02D2663b-1:261a-36: / dmigs pa dang bcas pa la gtso bor gyur
T02D2663b-1:261a-37: pa zhes pa yang zab cing rgya che ba la
T02D2663b-1:261a-38: ma mos shing mi spyod pa ma yin mod kyi
T02D2663b-1:261a-39: / / dmigs pa dang bcas pa la spyod par mos pa'i shas che ba la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:261b-0: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa @261b gtso
T02D2663b-1:261b-1: bor gyur pa rnams la yang dmigs pa dang bcas
T02D2663b-1:261b-2: pa'i spyod pa ma yin mod kyi /
T02D2663b-1:261b-3: zab cing rgya che ba la spyod pa'i shas che ba ste /
T02D2663b-1:261b-4: de lta bu yin par ni gsal por 'phags pa
T02D2663b-1:261b-5: de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa nang gi rnal
T02D2663b-1:261b-6: 'byor gtso bor gyur pa ma yin mod kyi /
T02D2663b-1:261b-7: phyi'i spyod pa rnams kyang med pa ma yin no //
T02D2663b-1:261b-8: de bzhin du bya ba'i rgyud rnams kyang phyi'i spyod pa gtso bor gyur pa yin mod kyi /
T02D2663b-1:261b-9: nang gi spyod pa yang med pa ma yin te /
T02D2663b-1:261b-10: rig 'dzin gyi sde snod la sogs par rnam par
T02D2663b-1:261b-11: thar pa'i sgo rnam pa gsum la gzhol ba la
T02D2663b-1:261b-13: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nas
T02D2663b-1:261b-14: 'jug cing spyod pa rnams la yang ji ltar rigs
T02D2663b-1:261b-15: par sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:261b-16: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs
T02D2663b-1:261b-17: par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis
T02D2663b-1:261b-18: rlob pa'i rgyud 'di yang thabs dang shes rab gtse
T02D2663b-1:261b-19: bor gyur pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud yin mod kyi
T02D2663b-1:261b-20: / bya ba la mos pa'i gdul bya'i 'gro ba
T02D2663b-1:261b-21: rnams gzung ba'i phyir bya ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su
T02D2663b-1:261b-22: mthun pa'i spyod pa dag kyang bstan pas bya ba'i
T02D2663b-1:261b-23: / rgyud dam / gnyis ka'i rgyud lta bur so sor brtags shing grags so //
T02D2663b-1:261b-24: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud 'di yang gdul
T02D2663b-1:261b-25: ba'i 'gro ba rab dang 'bring dang tha ma ste
T02D2663b-1:261b-26: rnam pa gsum gyi don du bstan te /
T02D2663b-1:261b-27: mgo smos pas go ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:261b-28: don rnam par phye bas go ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:261b-29: tshig lhur len pa'i gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams so //
T02D2663b-1:261b-30: de la mgo smos pas go ba ni shes rab
T02D2663b-1:261b-31: mchog tu rno zhing thos pa mang ba dang ldan
T02D2663b-1:261b-32: pas rgyud 'di'i mtshan don dang rjes su mthun pa
T02D2663b-1:261b-33: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D2663b-1:261b-34: pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa zhes
T02D2663b-1:261b-35: bya ba'i mtshan tsam thos pas rgyud 'di'i don thams
T02D2663b-1:261b-37: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i tshig gis bcom
T02D2663b-1:261b-38: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:261b-39: sku bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su
T02D2663b-1:261b-40: rdzogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin du shes
T02D2663b-1:261b-41: so // mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes
T02D2663b-1:261b-42: pa la mngon par byang chub pa ni rang gi
T02D2663b-1:261b-43: sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes
T02D2663b-1:261b-44: so // pa ste / de yang chos thams cad
T02D2663b-1:261b-45: stong pa nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid du
T02D2663b-1:262a-2: rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kyang
T02D2663b-1:262a-3: de ltar mngon bar rdzogs par byang chub pa nyid
T02D2663b-1:262a-4: kyi tshe na / sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs
T02D2663b-1:262a-5: kyis chos nyid kyis thob pa lhun gyis grub pa
T02D2663b-1:262a-6: nyid du sku mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis sus kyang
T02D2663b-1:262a-7: zil gyis mi non pa nyid du khams gsum thams
T02D2663b-1:262a-8: cad du khyab pa longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul
T02D2663b-1:262a-9: pa'i sku la sogs pas ji ltar snod du gyur
T02D2663b-1:262a-10: pa'i sems can gang gis 'dul ba'i skus don mdzad
T02D2663b-1:262a-11: kyi tshe na / pa ste / sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2663b-1:262a-12: skus 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2663b-1:262a-13: skur ston pa nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-1:262a-14: dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D2663b-1:262a-15: kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de rnams kyi
T02D2663b-1:262a-16: tshul bstan cing don mdzad pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:262a-17: de bzhin du gsung mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis kyang
T02D2663b-1:262a-18: khams gsum thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi gsung dam
T02D2663b-1:262a-19: pas khyab par chos ston pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:262a-20: de bzhin du thugs mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis kyang
T02D2663b-1:262a-21: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i yid las byung ba'i dbang
T02D2663b-1:262a-22: chen dang chu'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rnam par
T02D2663b-1:262a-24: de bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D2663b-1:262a-25: tshig gis kyang de ltar rnam par sprul pa sku
T02D2663b-1:262a-26: gsung thugs mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis khams gsum thams
T02D2663b-1:262a-27: cad du khyab par bstan pa de ni kun du
T02D2663b-1:262a-28: bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs
T02D2663b-1:262a-29: su dag pa rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur gyi
T02D2663b-1:262a-30: / gdul ba'i 'gro ba 'og ma rnams kyi spyod yul du ma gyur pas /
T02D2663b-1:262a-31: sku la sogs pa mi zad pa'i rgyan de nyid
T02D2663b-1:262a-32: gdul ba'i 'gro ba de rnams kyi don du rgyud
T02D2663b-1:262a-33: 'dir dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i sgo nas
T02D2663b-1:262a-34: lus ngag yid kyi mtshan mar gyur pa bstan pa
T02D2663b-1:262a-35: ste / byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa ni dkyil
T02D2663b-1:262a-36: 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i sgo nas lus ngag
T02D2663b-1:262a-37: yid gsum gyi cha lugs dang rang bzhin du lhag
T02D2663b-1:262a-38: par gzhag ces pa'i don to //
T02D2663b-1:262a-39: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par
T02D2663b-1:262a-40: byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob
T02D2663b-1:262a-41: pa zhes pa don dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan
T02D2663b-1:262a-42: tsam gyis mgo smos pas go ba'i gdul bya rnams
T02D2663b-1:262a-43: kyis don 'di lta bur go ste /
T02D2663b-1:262a-44: de dag gi don du rgyud 'di'i mtshan tsam smos par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:262a-45: de ltar shes pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
T02D2663b-1:262b-1: brjod bar bya ba bstan pa dang dgos pa yang bstan par shes par bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:262b-2: rgyud 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663b-1:262b-3: kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sku mi zad pa
T02D2663b-1:262b-4: la sogs pa'i rgyud dang 'brel par blta ste /
T02D2663b-1:262b-5: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di ni rgyud 'di'i rgyu
T02D2663b-1:262b-6: yin la rgyud 'di ni de'i 'bras bur shes par
T02D2663b-1:262b-8: de bzhin du rgyud 'dir dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang
T02D2663b-1:262b-9: phyag rgya'i sgo nas lus dang ngag dang yid ji
T02D2663b-1:262b-10: ltab bzhin du bstan pas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-1:262b-11: gyi tshul ji lta bu yin pa rgyud 'dis mtshon
T02D2663b-1:262b-13: de bas na rgyud 'di ni rjod par byed pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:262b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni brjod par bya ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:262b-15: de la dgos pa ni rgyud 'dir ji skad du
T02D2663b-1:262b-16: bshad pa'i rim gyis sgrub pa'i spyod pas rang gi
T02D2663b-1:262b-17: lhag pa'i lha mnyes par byas nas lha dang mi'i
T02D2663b-1:262b-18: longs spyod dang / ral gri dang rig 'dzin la
T02D2663b-1:262b-19: sogs pa mngon par mtho ba'i mtshan nyid thob pa
T02D2663b-1:262b-20: ni dngos dang brgyud nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2663b-1:262b-21: snang mdzad kyi mkhyen rab dam pas bla na med
T02D2663b-1:262b-22: pa'i thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa ni dgos pa
T02D2663b-1:262b-23: de'i yang dgos par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:262b-24: don rnam par phye bas go ba'i gdul ba rnams kyis ni /
T02D2663b-1:262b-25: don de dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan tsam smos pas rgyud kyi don shes par mi nus te /
T02D2663b-1:262b-26: de bas na de dag gi don du rgyud kyi
T02D2663b-1:262b-27: don rnams rnam par phye ste bshad pa ni rnam
T02D2663b-1:262b-28: par snang mdzad kyi rgyud dang /
T02D2663b-1:262b-29: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang de'i mngon par byang
T02D2663b-1:262b-30: chub pa'i rgyu dang rang bzhin dang 'bras bu la
T02D2663b-1:262b-32: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu bshad pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:262b-33: 'jig rten pa'i sems kyi rim pa brgyad la sogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:262b-34: mos pas spyod pa la sogs pa 'jig rten las
T02D2663b-1:262b-35: 'das pa'i sa'i rim pas kun du sangs rgyas pa'i
T02D2663b-1:262b-36: sa'i bar du ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu
T02D2663b-1:262b-37: bshad pa'o // rang bzhin bshad pa yang bcom ldan
T02D2663b-1:262b-38: 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku rnam pa bzhi'i
T02D2663b-1:262b-39: bshad pa'o // mtshan nyid ni / bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-1:262b-40: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin bshad pa ste
T02D2663b-1:262b-41: bshad pa'o // mtshan nyid ni / / gang gi
T02D2663b-1:262b-42: phyir rgyud 'dir sprul pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis su
T02D2663b-1:262b-43: brtags nas sku bzhir bshad pa yin no //
T02D2663b-1:262b-44: lus dang ngag dang yid mi zad pa'i rgyan rnam par sprul pas khams gsum thams cad khyab pa /
T02D2663b-1:263a-1: can ma yin pa'i lus la sogs par snod du
T02D2663b-1:263a-2: gyur pa ji ltar snang ba de ni de'i 'bras
T02D2663b-1:263a-3: bu bshad pa'o // mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu yang rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2663b-1:263a-4: rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po'o //
T02D2663b-1:263a-5: mthar thug pa ni thabs so zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:263a-6: rang bzhin yang de la byang chub gang zhe na /
T02D2663b-1:263a-7: gang rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba
T02D2663b-1:263a-8: bzhin du yongs su shes pa ste zhes pa la
T02D2663b-1:263a-9: sogs pa ji skad du gsungs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:263a-10: de bzhin du de'i rnam par sprul pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263a-11: byin gyis rlob pa dag kyang bshad par bya ste
T02D2663b-1:263a-12: zhib tu ni bsdus pa'i don nyid du bshad pas
T02D2663b-1:263a-14: tshig lhur len pa'i gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams kyis
T02D2663b-1:263a-15: de ltar rgyu dang rang bzhin dang 'bras bu la
T02D2663b-1:263a-16: sogs pa rnam par phye ste /
T02D2663b-1:263a-17: bshad kyang tshig dang don rnams zhib tu mi go ste /
T02D2663b-1:263a-18: de bas na de dag gi don du tshig re re nas spros shing rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2663b-1:263a-19: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob
T02D2663b-1:263a-20: pa zhes pa la sogs pa rgyud 'di'i thog ma
T02D2663b-1:263a-21: nas mjug gi bar du spros te bshad pa yin
T02D2663b-1:263a-22: no // de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-1:263a-23: pa byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje chen po rgya
T02D2663b-1:263a-24: che ba la sogs pa rgyud 'di thams cad kyis
T02D2663b-1:263a-25: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phun sum
T02D2663b-1:263a-26: tshogs pa rnam pa bcu gcig bstan pa 'di lta
T02D2663b-1:263a-27: no // ste / spong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263a-28: gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263a-30: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263a-31: mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263a-32: gzhan gyi don gyi thabs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263a-33: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263a-36: byang chub kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263a-37: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263a-38: byang chub kyi rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:263a-39: de la bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i tshig gis spong ba phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:263a-40: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i mtshan nyid do//
T02D2663b-1:263a-41: gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni yon tan rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:263a-42: de la 'dir gnas phun sum tshogs pa brgyad ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2663b-1:263a-43: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhag par gnas pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263a-44: sra zhing rgya che ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263b-0: byang chub chen po thugs su chud pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs @263b pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263b-1: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po
T02D2663b-1:263b-2: rnams mngon par 'du ba phun sum tshogs pa dang
T02D2663b-1:263b-3: / snga khang gi rtse mo rgya che ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263b-4: kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263b-5: dbyibs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263b-6: gdan phun sum tshogs pa rnams so //
T02D2663b-1:263b-7: de la de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa
T02D2663b-1:263b-8: zhes pa'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2663b-1:263b-9: lhag par gnas pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to
T02D2663b-1:263b-10: // rdo rje chen po brgya che ba //
T02D2663b-1:263b-11: zhes pa'i tshig gis sra zhing rgya che ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:263b-12: chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang zhes pas ni byang
T02D2663b-1:263b-13: chub chen po thugs su chud pa'i gnas phun sum
T02D2663b-1:263b-14: tshogs pa'o // rdo rje 'dzin thams cad 'du ba //
T02D2663b-1:263b-15: zhes pas ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663b-1:263b-16: dpa' rnams mngon par 'du ba phun sum tshogs pa'o
T02D2663b-1:263b-17: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pas rnam par rol
T02D2663b-1:263b-18: pa mtha' dang dbung med cing rtse mo mtho ba
T02D2663b-1:263b-19: zhes pas ni snga khang gi rtse mo rgya che
T02D2663b-1:263b-21: rin po che'i rgyal pos shin tu legs par brgyan
T02D2663b-1:263b-22: pa 'byung ba zhes pas ni kha dog phun sum
T02D2663b-1:263b-23: tshogs pa'o // khang bzangs chen po rin po che'i
T02D2663b-1:263b-24: rgyal po'i zhes pas ni dbyibs phun sum tshogs pa'o
T02D2663b-1:263b-25: tshogs pa'o // // byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi
T02D2663b-1:263b-26: seng ge'i khri la bzhugs zhes pas ni gdan phun
T02D2663b-1:263b-28: de dag ni phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa ste gnyis pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:263b-29: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni rdo rje 'dzin nam
T02D2663b-1:263b-30: mkha' dri ma med pa zhes pa nas kun du
T02D2663b-1:263b-31: bzang po dang / byams pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:263b-32: 'jam dpal dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
T02D2663b-1:263b-33: ba zhes pa la sogs pas rig par bya ste
T02D2663b-1:263b-34: de dag gis bskor zhing mdun du byas pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:263b-35: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ni lung dang rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:263b-36: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma dus gsum las 'das par byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2663b-1:263b-37: sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi
T02D2663b-1:263b-38: zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'i chos ston to zhes
T02D2663b-1:263b-40: mthu phun sum tshogs pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D2663b-1:263b-41: rten las 'das pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gtso bo rnams
T02D2663b-1:263b-42: kyis ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sbrul pa thob
T02D2663b-1:263b-44: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pa de dag dang /
T02D2663b-1:264a-0: gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sogs @264a * //
T02D2663b-1:264a-1: pa rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-1:264a-2: rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sku
T02D2663b-1:264a-3: mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam
T02D2663b-1:264a-4: par bsgyings pa la zhugs so //
T02D2663b-1:264a-5: de bzhin du gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid bkod
T02D2663b-1:264a-6: pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par bsgyings pa la
T02D2663b-1:264a-7: zhugs te zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2663b-1:264a-8: gzhan gyi don gyi thabs phun sum tshogs pa ni
T02D2663b-1:264a-9: skabs de thams cad du yang bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2663b-1:264a-10: par snang mdzad kyi sku'i phrin las thams cad dang
T02D2663b-1:264a-11: / gsung gi phrin las thams cad dang /
T02D2663b-1:264a-12: thugs kyi phrin las thams cad sems can gyi khams
T02D2663b-1:264a-13: thams cad la kun du gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi
T02D2663b-1:264a-14: tshig dag gis chos ston par mthong ba zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:264a-15: nas de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D2663b-1:264a-16: kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rab tu sim
T02D2663b-1:264a-17: par bgyid pa lags na zhes bya ba'i bar gyis
T02D2663b-1:264a-18: gsungs so // gzhan yang rgyud 'dir bshad pa thams
T02D2663b-1:264a-19: cad kyis ji ltar rigs par bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2663b-1:264a-20: par snang mdzad rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:264a-21: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:264a-22: de'i byang chub kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:264a-23: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:264a-24: byang chub kyi rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa'i rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:264a-25: sngar bshad zin pas 'dir ma bshad do //
T02D2663b-1:264a-26: de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2663b-1:264a-27: mdzad kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bcu gcig
T02D2663b-1:264a-28: gis ni rgyu 'di thams cad bsdus par blta'o //
T02D2663b-1:264a-29: mdo sde dang rgyud gzhan dag tu 'di skad bdag gis thos pa 'byung la /
T02D2663b-1:264a-30: rgyud 'dir ma smos pa ni ston pa dang dus
T02D2663b-1:264a-31: dang gnas des pa dang nyan pa dang sdud par
T02D2663b-1:264a-32: mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po
T02D2663b-1:264a-33: dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rtogs
T02D2663b-1:264a-34: pa gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir 'di skad bdag gis
T02D2663b-1:264a-36: rgyud 'di bshad pa yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2663b-1:264a-37: snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mngon par byang
T02D2663b-1:264a-38: chub pa'i sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub kyi
T02D2663b-1:264a-39: snying por rtag tu bzhugs pas bshad de /
T02D2663b-1:264a-40: dus dang gnas de nyid na nges par bzhugs pas dus gcig gi tshe zhes pa ma smos so //
T02D2663b-1:264a-41: nyan pa po yang kun du bzang po la sogs
T02D2663b-1:264a-42: pa de rnams thos pa snying por gyur pa ma
T02D2663b-1:264b-0: yin gyi / rtogs pa gtso @264b bor gyur pas 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes ma smos so //
T02D2663b-1:264b-1: mdo sde dang gzhung gzhan dag tu smos pa ni
T02D2663b-1:264b-2: bcom ldan 'das longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dus dang
T02D2663b-1:264b-3: gnas ma nges pa na yang bzhugs te /
T02D2663b-1:264b-4: bar bar ni 'og min gyi gnas na bzhugs shing chos 'chad /
T02D2663b-1:264b-5: res 'ga' ni ri rab kyi rtse mo na bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:264b-6: de bzhin du sprul pa yang res 'ga' ni rgyal
T02D2663b-1:264b-7: po'i khab na bzhugs res 'ga' ni mnyan du yod
T02D2663b-1:264b-8: pa la sogs pa'i gnas na bzhugs shing chos 'chad
T02D2663b-1:264b-9: pa de de ltar gnas dang dus ma nges pas
T02D2663b-1:264b-10: dus gcig gi tshe na zhes smos la /
T02D2663b-1:264b-11: nyan pa po yang 'phags pa nyan thos la sogs pa thos pa snying por gyur pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:264b-12: rtogs pa gtso bor gyur pa ma yin pas na
T02D2663b-1:264b-13: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes ma smos so
T02D2663b-1:264b-14: // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phun
T02D2663b-1:264b-15: sum tshogs pa rnam pa bcu gcig kyang rnam pa
T02D2663b-1:264b-16: // bzhir bsdus te / bzhi gang zhe na /
T02D2663b-1:264b-17: skyes bu dang gnas dang 'khor dang dgos pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:264b-18: de la bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni nyon mongs
T02D2663b-1:264b-19: pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags yan chad
T02D2663b-1:264b-20: dpyis phyin par shes rab kyis bshig ste med par
T02D2663b-1:264b-22: gnyis su na bdud rnams bcom pa la yang bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:264b-23: mdor na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa
T02D2663b-1:264b-24: spangs pa yang mngon par byang chub pa'i sku la
T02D2663b-1:264b-25: bya ste / des ni skyes bu'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:264b-26: skyes bu'i che ba bstan pa de yang chos nyan
T02D2663b-1:264b-27: pa'i sems can chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang
T02D2663b-1:264b-28: / dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnam pa gnyis
T02D2663b-1:264b-29: las chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni 'chad pa'i
T02D2663b-1:264b-30: skyes bu la mi rtog par chos bzang ngan rtog
T02D2663b-1:264b-32: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ni 'chad pa'i skyes
T02D2663b-1:264b-33: bu btsan pas de 'di la yid ches pa'i phyir
T02D2663b-1:264b-34: dgos pa'i dgos par gyur pa'i skyes bu btsan pa
T02D2663b-1:264b-35: de bstan to // gnas phun sum tshogs pa yang
T02D2663b-1:264b-36: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i 'gro ba gzung ba'i
T02D2663b-1:264b-37: de bstan to // phyir te / gnas de lta
T02D2663b-1:264b-38: bu na bzhugs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba'am
T02D2663b-1:264b-40: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang gcig pur mi bzhugs
T02D2663b-1:264b-41: kyi 'khor de lta bus bskor cing bzhugs so zhes
T02D2663b-1:264b-42: pas bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba'am btsun par bstan
T02D2663b-1:265a-0: pa yin no // de'i skyes bu btsan par @265a * //
T02D2663b-1:265a-2: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i 'gro ba dogs pa
T02D2663b-1:265a-3: med par skyes bu de lta bu la mnyam par
T02D2663b-1:265a-4: spro bas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems can
T02D2663b-1:265a-6: gnas bshad pa yang rnam pa gsum gyi phyir te skyes bu btsan pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:265a-7: gnas de lta bu'i yon tan sgrub pa pos rjes su dran par byas na 'grub pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2663b-1:265a-8: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas bcags pa'i gnas de mchod rten du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:265a-9: skyes bu btsan pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-1:265a-10: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2663b-1:265a-11: skyes bu btsan pa dang de lta bu'i byang chub
T02D2663b-1:265a-12: sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nam mkha' dri
T02D2663b-1:265a-13: ma med pa la sogs pa chos nyan pa dang
T02D2663b-1:265a-14: 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:265a-15: nyan pa'i mchog de dag bzhugs pas sdud par mdzad
T02D2663b-1:265a-16: pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang du gyur par bstan
T02D2663b-1:265a-17: pa'o // skyes bu ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-1:265a-18: dgos pa ni rgyud 'dir rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud dang /
T02D2663b-1:265a-19: rang bzhin dbang chen dang chu la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:265a-20: las bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin du bsgrubs nas mngon
T02D2663b-1:265a-21: par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i bde ba
T02D2663b-1:265a-22: thob par dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:265a-23: de ltar phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bcu gcig po bzhi po 'dir bsdus so //
T02D2663b-1:265a-24: de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byin
T02D2663b-1:265a-25: gyis rlob pa zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma
T02D2663b-1:265a-26: 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2663b-1:265a-27: thams cad byang chub kyi snying po na gnas pa
T02D2663b-1:265a-28: la bya ste / byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa'i tshig ni gnas pa'i don to //
T02D2663b-1:265a-29: skabs 'dir byang chub kyi snying po na 'das pa
T02D2663b-1:265a-30: dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-1:265a-31: thams cad gnas pas sangs rgyas mang po gnas par
T02D2663b-1:265a-32: 'gyur ba'i dogs pa bsal ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2663b-1:265a-33: bsdus pa'i don nyid du zhib tu bshad pas 'dir
T02D2663b-1:265a-34: ma smos so // rdo rje chen po ni rdo
T02D2663b-1:265a-35: rje de nyid phal pa ma yin gyi mchog gam
T02D2663b-1:265a-36: dam pa la chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:265a-37: rgya che ba ni rdo rje dang ldan pa'i khang
T02D2663b-1:265a-38: pa de ni yangs shing rgya che ba'am rdo rje
T02D2663b-1:265a-39: de dag nyid grangs mang ba la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:265a-40: chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang zhes bya ba ni
T02D2663b-1:265a-41: de la chos ni phung po dang khams dang skye
T02D2663b-1:265a-42: mched do // dbyings ni rang bzhin te phung po
T02D2663b-1:265a-43: la sogs pa'i chos kun rdzob pa'i mtshan nyid rigs
T02D2663b-1:265a-44: pas brtag mi bzod pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:265b-0: @265b stong pa nyid ni de dag gi rang bzhin te /
T02D2663b-1:265b-1: stong pa'i rang bzhin khong du chud pa ni pho brang ngam 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:265b-2: rdo rje 'dzin thams cad 'du ba zhes pa de
T02D2663b-1:265b-3: la rdo rje ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
T02D2663b-1:265b-4: lta ba 'joms pa'i shes rab ste /
T02D2663b-1:265b-5: shes rab de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:265b-6: 'du ba'i tshig ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i skabs su bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-1:265b-7: rdo rje 'dzin ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-1:265b-8: yang der mi 'du ba ni ma yin mod kyi
T02D2663b-1:265b-9: / 'dir sngags bshad pa'i skabs yin pas rdo rje 'dzin pa gtso bor smos so //
T02D2663b-1:265b-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa yang rnam pa gsum gyi phyir 'dzin te /
T02D2663b-1:265b-11: so so'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ston pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:265b-12: rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang mchod pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:265b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i byang chub
T02D2663b-1:265b-14: sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya autpala dang padmo la
T02D2663b-1:265b-15: sogs pa 'dzin pa yang so so'i rnam par thar
T02D2663b-1:265b-16: pa'i ston par rig par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:265b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pas rnam par rol pa
T02D2663b-1:265b-18: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
T02D2663b-1:265b-19: na de lta bu'i gnas la sogs par mos shing
T02D2663b-1:265b-20: smon pa las ji ltar smon pa bzhin du thob
T02D2663b-1:265b-21: nas spyod pa ni rol ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:265b-22: mtha' dang dbung med cing rtse mo mtho ba zhes
T02D2663b-1:265b-23: pa ni mtha' gnyis dmigs su med pas na dbus
T02D2663b-1:265b-25: rtse mo mtho ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i
T02D2663b-1:265b-26: gtsug tor dang 'dra ste rtse mo ltar mi snang
T02D2663b-1:265b-27: ba la bya'o // rin po che'i rgyal pos shin
T02D2663b-1:265b-28: tu legs par brgyan pa 'byung ba zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-1:265b-29: kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ste snga khang de
T02D2663b-1:265b-30: nyid rin po ches spras pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:265b-31: khang bzangs chen po rin po che'i rgyal po'i nang na zhes pa ni dbyibs bshad pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:265b-32: byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri la
T02D2663b-1:265b-33: bzhugs zhes pa ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis seng
T02D2663b-1:265b-34: ge'i lus su gyur cing seng ge'i khri byed pa'am
T02D2663b-1:265b-35: / byang chub sems dpa'i lus nyid kyis bcom ldan
T02D2663b-1:265b-36: 'das kyi gdan du byed de seng ge'i bya ba
T02D2663b-1:265b-38: bcom ldan 'das gnas de lta bu na bzhugs pa
T02D2663b-1:265b-39: yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin nam
T02D2663b-1:265b-40: mkha' 'dri ma med pa la sogs pa 'di rnams
T02D2663b-1:265b-41: dang bzhugs te / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang
T02D2663b-1:265b-42: don dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan can sha stag
T02D2663b-1:265b-43: gzhung las 'byung bas bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas pa
T02D2663b-1:266a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma dus gsum las 'das
T02D2663b-1:266a-4: par byin gyis brlabs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D2663b-1:266a-5: mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
T02D2663b-1:266a-6: sgo'i chos ston to zhes pa chos kyang rnam pa
T02D2663b-1:266a-7: gnyis te / rtogs pa'i chos dang lung gi chos so //
T02D2663b-1:266a-8: de la rtogs pa'i chos kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663b-1:266a-9: don dam pa dang kun rdzob pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:266a-10: don dam pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663b-1:266a-11: kun rdzob kyi chos ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
T02D2663b-1:266a-12: dang gsung dang thugs mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis khams
T02D2663b-1:266a-14: lung gi chos ni mdo sde dang tshigs su bcad
T02D2663b-1:266a-15: pa la sogs pa gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis
T02D2663b-1:266a-16: so // de rnams las gang bshad ce na /
T02D2663b-1:266a-17: skabs 'dir lung gi chos rgyud 'di nyid bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:266a-19: sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi
T02D2663b-1:266a-20: zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'i chos ston to zhes
T02D2663b-1:266a-21: gsungs te / de la sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D2663b-1:266a-22: mnyam pa nyid ces pa mnyam pa gsum gyis rig
T02D2663b-1:266a-23: gsungs te / par bya ste / bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-1:266a-24: kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor los sems
T02D2663b-1:266a-25: can gyi lus dang ngag dang yid ji snyed pa
T02D2663b-1:266a-26: de snyed du khyab pas mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D2663b-1:266a-27: gnyis su na bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung
T02D2663b-1:266a-28: dang thugs kyi 'khor los sems can gyi don du
T02D2663b-1:266a-29: sbyor ba na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'khor los gsung dang thugs kyi bya ba yang byed /
T02D2663b-1:266a-30: gsung gi 'khor los kyang sku dang thugs kyi bya ba yang byed /
T02D2663b-1:266a-31: thugs kyi 'khor los kyang sku dang gsung gi bya ba yang byed de /
T02D2663b-1:266a-32: de ltar mtshungs par byed pas na mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D2663b-1:266a-33: gsum du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sogs pa dang ;
T02D2663b-1:266a-34: sems can gyi lus dang ngag dang yid stong pa
T02D2663b-1:266a-35: nyid kyi rang bzhin du dbyer med cing ro gcig
T02D2663b-1:266a-36: pas na mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D2663b-1:266a-37: chos kyi sgo zhes pa ni de lta bu'i sku
T02D2663b-1:266a-38: dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi de
T02D2663b-1:266a-39: bshad pas rtogs pa'i chos la 'jug par gyur pa'i
T02D2663b-1:266a-40: sgo yin pas sgo zhes gsungs so //
T02D2663b-1:266a-41: de bzhin du lung gi chos gzhan rnams kyang rtogs
T02D2663b-1:266a-42: pa'i chos la 'jug pa'i sgo lta bur rig par
T02D2663b-1:266a-43: bya'o // de la chos 'chad pa yang sku bzhi gang gis 'chad ce na /
T02D2663b-1:266a-44: chos kyi sku dang byang chub kyi snying po na
T02D2663b-1:266a-45: bzhugs pa'i sku ni mi g-yo ba nyid tshig tu
T02D2663b-1:266a-46: brjod pa las 'das pas na tshig gis chos mi
T02D2663b-1:266b-0: 'chad de / de'i byin rlabs kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa @266b dang sprul pa'i skus 'chad do //
T02D2663b-1:266b-1: de la skabs 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2663b-1:266b-2: snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus sku dang gsung
T02D2663b-1:266b-3: dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi zhes bya ba'i
T02D2663b-1:266b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma dus gsum las 'das par byin gyis brlabs nas 'chad de /
T02D2663b-1:266b-7: chos kyi sku de nyi ma lta bur snang ba'i
T02D2663b-1:266b-8: rang bzhin yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi
T02D2663b-1:266b-10: chos kyi sku nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i dus las 'das te /
T02D2663b-1:266b-11: de bas na dus gsum las 'das pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-1:266b-12: dus gsum las 'das pa ni 'das pa'i dus dang /
T02D2663b-1:266b-13: da ltar gyi dus dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus las 'das pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:266b-14: de dag gis ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa bshad pa yin no //
T02D2663b-1:266b-15: mthu phun sum tshogs pa bshad pa ni gzhung las
T02D2663b-1:266b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po
T02D2663b-1:266b-17: la sogs pa de dag dang /
T02D2663b-1:266b-18: gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sogs pa rdo rje
T02D2663b-1:266b-19: 'dzin de dag ces pa nas gsang sngags kyi tshul
T02D2663b-1:266b-20: gyi tshig rnam par dag pa'i tshig dag gis chos
T02D2663b-1:266b-21: ston pa dag kyang mthong ngo zhes pa'i bar du
T02D2663b-1:266b-22: 'byung ba ste / de la bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2663b-1:266b-23: par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sku mnyam
T02D2663b-1:266b-24: pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par
T02D2663b-1:266b-25: bsgyings pa la zhugs so zhes pa de la kun
T02D2663b-1:266b-26: du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-1:266b-27: rnams sa bcu la sogs pa rab tu thob pa
T02D2663b-1:266b-28: na rang gi ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar
T02D2663b-1:266b-29: pa'i sgo nas mthu dang rdzu 'phrul 'byin pa dang
T02D2663b-1:266b-30: 'byung ba ste / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam
T02D2663b-1:266b-31: par brgyan pa la sogs pa byas pas mgu zhing
T02D2663b-1:266b-32: de las gzhan pa'i bya ba med do snyam pa'i
T02D2663b-1:266b-34: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dpal be'u'i
T02D2663b-1:266b-35: 'od mchog bkye bas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams
T02D2663b-1:266b-37: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis kun du bzang po la
T02D2663b-1:266b-38: sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de rnams bcom ldan
T02D2663b-1:266b-39: 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid
T02D2663b-1:266b-40: bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par bsgyings pa
T02D2663b-1:266b-41: la zhugs so // de bzhin du gsung dang thugs
T02D2663b-1:266b-42: mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam
T02D2663b-1:266b-43: par bsgyings pa la yang zhugs te /
T02D2663b-1:266b-44: de la mnyam pa nyid ni gong du bshad pa rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D2663b-1:266b-45: bkod pa ni skabs 'dir rnam pa sna tshogs su blta'o //
T02D2663b-1:266b-46: mi zad pa ni chos kyi sku'i byin gyi rlabs
T02D2663b-1:266b-47: kyis sku la sogs pa de dag nam 'khor ba
T02D2663b-1:267a-0: yod @267a * // kyi bar du gnas pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:267a-1: mdzod ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku de nyid la bya ste /

T02D2663b-1:267a-3: mthun pa'i sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo zad mi
T02D2663b-1:267a-5: sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo de dag nyid sus
T02D2663b-1:267a-6: kyang zil gyis mi non par rang gi bya ba
T02D2663b-1:267a-7: la 'jug pas ni rnam par bsgyings pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:267a-8: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2663b-1:267a-9: sku'am gsung ngam thugs la ni 'jug pa'am ldog pa
T02D2663b-1:267a-10: yang mi dmigs so zhes pa la 'ga' zhig rtog
T02D2663b-1:267a-11: pa skye ste / gdul bya'i 'gro ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2663b-1:267a-12: shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:267a-13: rnam par rtog pa dar la tsam gyis bsgribs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:267a-14: lhag ma lus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
T02D2663b-1:267a-15: / mos pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa'i sa mngon du byas pa rnams dang /
T02D2663b-1:267a-16: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs la /
T02D2663b-1:267a-17: shes bya'i sgrib pa ma spangs pa phyogs gcig pa rnams dang ;
T02D2663b-1:267a-18: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa ma spangs pa'i 'gro ba sna tshogs pa rnams so //
T02D2663b-1:267a-19: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la 'jug pa dang ldog pa mi dmigs te /
T02D2663b-1:267a-20: rnam par mi rtog na yongs su dag pa'i byang
T02D2663b-1:267a-21: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul du 'gyur gyi
T02D2663b-1:267a-22: / 'og ma rnams kyi spyod yul du 'gyur ram mi 'gyur snyam du dogs pa skyen /
T02D2663b-1:267a-23: de'i lan ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub
T02D2663b-1:267a-24: pa nyid kyi tshe na rnam par mi rtog par
T02D2663b-1:267a-25: sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs dang /
T02D2663b-1:267a-26: chos nyid kyi lhun gyis grub pa nyid du longs
T02D2663b-1:267a-27: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i skus ji ltar
T02D2663b-1:267a-28: snod du gyur pa'i sems can gyi don thams cad
T02D2663b-1:267a-29: du mdzad de / de bas na gzhung las thams
T02D2663b-1:267a-30: cad du yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663b-1:267a-31: kyi sku'i phrin las thams cad dang /
T02D2663b-1:267a-32: gsung gi phrin las thams cad dang /
T02D2663b-1:267a-33: thugs kyi phrin las thams cad sems can gyi khams
T02D2663b-1:267a-34: thams cad la kun du gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi
T02D2663b-1:267a-35: tshig 'di dag gis chos ston par mthong zhes gsungs
T02D2663b-1:267a-36: pa yin te / de la mthong ba ni byang
T02D2663b-1:267a-37: chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:267a-38: spyod yul du gyur pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:267a-39: de yang rnam pa thams cad du mthong ba ni ma yin mod kyi /
T02D2663b-1:267a-40: rang gi mthu dang spyod yul shas che chung gis
T02D2663b-1:267a-41: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo
T02D2663b-1:267b-0: mthong ba'am rtogs pa @267b la bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:267b-1: rnam pa thams cad du rtogs shing mthong na de
T02D2663b-1:267b-2: bzhin gshegs pa dang bye brag med par gyur pa'i
T02D2663b-1:267b-3: phyir ro // des na 'phags pa kun du bzang
T02D2663b-1:267b-4: po la sogs pa de rnams nyid bshad pa'i chos
T02D2663b-1:267b-5: su 'jug pa'i zhar la sngags rgyud dang rtog pa
T02D2663b-1:267b-6: la sogs pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid rnams la zhugs
T02D2663b-1:267b-7: nas bshad pa'i chos kyi rim par bsdu bar mdzad
T02D2663b-1:267b-8: pas ji ltar rjes su rtogs pa de bstan par
T02D2663b-1:267b-10: thams cad du yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i phrin las thams cad dang /
T02D2663b-1:267b-11: gsung gi phrin las thams cad dang thugs kyi phrin
T02D2663b-1:267b-12: las thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad la
T02D2663b-1:267b-13: kun du gsang sngags bshad par bya ba ste /
T02D2663b-1:267b-14: thams cad du zhes pa la dus zhes khong nas dbyung ngo //
T02D2663b-1:267b-15: des na tshig gi don ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2663b-1:267b-16: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'i dus dbang byang chub thob pa'i dus su shes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:267b-17: de ci 'dra ba zhig gis she na /
T02D2663b-1:267b-18: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i phrin las thams cad dang /
T02D2663b-1:267b-19: gsung gi phrin las thams cad dang /
T02D2663b-1:267b-20: thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ces gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2663b-1:267b-21: de la 'dir sku'i phrin las la sogs pa'i tshig
T02D2663b-1:267b-22: gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sa dang pha rol tu
T02D2663b-1:267b-23: phyin pa rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:267b-24: de bzhin du byang chub thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa
T02D2663b-1:267b-25: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bya ba ste nan
T02D2663b-1:267b-26: tan no // des bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes
T02D2663b-1:267b-27: la mthu'i khyad par bsags pa gang yin pa de
T02D2663b-1:267b-28: la phrin las zhes brjod do //
T02D2663b-1:267b-29: de lta bu'i mthu'i mtshan nyid las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs su gyur pa'i spyod pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:267b-30: sems can gyi khams thams cad la kun du gsang
T02D2663b-1:267b-31: sngags kyi tshul gyi tshig dag gis chos ston par
T02D2663b-1:267b-32: mthong zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-1:267b-33: de la sems can gyi khams thams cad la zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:267b-34: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams na 'gro ba rigs
T02D2663b-1:267b-35: drug tu gtogs pa'i sems can las dang nyon mongs
T02D2663b-1:267b-36: pa'i dbang gis tshe thob pa rnams la zhes dgongs
T02D2663b-1:267b-37: so // kun du zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:267b-38: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi tshig dag gis chos ston
T02D2663b-1:267b-39: pa zhes pa de la shes pa dang skyob par
T02D2663b-1:267b-40: ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-1:267b-41: rnams ni sngags su gsungs la /
T02D2663b-1:267b-42: de dag gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa'i tshig rnams dang /
T02D2663b-1:268a-1: gyis brlab pa'i yi ge dang tshig rnams kyang sngags kyi tshig tu gsungs so //
T02D2663b-1:268a-2: sngags de rnams kyi rgyu dang rang bzhin dang 'bras bu thob pa'i thabs lam ni tshul te /
T02D2663b-1:268a-3: de go zhing rtogs par byed pa'i chos kyi tshig go //
T02D2663b-1:268a-4: de nyid la sngags kyi tshig ces kyang gsungs so //
T02D2663b-1:268a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi phrin las sngags la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:268a-6: lhar snang bar gyur pa de rnams kyis gsang sngags
T02D2663b-1:268a-7: kyi tshul gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i chos ston par
T02D2663b-1:268a-8: kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663b-1:268a-9: dpa' de rnams kyis mthong ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:268a-10: 'dis ni don rnam pa gsum gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2663b-1:268a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sogs pa'i phrin las
T02D2663b-1:268a-12: rnams kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs su
T02D2663b-1:268a-13: gyur pa dang / de yang ji ltar snod du
T02D2663b-1:268a-14: gyur pa'i gdul bya'i 'gro ba 'dul nus pas rjes
T02D2663b-1:268a-16: de ston pa'i chos sngags kyi tshig tu'o //
T02D2663b-1:268a-17: don 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud 'dir gzhung 'di gsal bar bstan te /
T02D2663b-1:268a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi rang gi sku la sogs pa
T02D2663b-1:268a-20: las kyi lha'i gzugs su gyur pa'i phyir de bzhin
T02D2663b-1:268a-21: gshegs pa'i thogs pa med pa'i stobs bcu'i mos pa
T02D2663b-1:268a-22: las du ma'i kha dog dang dbyibs su bkod pa'i
T02D2663b-1:268a-23: bdag gi ngo bo bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
T02D2663b-1:268a-24: brgya stong dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:268a-28: bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2663b-1:268a-29: pa'i bsod nams las grub pa'i lus 'byung ngo zhes
T02D2663b-1:268a-31: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:268a-32: las rnams lha la sogs pa'i gzugs su gyur pa
T02D2663b-1:268a-33: de ni ci yang rung ba ma yin gyi /
T02D2663b-1:268a-34: sems can 'dul nus par snang ba'i rang bzhin kho na ste /
T02D2663b-1:268a-36: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe /
T02D2663b-1:268a-37: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa nges par 'byung
T02D2663b-1:268a-38: bar byed pa'i sgo spu'i bu ga thams cad nas
T02D2663b-1:268a-39: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin las dang tshe dang
T02D2663b-1:268a-40: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu za ba dang zar
T02D2663b-1:268a-46: spyod pa dang nges pa'i tshig brjod pa sems can
T02D2663b-1:268a-47: thams cad so so so sor yang dag par mgu
T02D2663b-1:268a-48: bar byed pa chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par bskyed
T02D2663b-1:268a-49: pa'i sku rnams byung bar gyur to //
T02D2663b-1:268a-50: byung nas kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten
T02D2663b-1:268b-0: gyi @268b khams rab 'byam rnams su sgra dbyangs gcig
T02D2663b-1:268b-1: gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par rnam par rig par
T02D2663b-1:268b-2: byed pa / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D2663b-1:268b-3: ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di sgrogs par gyur to
T02D2663b-1:268b-4: zhes pa la sogs pa dang /

T02D2663b-1:268b-6: der byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir gsungs pa /

T02D2663b-1:268b-8: kyi tshul yig 'bru dag tu byin gyis brlab ce
T02D2663b-1:268b-9: na / gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la de
T02D2663b-1:268b-10: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag
T02D2663b-1:268b-11: khrig brgya stong du mar yang dag par bsgrub pa'i
T02D2663b-1:268b-12: bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:268b-14: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
T02D2663b-1:268b-15: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
T02D2663b-1:268b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
T02D2663b-1:268b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T02D2663b-1:268b-18: byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun dang /
T02D2663b-1:268b-19: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /
T02D2663b-1:268b-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad gang ngag yin pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:268b-21: gsang ba pa'i bdag po mdor na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-1:268b-22: pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang
T02D2663b-1:268b-23: yin pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2663b-1:268b-24: nyid bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs dang /
T02D2663b-1:268b-25: sngon gyi smon lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2663b-1:268b-26: chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs nas sems can
T02D2663b-1:268b-27: rnams la skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du gsang
T02D2663b-1:268b-28: sngags kyi cho ga yang dag par rab tu ston
T02D2663b-1:268b-29: to zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:268b-30: de la chos kyi sku rtog pa thams cad rab
T02D2663b-1:268b-31: tu med par gnas pa las ji ltar na de
T02D2663b-1:268b-32: bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu'i sngags kyi lha tshogs
T02D2663b-1:268b-33: 'byung bar 'gyur zhes 'ga' zhig smra na de'i phyir
T02D2663b-1:268b-35: lus kyi bye brag ji snyed pa //
T02D2663b-1:268b-36: brjod pa las ni mang du 'gyur //
T02D2663b-1:268b-37: de bzhin sngags kyi mgon po ye //

T02D2663b-1:268b-39: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu ni //

T02D2663b-1:269a-2: tshor ba po yang ma yin /
T02D2663b-1:269a-4: 'dzin pa yang ma yin zhing rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral mod kyi /

T02D2663b-1:269a-7: cad byed de / 'di la ni dogs pa med do //

T02D2663b-1:269a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa gnas med 'di //
T02D2663b-1:269a-10: 'gro ba rnams kyi phyi dang nang //
T02D2663b-1:269a-11: thams cad nges pa nyid du sgrub //
T02D2663b-1:269a-13: gsung 'di la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa 'di lta bu yin par khong du chud de /
T02D2663b-1:269a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku la rnam par
T02D2663b-1:269a-15: gnas pa la rnam par rtog pa med kyang sngon
T02D2663b-1:269a-16: gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis lha'i lus la sogs
T02D2663b-1:269a-17: pa thams cad du rab tu snang na /
T02D2663b-1:269a-18: de la rnam par rtog pa'i go skabs ga la yod ces so //
T02D2663b-1:269a-19: sems can las kyi tshe rnam par bskyed pa rnams zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-1:269a-20: rnam par dag pa'i tshig dag gis chos ston pa
T02D2663b-1:269a-21: dag kyang mthong ngo zhes pa'i bar bshad par bya
T02D2663b-1:269a-22: ste ; de la rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:269a-24: phyag na padmo'i lus dang 'dra ba zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-1:269a-25: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs

T02D2663b-1:272a-2: byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyi sems so //

T02D2663b-1:272a-4: 'jug pa'i sems dag kyang yin mod kyi skabs 'dir
T02D2663b-1:272a-5: dang po'i byang chub kyi sems la bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:272a-6: sa dang po'i sems de mngon par byang chub pa'i snying por sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:272a-7: byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyi sems kyang 'di lta ste /
T02D2663b-1:272a-8: sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems de ni chos
T02D2663b-1:272a-9: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2663b-1:272a-10: yin pas mngon par byang chub pa'i sems dang rang
T02D2663b-1:272a-12: de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni thams cad
T02D2663b-1:272a-13: mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu'i gtso bor rig par
T02D2663b-1:272a-14: bya'o // snying rje ni rtsa ba ste /
T02D2663b-1:272a-15: sems can sdug bsngal bas gdungs pa las bral ba'i
T02D2663b-1:272a-16: phyir snying rje'i sgo nas smon lam la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:272a-17: byang chub kyi sems skye ste /
T02D2663b-1:272a-18: de bas na snying rje de byang chub kyi sems
T02D2663b-1:272a-19: kyi rtsa bar gyur pas na rgyu'i yang rgyur blta'o
T02D2663b-1:272a-20: // gnyis su na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D2663b-1:272a-21: bstan par gnas par byed pa'i phyir rtsa ba zhes
T02D2663b-1:272a-22: // bya ste / thugs rje'i gzungs kyis lhag ma
T02D2663b-1:272a-23: lus pa'i mya ngan las mi 'da' bar dus thams
T02D2663b-1:272a-24: cad du mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par
T02D2663b-1:272a-25: gnas shing kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ye shes
T02D2663b-1:272a-26: brten pa ste sdong po'i rtsa ba ltar brten par
T02D2663b-1:272a-27: byed pas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2663b-1:272a-28: // bya ste / rtsa ba'o // mthar thug pa ni thabs so zhes pa la /
T02D2663b-1:272a-29: thabs ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:272a-30: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdzogs par sbyor ba'i
T02D2663b-1:272a-31: mthar thug par de dag gis ston pas na mthar
T02D2663b-1:272a-32: thug par blta'o // de la thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems so zhes bya na /
T02D2663b-1:272a-33: byang chub nyid gang yin mi shes pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2663b-1:272a-34: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub gang
T02D2663b-1:272a-35: zhe na zhes bya ba nas 'di lta ste nam
T02D2663b-1:272a-36: mkha'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs
T02D2663b-1:272a-37: pa yin no // gong du byang chub kyi sems
T02D2663b-1:272a-38: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur bshad pa
T02D2663b-1:272a-39: de'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin bshad pa la bya'o
T02D2663b-1:272a-40: pa yin no // // gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub gang zhe na /
T02D2663b-1:272a-41: gang gi rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta
T02D2663b-1:272a-42: ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ste zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:272a-43: la gang zhe na zhes pa ni nyan thos dang
T02D2663b-1:272a-44: rang sangs rgyas dang theg pa chen po'i byang chub
T02D2663b-1:272a-45: rnams las gang yin zhes pa la mi bya'i byang
T02D2663b-1:272a-46: chub de ci 'dra ba yin zhes pa la bya'o
T02D2663b-1:272b-0: // rang gi sems yang dag pa ji @272b lta
T02D2663b-1:272b-1: ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ni sbyor ba'i
T02D2663b-1:272b-2: sems kyis bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam par mthong
T02D2663b-1:272b-3: ba de sems kyi skad cig ma phyi mas bum
T02D2663b-1:272b-4: pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa de yang dag pa
T02D2663b-1:272b-5: ma yin par sun phyung nas de ltar gzung ba'i
T02D2663b-1:272b-6: cha sun phyung ste med na 'dzin pa'i cha yang
T02D2663b-1:272b-8: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin dang
T02D2663b-1:272b-9: bral ba yongs su dag pa rnam pa med pa
T02D2663b-1:272b-10: rang bzhin gyis dag par shes pa ni rang gi
T02D2663b-1:272b-11: sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs
T02D2663b-1:272b-12: su shes pa'o // de bzhin du gzhung gzhan las kyang /
T02D2663b-1:272b-13: ye shes bzhi las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni byang chub tu bshad /
T02D2663b-1:272b-14: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang so sor rtog pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:272b-15: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ni thams cad
T02D2663b-1:272b-16: mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bshad par rig par bya'o
T02D2663b-1:272b-17: // de la yang bla na med pa yang dag
T02D2663b-1:272b-18: rdzogs pa'i byang chub po zhes pa la bla na
T02D2663b-1:272b-19: med pa ni byang chub de'i gong na de las
T02D2663b-1:272b-20: lhag pa'i byang chub gzhan med pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:272b-21: yang dag par byang chub pa ni phyin ci ma log par byang chub pa la bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:272b-22: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag ni nyon mongs
T02D2663b-1:272b-23: pa'i sgrib pa spangs kyang shes bya'i sgrib pa ma
T02D2663b-1:272b-24: spangs pas phyogs gcig phyin ci log pa ni ma
T02D2663b-1:272b-25: yin gyi / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib
T02D2663b-1:272b-26: pa gnyis ka spangs pas yang dag par byang chub
T02D2663b-1:272b-27: yin gyi / pa'o // rdzogs par byang chub pa
T02D2663b-1:272b-28: ni kun tu byang chub pa zhes bya ste shes
T02D2663b-1:272b-29: bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i bag chags kyi
T02D2663b-1:272b-30: mthar thug pa ma lus par spangs pas na kun
T02D2663b-1:272b-31: du byang chub pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:272b-32: gnyis su na rang gi sems yang dag pa ji
T02D2663b-1:272b-33: lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ni kun
T02D2663b-1:272b-34: rdzob dang don dam pa'i chos rnams rnam pa thams
T02D2663b-1:272b-35: cad du stong par shes pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:272b-36: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la chos ni rdul
T02D2663b-1:272b-37: tsam yang med cing mi dmigs so zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-1:272b-38: / byang chub de la phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang /
T02D2663b-1:272b-39: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin bag
T02D2663b-1:272b-40: chags tsam yang med pas byang chub de nyid 'dzin
T02D2663b-1:272b-41: pa'i rang bzhin du med cing dmigs su med do
T02D2663b-1:272b-42: zhes pa ni dmigs pa'i yul ma yin pas gzung
T02D2663b-1:272b-43: ba'i rang bzhin yang med do //
T02D2663b-1:272b-45: byang chub de ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2663b-1:272b-46: zhes pa ni de la nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni
T02D2663b-1:272b-47: rtag pa dang mi 'gyur ba dang stong pa la
T02D2663b-1:272b-48: sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang yin mod kyi /
T02D2663b-1:272b-49: skabs 'dir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rang bzhin med pa la bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:273a-1: na de bstan pa'i phyir de la byang chub par byed pa yang med la /
T02D2663b-1:273a-2: byang chub par bya ba 'ga' yang med do zhes gsungs te /
T02D2663b-1:273a-3: byang chub par byed pa ni 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:273a-4: byang chub bar bya ba ni gzung ba ste /
T02D2663b-1:273a-5: byang chub de la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:273a-7: byang chub la mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir te zhes
T02D2663b-1:273a-8: pa ni byang chub de sngon po dang ser po
T02D2663b-1:273a-9: la sogs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:273a-10: rnam pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:273a-11: chos thams cad kyang mtshan nyid med ces pa la
T02D2663b-1:273a-12: sogs pa la sems yang dag pa ji lta ba
T02D2663b-1:273a-13: bzhin du yongs su shes pa de byang chub po
T02D2663b-1:273a-14: zhes bshad na / sems las gzhan pa'i chos de
T02D2663b-1:273a-15: dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes
T02D2663b-1:273a-16: pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D2663b-1:273a-17: ji ltar sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2663b-1:273a-18: du yongs su shes shing mtshan nyid med pa la
T02D2663b-1:273a-19: sogs par bshad pa bzhin du chos thams cad kyang
T02D2663b-1:273a-20: mtshan nyid med de nam mkha' bzhin zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:273a-21: yang na chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nam
T02D2663b-1:273a-22: mkha'i mtshan nyid de nyid byang chub mtshan nyid med
T02D2663b-1:273a-24: de la chos ni sems las gzhan pa'i phung po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:273a-25: 'di lta ste nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:273a-26: ni nam mkha' la mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro
T02D2663b-1:273a-27: // de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D2663b-1:273a-28: bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gang nas yongs su btsal bar bgyi /
T02D2663b-1:273a-29: gang gis ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bgyi lags zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-1:273a-30: gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni byang chub sems
T02D2663b-1:273a-31: dpa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i sgo
T02D2663b-1:273a-32: zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo chos snang ba'i
T02D2663b-1:273a-33: tshul dang po ste zhes pa'i bar du thams cad
T02D2663b-1:273a-35: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa'i thabs dris pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:273a-36: de gnyis rang gi sems las btsal ba'i thabs bstan pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:273a-37: de la thams cad mkhyen pa gang nas btsal ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:273a-38: gang gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
T02D2663b-1:273a-39: zhes pa ni de la ji ltar 'jug ces dris
T02D2663b-1:273a-40: pa'o // byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T02D2663b-1:273a-41: ni rang gi sems las yongs su btsal bar bya'o
T02D2663b-1:273b-0: zhes pa ni nam rang gi sems @273b nyid gzung
T02D2663b-1:273b-1: ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog
T02D2663b-1:273b-2: pa 'phro ba'i bag chags spangs te rnam par dag
T02D2663b-1:273b-3: pa'o // pa na / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
T02D2663b-1:273b-4: ba so so rang gis rig pa mi g-yo ba
T02D2663b-1:273b-5: ye shes kyi snang ba'i mtshan nyid byang chub dang
T02D2663b-1:273b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhes pa'i
T02D2663b-1:273b-7: pa'o // pa na / don to // sems la
T02D2663b-1:273b-8: ji ltar brtags pas don de shes par 'gyur zhe
T02D2663b-1:273b-9: pa'o // pa na / don to // na /
T02D2663b-1:273b-10: de la rtog pa'i gang zag kyang rnam pa gnyis
T02D2663b-1:273b-11: pa'o // pa na / don to // na /
T02D2663b-1:273b-12: te / dbang po las 'das pa'i ye shes dang
T02D2663b-1:273b-13: ldan pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D2663b-1:273b-14: pa'o // pa na / don to // na /
T02D2663b-1:273b-15: te / / 'og ma'i lta ba can 'gro ba
T02D2663b-1:273b-17: de la 'gro ba tha dad pas brtags pa ni
T02D2663b-1:273b-18: de'i nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med
T02D2663b-1:273b-19: gnyis ka'i bar na yang mi dmigs so zhes gsungs
T02D2663b-1:273b-22: bar ni de gnyis ka'i bar de na yang sems mi dmigs so zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:273b-23: dbang po las 'das pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang sems kha dog dang /
T02D2663b-1:273b-27: gnas pa ste rnam pa lnga'i dngos por mi dmigs
T02D2663b-1:273b-28: te de bas na sngon por ma yin zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:273b-29: nas lus la ma yin yid la mi gnas so
T02D2663b-1:273b-30: zhes pa'i bar du gsungs te /
T02D2663b-1:273b-31: ma gzigs zhes pa ni 'das pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:273b-32: mi dmigs zhes pa ni da ltar gyi dus na yang ma gzigs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:273b-33: gzigs par mi 'gyur zhes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gzigs par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:273b-34: sngon por ma yin zhes pa nas shel gyi kha
T02D2663b-1:273b-35: dog tu ma yin zhes pa'i bar du ni sems
T02D2663b-1:273b-36: de kha dog gi rnam par mthong ba'i yul ma
T02D2663b-1:273b-38: thung ngur ma yin zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-1:273b-39: skyes par ma yin ma ning du ma yin no
T02D2663b-1:273b-40: zhes pa'i bar du dbyibs kyi rnam par mthong ba
T02D2663b-1:273b-42: 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin /
T02D2663b-1:273b-43: gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin /
T02D2663b-1:273b-44: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin zhes
T02D2663b-1:273b-45: pa ni khams kyi rnam par mthong ba med pa
T02D2663b-1:273b-46: la bya'o // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-1:273b-47: sems can ris mthun pa'i rang bzhin yang ma yin
T02D2663b-1:273b-48: no zhes pa'i bar du rgyud kyi mthong ba med
T02D2663b-1:273b-49: pa la bya'o // sems de ni mig la mi
T02D2663b-1:273b-50: gnas zhes pa nas yid la mi gnas so zhes
T02D2663b-1:273b-51: pa'i bar du dbang po drug la sems gnas par
T02D2663b-1:273b-52: mthong ba med pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:273b-53: kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa de rnams kyi
T02D2663b-1:273b-54: rnam par snang ba na sems de gzung ba dang
T02D2663b-1:274a-1: rang bzhin dang ma bral bas dri ma dang bcas pa yin te /
T02D2663b-1:274a-2: de ltar dri ma dang bcas pas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma yin no //
T02D2663b-1:274a-3: de bas na dri ma de dag thams cad yongs
T02D2663b-1:274a-4: su dag pa'i sems de ni thams cad mkhyen pa
T02D2663b-1:274a-5: ste de'i phyir / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2663b-1:274a-6: sems de ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de zhes gsungs te /
T02D2663b-1:274a-7: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni rtog pa dang rnam par
T02D2663b-1:274a-8: rtog pa spangs pa ste nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de
T02D2663b-1:274a-10: de'i phyir rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2663b-1:274a-11: rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa spangs pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2663b-1:274a-12: de ltar na sems ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D2663b-1:274a-13: 'dra ba'i phyir byang chub kyang de nyid yin te
T02D2663b-1:274a-14: / nam mkha'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni sems kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2663b-1:274a-15: sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni byang
T02D2663b-1:274a-16: chub kyi rang bzhin te zhes gsungs pa yin no
T02D2663b-1:274a-17: // de ltar sems dang byang chub rnams gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gnyis su med de /
T02D2663b-1:274a-18: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na sems dang
T02D2663b-1:274a-19: nam mkha'i dbyings dang byang chub 'di ni gnyis su
T02D2663b-1:274a-20: med de gnyis su byar med do zhes gsungs pa
T02D2663b-1:274a-21: yin no // de yang snying rje'i rtsa ba can
T02D2663b-1:274a-22: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung
T02D2663b-1:274a-23: ba ste zhes pa ni de lta bu'i sems kyi
T02D2663b-1:274a-24: rang bzhin gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i bag chags kyang
T02D2663b-1:274a-25: yin no // med pa / byang chub dang thams
T02D2663b-1:274a-26: cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid de'i rtsa ba ni snying
T02D2663b-1:274a-27: rje ste brtan par byed pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:274a-28: de la sbyor bar byed pa'i thabs ni pha rol
T02D2663b-1:274a-29: tu phyin pa ste yongs su gzung ba ni thams
T02D2663b-1:274a-30: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de skyong ba'i rgyur shes
T02D2663b-1:274a-31: par bya'o // gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bas
T02D2663b-1:274a-32: na rnam grangs 'dis kyang zhes pa nas rig par
T02D2663b-1:274a-33: bya'o zhes pa'i bar ni gong du byang chub gang
T02D2663b-1:274a-34: par bya'o // zhe na / gang rang gi sems
T02D2663b-1:274a-35: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su
T02D2663b-1:274a-37: byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang
T02D2663b-1:274a-38: gi sems las yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs
T02D2663b-1:274a-39: pa dang / sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs
T02D2663b-1:274a-40: su dag pa yin te zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D2663b-1:274a-41: gsungs pa de rnam grangs gcig ste /
T02D2663b-1:274a-42: gnyis ka yang byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T02D2663b-1:274a-43: rgyu ston pa'i tshig gi rnam grangs su rig par
T02D2663b-1:274b-0: @274b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtogs pa'i chos
T02D2663b-1:274b-1: dang lung gi chos byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la
T02D2663b-1:274b-2: gang dang gang bshad pa rnams ni tshig la sogs
T02D2663b-1:274b-3: pa'i sgo tha dad kyang byang chub kyi sems rnam
T02D2663b-1:274b-5: rang gi sems yongs su shes par bya ba'i don
T02D2663b-1:274b-6: rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir te gzhan gyi phyir du
T02D2663b-1:274b-8: de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang
T02D2663b-1:274b-9: du chos gang dang gang ston pa de dag thams
T02D2663b-1:274b-10: cad ni byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag par
T02D2663b-1:274b-11: bya ba dang / sems yongs su shes par bya
T02D2663b-1:274b-12: ba'i phyir yin par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa
T02D2663b-1:274b-13: bya ba dang / yin no // de la byang
T02D2663b-1:274b-14: chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa ni byang chub
T02D2663b-1:274b-15: sems dpa'i sa dang po thob pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D2663b-1:274b-16: sems de gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las rnam par
T02D2663b-1:274b-18: sems yongs su shes pa ni gang sems kyi ngo
T02D2663b-1:274b-19: bo shes pa de'i rgyus sa dang po thob par

T02D2663b-1:277b-9: bu dang ldan pa'i sems kyi mtshan nyid bshad kyis
T02D2663b-1:277b-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba'i mchog / ces pa
T02D2663b-1:277b-12: ni de lta bu'i sems rnam par dag pa thams
T02D2663b-1:277b-13: cad mkhyen pa dang mngon par byang chub pa'i rang
T02D2663b-1:277b-14: bzhin de sems can phal cher gyi spyod yul ma
T02D2663b-1:277b-15: yin pa dang / snod ma yin pa la mi bstan pa'i phyir gsang ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:277b-16: rtog ge kun gyis mi shes pa //
T02D2663b-1:277b-17: zhes pa ni stong pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sems de
T02D2663b-1:277b-18: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i rigs pa'i sgo
T02D2663b-1:277b-19: nas ji lta ba bzhin du mi rtogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:277b-20: yid gcig bsdus la mnyen par gyis //
T02D2663b-1:277b-21: zhes pa ni ma yengs par nyon cig pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:277b-22: sems ni brgya rtsa drug cu las //
T02D2663b-1:277b-23: 'das nas skye bar 'gyur zhes sbyar te /
T02D2663b-1:277b-24: 'jig rten pa'i sems brgya drug cu las 'das nas
T02D2663b-1:277b-25: chos la bdag med par rtogs te mos pas spyod
T02D2663b-1:277b-26: pa'i sa la sems gsum rnam par bsgom pa dang
T02D2663b-1:277b-27: / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rnam par spyod pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:277b-28: bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi byas nas mos pas spyod pa'i sa las 'phar te /
T02D2663b-1:277b-29: sa rab tu dga' ba'i sems ye shes kyi sa la zhugs pa la bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:277b-30: ji snyed cig las 'das nas ni /
T02D2663b-1:277b-31: skye bar 'gyur zhes dris pa'i lan no //
T02D2663b-1:277b-32: bsod nams ches zhes pa ni pha rol tu phyin
T02D2663b-1:277b-33: pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams chen po'i rgyu las
T02D2663b-1:277b-34: skyes pa'o // snying po ni phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:277b-35: dper na tsandan dang seng ldeng gi snying po ltar mchog dam pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:277b-36: byang chub nyid kyi phyir byang chub 'byung ba zhes sbyar te /
T02D2663b-1:277b-37: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir na
T02D2663b-1:277b-38: byang chub kyi sems de las sems 'byung ba la
T02D2663b-1:277b-39: bya'o // nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing //
T02D2663b-1:277b-40: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems de'i yon tan
T02D2663b-1:277b-41: la sogs pa tshad bzung zhing dpag tu med pa'am
T02D2663b-1:277b-42: rnam pa med pas 'di tsam mo zhes tshad gzung
T02D2663b-1:277b-43: du med de nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la bya'o
T02D2663b-1:277b-44: // gos pa med par ji bzhin gnas //
T02D2663b-1:277b-45: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i sems nam mkha'i mtshan
T02D2663b-1:277b-46: nyid la glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags
T02D2663b-1:278a-0: @278a * // de ltar glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma'i
T02D2663b-1:278a-1: dbang du ma gyur pas shin tu rnam par dag
T02D2663b-1:278a-2: pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:278a-3: chos kun gyis ni mi bsgul te //
T02D2663b-1:278a-4: dpag med ye shes kyis bsgrubs pa //
T02D2663b-1:278a-5: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems de tshad med pa'i ye shes las byung ba la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:278a-6: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas ston pa //
T02D2663b-1:278a-7: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:278a-8: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa spyad pa las byung ste /
T02D2663b-1:278a-9: de'i spyod pa ci 'drar 'gyur ba dang zhes dris pa'i lan no //
T02D2663b-1:278a-10: byang chub phyir ni dang por 'dod //
T02D2663b-1:278a-11: ces pa ni sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems la bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:278a-12: de rnams ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu dang rang bzhin bshad pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:278a-13: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la /
T02D2663b-1:278a-14: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas //
T02D2663b-1:278a-15: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams //
T02D2663b-1:278a-17: 'jig pas stong nyid shes par bya //
T02D2663b-1:278a-18: zhes pa'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2663b-1:278a-19: mdzad kyi rgyu bshad pa yin te rgyu de yang
T02D2663b-1:278a-21: de la 'jig rten pa'i sems brgya drug cu la
T02D2663b-1:278a-22: sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi nye bar
T02D2663b-1:278a-23: len pa'i rgyu'o // gzhan sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D2663b-1:278a-24: de lta bas na so so'i skye bo la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663b-1:278a-25: 'jig rten pa'i gzhung lugs shes pa dang mi shes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:278a-26: de la byis pa ni ngan par smra ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:278a-29: de dag ni rang gi gzhung lugs kyang mi shes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:278a-30: de las gzhan pa ni rang rang gi gzhung lugs
T02D2663b-1:278a-31: shes pa 'phags pa'i lam thob pa la bya ste
T02D2663b-1:278a-32: / de dag 'khor ba na sdug bsngal gsum gyis
T02D2663b-1:278a-33: gdungs nas gdungs pa de las thar pa'i phyir bdag
T02D2663b-1:278a-34: dang bdag gir brtags pa de dag la brten nas
T02D2663b-1:278a-35: sbyin pa la sogs pa byas te thar bar re
T02D2663b-1:278a-36: / ba'o // bdag dang bdag gi ba la mngon
T02D2663b-1:278a-37: par chags nas bdag tu 'dzin pa grangs med pa
T02D2663b-1:278a-38: la rtog pa de dag kyang bdag ces pa'i rang
T02D2663b-1:278a-39: bzhin ci 'dra ba ma dpyad par chags pa skye
T02D2663b-1:278a-40: ba ni rang rang gi gzhung lugs mi shes pa'i
T02D2663b-1:278a-42: rang rang gi gzhung lugs shes pa de rnams kyang
T02D2663b-1:278a-43: so so'i bdag tu brtags pa de la brten pa
T02D2663b-1:278a-44: ni gzhan dag ni dus las byung ba dang zhes
T02D2663b-1:278a-45: pa nas brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:278a-46: brjod par bya ba ma yin par rtog ste zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2663b-1:278a-47: de dag ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi so so'i bdag tu brtags pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:278a-48: ji skad du smos pa'i bdag dang bdag gi ngo
T02D2663b-1:278a-49: bo de dag gi sa bdag cag 'gro ba rnams
T02D2663b-1:278b-0: bskyed de // @278b de dag nyid kyis 'jig par yang byed par rtog go //
T02D2663b-1:278b-1: gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag gi khyad par de
T02D2663b-1:278b-2: lta bu la sogs pa zhes pa ni gong du
T02D2663b-1:278b-3: smos pa'i bdag gi dngos po rnams la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:278b-4: thar pa 'dod pas zhes pa de lta bur bdag
T02D2663b-1:278b-5: tu brtags pa nyid la brten nas thar ba re
T02D2663b-1:278b-6: ba'o // rnal 'byor 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor bdag gis
T02D2663b-1:278b-7: zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i tshul du lus ngag
T02D2663b-1:278b-8: yid gsum yul la 'jug pa las 'gog pa dang
T02D2663b-1:278b-9: ba'o // / dngos po gang la dmigs pa de
T02D2663b-1:278b-10: la sems rtse gcig tu dmigs pa 'dzag pa ni
T02D2663b-1:278b-11: ba'o // / rnal 'byor te / lus ngag yid
T02D2663b-1:278b-12: gsum yul la mi 'jug par 'gog pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2663b-1:278b-13: 'dod pa rnams kyis de lta bu'i bdag rnams rab
T02D2663b-1:278b-15: byis pa so so'i skye bo phyugs dang mtshungs pa
T02D2663b-1:278b-16: rnams zhes pa ni rang gi gzhung lugs mi shes
T02D2663b-1:278b-18: byugs dang mtshungs pa zhes pa ni ngan par smra ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:278b-20: ngan par byed pa'i dpe ste phyugs ni za pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:278b-21: g-yem pa dang 'jigs pa las bsam pa gzhan med de /
T02D2663b-1:278b-22: byis pa rnams kyang de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas phyugs dang mtshungs zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:278b-23: brgya lam na res 'ga' zhig la zhes pa de
T02D2663b-1:278b-24: lta bu'i byis pa phyugs dang mtshungs pa 'khor ba
T02D2663b-1:278b-25: na 'khyams pa na chos kyi 'du shes 'byung ba
T02D2663b-1:278b-27: chos kyi 'du shes skye ba yang smyung bar gnas nas bsod nams su 'gyur ba la bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:278b-28: smyung bar gnas pa de tsam gyis sems mgu ste
T02D2663b-1:278b-29: smyung bar gnas pa nyid la yang du dus dus
T02D2663b-1:278b-31: de bas na smyung bar gnas pa la gnas par
T02D2663b-1:278b-32: bya'o zhes de tsam zhig sems la byas nas mgu
T02D2663b-1:278b-33: ba bskyed cing phyi phyir de nyid la goms par
T02D2663b-1:278b-34: byed de zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-1:278b-35: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ni dge ba'i las skye ba'i sa bon lta bu ste /
T02D2663b-1:278b-36: sems dang po'i zhes pa ni sems bdun pa'i tshe
T02D2663b-1:278b-37: tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i dge ba 'byung ba'i sa bon
T02D2663b-1:278b-39: de la 'ga' zhig smyung bar gnas pa ni brtul
T02D2663b-1:278b-40: zhugs kyi mtshan nyid de nyon mongs pa'i phyogs gcig
T02D2663b-1:278b-41: yin na ji ltar dge ba'i sa bon du 'gyur
T02D2663b-1:278b-42: snyam du dogs pa skye ba la /
T02D2663b-1:278b-43: dogs pa bsal ba ni smyung bar byas pa'i 'og
T02D2663b-1:278b-44: tu mchod pa dang sbyin pa'i sems 'byung ba ste
T02D2663b-1:278b-45: / smyung ba de ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:278b-46: dge ba'i de ma thag pa'i rkyen byed pas nyes
T02D2663b-1:279a-0: / pa med do // sbyin pa la sogs pa de dag kyang zag pa dang bcas @279a * //
T02D2663b-1:279a-2: de'i rgyu nyid kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed de zhes sbyar te /
T02D2663b-1:279a-3: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i nyi ma zhes pa smyung
T02D2663b-1:279a-4: bar byad pa de nyid la goms par byed pa'i
T02D2663b-1:279a-5: rgyus zla ba dang skar ma dang nyi ma la
T02D2663b-1:279a-6: sogs pa bzang po'i nyin par pha ma la sogs
T02D2663b-1:279a-7: pa'i gnyen rnams la sbyin par byed pa ni tshul
T02D2663b-1:279a-8: khrims bsrungs ba'i dge ba las 'byung ba'i myu gur
T02D2663b-1:279a-9: blta'o // de nas gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid
T02D2663b-1:279a-10: mi shes pa dag la yang sbyin par byed ces
T02D2663b-1:279a-11: pa ni sbyin pa ste ma la goms pa'i mthus
T02D2663b-1:279a-12: gnyen ma yin pa gzhan la yang sbyin pa ste
T02D2663b-1:279a-13: blta'o // / de yang dge ba bcu'i las 'byung ba'i sdong bu lta bur blta'o //
T02D2663b-1:279a-14: de nas gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid snod du
T02D2663b-1:279a-15: dung ba yongs su tshol zhing par byed de zhes
T02D2663b-1:279a-16: pa ni pa dang ma dang /
T02D2663b-1:279a-17: mkhan po dang slob dpon dang bram ze rig byed
T02D2663b-1:279a-18: bzhi pa rdzogs par shes pa la sbyin na de
T02D2663b-1:279a-20: bsod nams mtha' med par 'gyur bas sbyin pa'i snos
T02D2663b-1:279a-21: do snyam nas sbyin par byed pa de yang dge
T02D2663b-1:279a-22: ba'i las 'byung ba'i rgyu ste lo ma lta bur
T02D2663b-1:279a-23: blta'o // de nas gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid
T02D2663b-1:279a-24: bla ma'am rol mo mkhan dag la dga' bzhin du
T02D2663b-1:279a-25: sbyin par byed de zhes pa ni sbyin pa de
T02D2663b-1:279a-26: ni snga ma las rgya che ste /
T02D2663b-1:279a-27: snod la yang mi rtog par bla ma dang rol
T02D2663b-1:279a-28: mo mkhan la sogs pa la sems dga' bar sbyin
T02D2663b-1:279a-29: pas dngos po la ma chags par sbyin pa ste
T02D2663b-1:279a-30: / de yang dge ba'i las 'byung ba'i rgyu ste me tog lta bur blta'o //
T02D2663b-1:279a-31: de nas gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid yid dga'
T02D2663b-1:279a-32: ba dag la sbyin par byed de zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-1:279a-34: gos 'dod pa la gos la sogs pa ci 'dod pa rnams sbyin pa la bya ste ;
T02D2663b-1:279a-35: / de yang dge ba'i las 'byung ba'i 'bras bur blta'o //
T02D2663b-1:279a-36: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po //
T02D2663b-1:279a-37: gzhan yang mtho ris su skye bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D2663b-1:279a-38: tshul khrims bsrung ste zhes pa ni de lta bu'i
T02D2663b-1:279a-39: sbyin pa rnams byas nas lus kyi las gsum dang
T02D2663b-1:279a-41: yid kyi las gsum gyi sgo nas mi dge ba
T02D2663b-1:279a-42: 'byung ba spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tshul khrims bsrungs
T02D2663b-1:279a-43: nas de'i 'bras bu mngon par mtho ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2663b-1:279a-44: lha la sogs pa'i longs spyod mtho ris su skye
T02D2663b-1:279a-45: ba'i phyir te longs spyod de nyid ga sos su
T02D2663b-1:279a-47: de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po //
T02D2663b-1:279b-0: gzhan yang sems de lta bu nyid @279b kyis 'khor
T02D2663b-1:279b-1: bar rgyu ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la la
T02D2663b-1:279b-2: zhig las tshig 'di skad thos te zhes pa de
T02D2663b-1:279b-3: lta bur sbyin pa byed cing tshul khrims bsrung ba
T02D2663b-1:279b-4: la mkhan po 'jig rten pa'i gzhung lugs shes pa
T02D2663b-1:279b-5: 'ga' zhig gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen byas te /
T02D2663b-1:279b-6: rang gi ston pa'i lha la brten du bcug pa ste //
T02D2663b-1:279b-7: dge ba'i bshes gnyen des kyang lha rnams kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:279b-8: lha 'di dag ni lha chen te //
T02D2663b-1:279b-9: thams cad la ni bde ba ster //
T02D2663b-1:279b-10: de la khyod kyis gus mchod dang //
T02D2663b-1:279b-11: thams cad grub pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2663b-1:279b-13: de bzhin lha dang drang srong mchog / rig byed rig byed skyes bu yin //
T02D2663b-1:279b-15: mkhas pa'i mchod pa gyis shig ces //
T02D2663b-1:279b-16: zhes pa ni de ltar gong du ming gis smos
T02D2663b-1:279b-17: pa'i lha de rnams gang la dad pa la ston
T02D2663b-1:279b-18: pa dang mchod pa'i gnas su byas na lha de
T02D2663b-1:279b-19: rnams kyis bde ba ster ba dang bsam pa thams
T02D2663b-1:279b-20: cad 'grub bar byed do zhes bsten pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:279b-21: de las de 'dra'i tshig thos nas //
T02D2663b-1:279b-22: yid ni yang dag mgu gyur te //
T02D2663b-1:279b-23: de'i che rab tu gus ldan pas //
T02D2663b-1:279b-24: de dag la ni nan tan byed //
T02D2663b-1:279b-25: ces pa ni de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
T02D2663b-1:279b-26: lha rnams bstan pa thos nas byis pa de la
T02D2663b-1:279b-28: de nas lha de dag la brten pa dang mchod
T02D2663b-1:279b-29: pa nan tan byed cing lha de rnams la rab
T02D2663b-1:279b-30: tu dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:279b-31: gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni byis pa so
T02D2663b-1:279b-32: so'i skye bo 'khor ba ni kun du 'khyams pa
T02D2663b-1:279b-33: rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa'i mchog yin te /
T02D2663b-1:279b-34: 'di ni stobs su gyur pa ste sems brgyad par
T02D2663b-1:279b-35: rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad do zhes pa ni de
T02D2663b-1:279b-36: lta bu'i byis pa so so'i skye bo tha dad
T02D2663b-1:279b-37: pa rnams 'khor ba nas skyabs dang mgon med par
T02D2663b-1:279b-38: 'khyams pa las dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis skyabs
T02D2663b-1:279b-39: dang mgon de dag bstan pas byis pa de rnams
T02D2663b-1:279b-40: kyis skyabs dang mgon rnyed de dbugs phyin pa ni
T02D2663b-1:279b-41: brtan por gyur pas dge ba'i stobs su gyur pa'o
T02D2663b-1:279b-42: zhes pa'o // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po gzhan
T02D2663b-1:279b-43: yang khyad par rtogs pa ji skad du yongs su
T02D2663b-1:279b-44: grags pa'i khyad par de dang de dag la khyad
T02D2663b-1:279b-45: par du gnas pa rnams la 'ba' zhig pa nyid
T02D2663b-1:279b-46: kyi don du blo skye shing de yang yod do
T02D2663b-1:279b-47: zhes stong pa nyid kho na la dngos por sems
T02D2663b-1:280a-1: gi ngo bo smos pa rnams dang ston pa'i lha
T02D2663b-1:280a-2: rnams kyi rang bzhin ji skad smos pa bzhin du
T02D2663b-1:280a-3: shes nas bdag tu brtags pa dang lta de rnams
T02D2663b-1:280a-4: la brten te / lha de rnams kyis bstan pa'i
T02D2663b-1:280a-5: gzhung gis las dang nyon mongs pa spangs nas dag
T02D2663b-1:280a-6: pa'i bdag tu rtog pa yin te /
T02D2663b-1:280a-7: dag pa de yang stong pa nyid mya ngan las
T02D2663b-1:280a-8: 'das pa yin no snyam pa'i blo skye ba ste
T02D2663b-1:280a-9: / stong pa nyid la bde ba dang sdug bsngal
T02D2663b-1:280a-10: myong bar byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag ces pa'i
T02D2663b-1:280a-12: spu'i nyag ma la sogs pa tsam du yod par
T02D2663b-1:280a-13: rtog ste de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye
T02D2663b-1:280a-14: bo rnams kyis bdag dang lha rnams la brten nas
T02D2663b-1:280a-15: rang gi rnam par grol ba tshol ba ste /
T02D2663b-1:280a-16: rnam par grol bar tshol ba'i bde ba de yang
T02D2663b-1:280a-17: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi brgyud pa'i
T02D2663b-1:280a-18: rgyur blta'o // dbang phyug chen po dang tshangs pa
T02D2663b-1:280a-19: la sogs pa'i lha de rnams kyang spyir sems can
T02D2663b-1:280a-22: ye shes kyi sems can no //
T02D2663b-1:280a-23: de la skabs 'dir ni lha de rnams kyang byis
T02D2663b-1:280a-24: pa so so'i skye bo 'khyams pa rnams la so
T02D2663b-1:280a-25: so'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston pa ste
T02D2663b-1:280a-26: / lam de ston pa yang bcom ldan 'das rnam

T02D2663b-1:294b-26: dbu ba dang chu bur la sogs pa'i tshul du

T02D2663b-1:294b-29: tsam 'ba' zhig yod par rtogs pa ni chos kyi

T02D2663b-1:294b-32: de'i tshe chos la bdag med pas dbugs phyin pa

T02D2663b-1:295a-1: yang ngo bo nyid med do zhes stong pa'i ye
T02D2663b-1:295a-2: shes skyes pa de'i tshe chos thams cad kyi ngo

T02D2663b-1:295a-5: phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams bdag med par

T02D2663b-1:295a-7: shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa de yang

T02D2663b-1:295a-10: bzhin de yang ngo bo nyid med par rtogs pa

T02D2663b-1:295a-12: stong pa'i yang stong pa ste mnyam pa nyid kyis

T02D2663b-1:295a-15: kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa bshad pa la bya
T02D2663b-1:295a-16: ste / rgyu phun sum thogs pa bshad pa yang
T02D2663b-1:295a-17: de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan yang rgyu'i
T02D2663b-1:295a-19: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2663b-1:295a-20: rtog pa thams cad spangs pa yin //

T02D2663b-1:295a-26: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na med pa'i

T02D2663b-1:295a-29: spyod pa yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663b-1:295a-31: da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /

T02D2663b-1:295a-41: kyi rang bzhin du yang ngo bo nyid med pa

T02D2663b-1:295a-43: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /

T02D2663b-1:295a-47: tha ma'i tha grub pa dang /

T02D2663b-1:295b-17: yod par snang ba ni sgyu ma la sogs pa

T02D2663b-1:295b-33: de bzhin stong pa dag las 'byung //
T02D2663b-1:295b-35: de la sgyu ma gang zhe na /
T02D2663b-1:295b-37: sman dang sngags kyis sbyor ba byed pa dag gi

T02D2663b-1:295b-48: la sogs pa'i dngos po rnam pa mang pos yid
T02D2663b-1:295b-49: dang mi chags par byed par snang ste /
T02D2663b-1:296a-0: @296a * // de rnams kyang ba glang rta la sogs pa'i rang
T02D2663b-1:296a-1: bzhin du yod pa ma yin pas na phyogs bcur
T02D2663b-1:296a-3: 'on kyang de dag ba glang la sogs pa'i bya ba yang byed do //

T02D2663b-1:296a-7: dang 'bring la sogs pa'i grub pa'i 'bras bu rig
T02D2663b-1:296a-8: 'dzin dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang mi
T02D2663b-1:296a-9: snang bar 'gro ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna
T02D2663b-1:296a-10: tshogs su snang zhing myong par byed do //
T02D2663b-1:296a-11: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
