T02D2663b-1:296a-13: yang 'du shes kyis tha snyad tsam du 'dogs shing
T02D2663b-1:296a-14: tha snyad sgrub par byed do //

T02D2663b-1:296a-16: zhes tha snyad du 'dogs shing tha snyad kyang sgrub
T02D2663b-1:296a-17: par byed do zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:296a-18: de ltar sngags kyi 'bras bu sgyu ma dang 'dra na sngags kyi dngos po ci zhig ce na /
T02D2663b-1:296a-20: ji ltar 'brog dgon par smig rgyu la mi'am /
T02D2663b-1:296a-21: ri dags rnams kyis chur 'du shes te /

T02D2663b-1:296a-25: bzhin du sngags de yang dngos po yod pa ma

T02D2663b-1:296a-29: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02D2663b-1:296a-30: rmi lam na bdag nyid nyin gcig dang /
T02D2663b-1:296a-34: lo la sogs par 'dug cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po myong bar mthong la /
T02D2663b-1:296a-35: sad na ci yang mi mthong ba de bzhin du
T02D2663b-1:296a-36: gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di yang rmi lam lta bur
T02D2663b-1:296a-37: khong du chud par bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:296a-38: sngar sngags bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu'i dpe sgyu ma las
T02D2663b-1:296a-39: blangs pa de sgyu ma ni yun ring du 'dug
T02D2663b-1:296a-40: pa ma yin gyi skad cig yud tsam dag tu
T02D2663b-1:296a-41: zad la sngags kyi 'bras bu ni bskal ba la
T02D2663b-1:296a-42: sogs par yun ring du 'dug na ji ltar dper
T02D2663b-1:296a-43: rung zhe na / rmi lam gyi dpes yun ring du gnas par bstan pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:296a-44: ji ltar rmi lam na yul gyi dngos po med par skad cig dang /

T02D2663b-1:296b-1: ba dang sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po myong zhing
T02D2663b-1:296b-2: rigs par mthong ste de las sad na dngos po

T02D2663b-1:296b-6: ji ltar bu mo gzhan nu'i rmi lam na //

T02D2663b-1:296b-13: bskal pa la sogs par gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663b-1:296b-14: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang //
T02D2663b-1:296b-15: gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'byung ba ni gzugs brnyan

T02D2663b-1:296b-19: las byung na sgrub pa po thams cad kyis grub
T02D2663b-1:296b-20: pa ci'i phyir mi 'thob ce na /
T02D2663b-1:296b-21: ji ltar gzugs brnyan de rdo dang shing gzhan las
T02D2663b-1:296b-22: mi 'byung gi / me long gi dkyil 'khor dag
T02D2663b-1:296b-24: de bzhin du sngags kyi grub pa de yang sgrub
T02D2663b-1:296b-25: pa po thams cad la mi 'byung gi / gang

T02D2663b-1:296b-27: pa de la 'byung par bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:296b-28: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02D2663b-1:296b-29: grub pa'i grub gnas ni dri za'i grong khyer lta bur blta'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:296b-30: ji ltar dri za rnams kyi grong khyer dri za
T02D2663b-1:296b-31: de rnams kyis gang du bsams pa der grong thal
T02D2663b-1:296b-33: de bzhin du gsang sngags grub pa de yang bdag
T02D2663b-1:296b-34: nyid kyi lus rig 'dzin la sogs par grub pa'i

T02D2663b-1:297a-3: po yod pa ma yin yang sgrar 'byung ba de

T02D2663b-1:297a-6: sgrub pa'i rkyen gyis sgra de 'byung ba ni dper na brag ca dang 'dra bar bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:297a-7: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02D2663b-1:297a-8: zla ba shar na chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan mthong nas chu zla zhes brjod pa de bzhin du /

T02D2663b-1:297a-10: zla ba shar ba'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du 'byung
T02D2663b-1:297a-11: pa de ni zla ba'i rang bzhin de las mi

T02D2663b-1:297a-14: sogs pa ni sgrub pa'i gzugs de las gzhan ma

T02D2663b-1:297a-17: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang //
T02D2663b-1:297a-18: ji ltar char pa bab pa na //

T02D2663b-1:297a-30: gcig pu las kyang grub pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa
T02D2663b-1:297a-32: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02D2663b-1:297a-33: sems can med cing srog dang ni //

T02D2663b-1:297a-35: dngos po thams cad stong nyid la //
T02D2663b-1:297a-36: 'khrul pa kho na snang bar zad //

T02D2663b-1:297b-33: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu 'jig

T02D2663b-1:297b-35: ma rnams kyang sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D2663b-1:297b-36: 'di'i nang du 'dus la sa dang po nas kun
T02D2663b-1:297b-37: du bzang po'i sa man chad kyi sems kyang 'di
T02D2663b-1:297b-38: las tha mi dad pa'i phyir de rnams kyi gnas
T02D2663b-1:297b-39: su gyur pas na mthar gyis theg pa chen po
T02D2663b-1:297b-41: ye shes sna tshogs cher 'byung ba //
T02D2663b-1:297b-42: nor gyi dbyig 'di shes na ni //
T02D2663b-1:297b-43: kun gyi sems kyi bye brag kyang //
T02D2663b-1:297b-44: ji bzhin yang dag rab tu shes //
T02D2663b-1:297b-45: zhes pa ni sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D2663b-1:297b-46: de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i gtso
T02D2663b-1:297b-47: bo yin pas ye shes nas tshogs che 'byung ba
T02D2663b-1:297b-48: yin la / de legs par shes na rnam pa
T02D2663b-1:297b-49: rnams mdzad kyi rgyu dang 'jigs rten dang 'jigs rten
T02D2663b-1:298a-0: las 'das pa'i sems kyi khyad par thams @298a *
T02D2663b-1:298a-1: yin la / // cad rab tu shes par gyur pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:298a-2: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon
T02D2663b-1:298a-3: par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa
T02D2663b-1:298a-4: byin gyis rlob pa las sems kyi khyad par rim
T02D2663b-1:298a-7: // / da ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663b-1:298a-8: kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas thams
T02D2663b-1:298a-9: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes des mtha' yas pa'i sems
T02D2663b-1:298a-10: can gyi khams rnams tshul nas tshogs dang bsam pa
T02D2663b-1:298a-11: sna tshogs dang thabs sna tshogs kyis bla na med
T02D2663b-1:298a-12: par bsgral ba'i phyir sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs
T02D2663b-1:298a-13: kyis lhun gyis grub pa nyid du sku mnyam pa
T02D2663b-1:298a-14: nyid mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor los khams gsum
T02D2663b-1:298a-15: thams cad du khyab par mdzad pa /
T02D2663b-1:298a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de
T02D2663b-1:298a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
T02D2663b-1:298a-19: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i yongs su dag
T02D2663b-1:298a-20: pa rnams kyis mngon sum du mthong zhing spyod yul
T02D2663b-1:298a-21: du 'gyur na / 'gro ba 'og ma rnams kyis
T02D2663b-1:298a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo
T02D2663b-1:298a-23: de spyod yul du ma gyur te /
T02D2663b-1:298a-24: sems can de rnams kyi don du sku la sogs
T02D2663b-1:298a-25: pa'i 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D2663b-1:298a-26: la sogs par byin brlab par bcom ldan 'das la
T02D2663b-1:298a-27: phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa 'chad de /
T02D2663b-1:298a-28: gsol ba de yang de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-1:298a-29: la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes
T02D2663b-1:298a-30: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-1:298a-31: bco ldan 'das gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul snying rje
T02D2663b-1:298a-32: chen po'i snying po 'byung ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal
T02D2663b-1:298a-33: po chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyi pa'i slad
T02D2663b-1:298a-35: de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang
T02D2663b-1:298a-36: po dag gi don dang phan pa dang bde par
T02D2663b-1:298a-37: 'gyur lags so zhes pa'i bar du ste /
T02D2663b-1:298a-38: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T02D2663b-1:298a-39: rgyas nas chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa
T02D2663b-1:298a-40: sems kyi sa las 'das pa de thugs su chud
T02D2663b-1:298a-41: nas sems can rnams so so'i dad pa dang rjes
T02D2663b-1:298a-42: su mthun la / so so'i bsam pa yongs su
T02D2663b-1:298a-43: rdzogs par byed pa'i sku la sogs pa'i 'khor los
T02D2663b-1:298a-44: sems can gyi khams thams cad du khyab par rnam
T02D2663b-1:298b-0: par sprul pa phyag na rdo rjes ji @298b ltar
T02D2663b-1:298b-1: mthong zhing rtogs pa de bcom ldan 'das la slar
T02D2663b-1:298b-2: bzlas te gsol pa yin no //
T02D2663b-1:298b-3: de ltar slar gsol pa yang ston pas ci bshad
T02D2663b-1:298b-4: pa rnams nyan pa pos khong du chud pa'i tshul
T02D2663b-1:298b-5: gyis slar mnyan na ston pa po spro ba dang
T02D2663b-1:298b-6: skabs 'og man dang mtshams sbyar pa la yang bde
T02D2663b-1:298b-7: ba'i phyir ro // ngo mtshar lags so zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:298b-8: ni de ltar stong pa nyid brjod pa dang rtogs
T02D2663b-1:298b-9: pa las 'das pa thugs su chud kyang sku la
T02D2663b-1:298b-10: sogs pa'i rgyan gyis tshul sna tshogs dang bsam pa
T02D2663b-1:298b-11: sna tshogs dang thabs sna tshogs kyis sprul pa de
T02D2663b-1:298b-12: ba'i phyir ro // ngo mtshar che'o // bcom ldan
T02D2663b-1:298b-13: 'das nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i
T02D2663b-1:298b-14: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D2663b-1:298b-15: pa de gzhan las mnyan nas thugs su chud pa
T02D2663b-1:298b-16: ma yin gyi bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thugs su
T02D2663b-1:298b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul
T02D2663b-1:298b-19: snying rje chen po snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-1:298b-20: gyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyi
T02D2663b-1:298b-21: ba'i slad du bshad du gsol de ni ma 'ongs
T02D2663b-1:298b-22: pa'i dus na sems can mang po dag gi don
T02D2663b-1:298b-23: dang phan pa dang bde par 'gyur lags so zhes
T02D2663b-1:298b-24: pa ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sku la sogs
T02D2663b-1:298b-25: pa'i 'khor lo de bdag cag gis rtogs shing spyod
T02D2663b-1:298b-26: yul du gyur na yang ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba
T02D2663b-1:298b-27: rnams kyi don du sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo
T02D2663b-1:298b-28: de rnams dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i sgo
T02D2663b-1:298b-29: nas 'gro ba de rnams kyi spyod yul du 'gyur
T02D2663b-1:298b-30: par byin gyis brlab tu gsol ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:298b-31: snying rje chen po 'byung ba zhes pa ni dkyil
T02D2663b-1:298b-32: 'khor de snying rje chen po las 'byung ba la
T02D2663b-1:298b-33: bya'o // dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni 'og nas gzhung nyid las 'chad do //
T02D2663b-1:298b-34: rgyal po zhes pa ni de las gzhan pa'i byang
T02D2663b-1:298b-35: chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun kyang
T02D2663b-1:298b-36: dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i nang du 'dus pas na
T02D2663b-1:298b-38: yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:298b-39: ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas sgrub cing lha mnyes
T02D2663b-1:298b-40: par bya'i spyod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis lha
T02D2663b-1:298b-41: mnyes par bya ba yang sgrub pa'i sgo nas bzlas
T02D2663b-1:298b-42: pa'i yan lag bzhi dang rang gi sems yongs su
T02D2663b-1:298b-43: sbyang ba la sogs pa'i spyod pas lha mnyes par
T02D2663b-1:298b-44: byas te / rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i grub pa
T02D2663b-1:298b-45: thob nas rim gyis sang rgyas su 'grub pa dang
T02D2663b-1:299a-0: byas te / / rang gi sems yongs @299a * //
T02D2663b-1:299a-1: su sbyangs pas mngon par shes pa dang pha rol
T02D2663b-1:299a-2: tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa rdzogs nas
T02D2663b-1:299a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnyed par gyur pa
T02D2663b-1:299a-4: ni dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:299a-5: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang po dag
T02D2663b-1:299a-6: gi don dang phan pa dang bde par 'gyur pa'i
T02D2663b-1:299a-7: phyir gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul de bshad du gsol
T02D2663b-1:299a-8: zhes spyar te ma 'ongs pa'i sems can de rnams
T02D2663b-1:299a-9: kyis dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2663b-1:299a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de thob par bya
T02D2663b-1:299a-11: ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor de bshad du gsol zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:299a-12: ste don dang zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:299a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa'i don gyi phyir ro ;
T02D2663b-1:299a-14: / phan pa dang zhes pa ni tshe phyi ma la phan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:299a-15: bde bar 'gyur zhes pa ni tshe 'di la bde ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:299a-16: yang na don dang zhes pa ni phan pa dang bde pa'i don la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:299a-17: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul zhes pa la gsang sngags
T02D2663b-1:299a-18: kyi spyod pa ni dkyil 'khor dang bsgrub pa la
T02D2663b-1:299a-19: sogs pa'o // de dag nyid tshul te tshul zhes
T02D2663b-1:299a-20: pa ni rgya gar skad kyi gzhung dang sbyar na
T02D2663b-1:299a-21: 'gro ba'am thob pa la bya ste gsang sngags kyi
T02D2663b-1:299a-22: spyod pa des bla na med pa'i sang rgyas su
T02D2663b-1:299a-23: 'gro ba'am thob pa de bshad du gsol zhes pa'o
T02D2663b-1:299a-24: sogs pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2663b-1:299a-25: par sang mdzad kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
T02D2663b-1:299a-26: gyi dkyil nag pa zhes pa la ni ni nges
T02D2663b-1:299a-27: pa aa ya thob pa'am 'gro ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:299a-28: 'khor la gzigs nas zhes pa ni byang chub sems
T02D2663b-1:299a-29: dpa'i 'khor de dag gi nang na g-yeng ba yod
T02D2663b-1:299a-31: nyan pa po snod du ma gyur pa yod dam med brtags pa'i phyir gzigs pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:299a-32: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub
T02D2663b-1:299a-33: sems dpa'i 'khor ni yongs su dag pa sha stag
T02D2663b-1:299a-34: yin na ci'i phyir g-yeng ba dang snod du ma
T02D2663b-1:299a-36: de'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2663b-1:299a-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor byang chub sems dpa' de
T02D2663b-1:299a-38: rnams la g-yeng pa dang snod du ma gyur pa
T02D2663b-1:299a-39: med mod kyi / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan
T02D2663b-1:299a-40: pa rnams la de lta bu srid pas de dag
T02D2663b-1:299a-41: la brtag pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:299a-42: lag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor spyad pa'i tshul bstan
T02D2663b-1:299a-43: pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
T02D2663b-1:299a-44: shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyon cig ces
T02D2663b-1:299a-45: pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas lha mnyes par
T02D2663b-1:299b-0: bya ba'i spyod pa rnam pa @299b bcu drug bshad
T02D2663b-1:299b-1: pa dang / de bzhin du rim gyis grub pa'i
T02D2663b-1:299b-2: sgo nas lha mnyes par bya ba'i spyod pa bzlas
T02D2663b-1:299b-3: pa yan lag bzhi dang rang gi sems yongs su
T02D2663b-1:299b-4: sbyang bar byas pas lha mnyes par 'gyur te /
T02D2663b-1:299b-5: rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i grub pa mngon du thob
T02D2663b-1:299b-6: nas rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs
T02D2663b-1:299b-7: su rdzogs par gyur pas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T02D2663b-1:299b-8: ye shes yongs su rdzog pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o
T02D2663b-1:299b-9: // dkyil 'khor spyad pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-1:299b-10: bri ba la sogs pa spyod pa rnam pa bcu
T02D2663b-1:299b-13: chos kyi rnam grangs zhes pa ni don gyi dngos
T02D2663b-1:299b-14: po gcig la tshig mang po'i sgo nas don gyi
T02D2663b-1:299b-15: dmigs bstan ba la bya ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T02D2663b-1:299b-16: ye shes thob par bya ba ni pha rol tu
T02D2663b-1:299b-17: phyin pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas kyang 'gyur /
T02D2663b-1:299b-18: sngags spyad pa'i sgo nas kyang 'gyur te /
T02D2663b-1:299b-19: de yang skabs 'dir sngags kyi ste /
T02D2663b-1:299b-20: de bas na dkyil 'khor spyad pa'i tshul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:299b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chos
T02D2663b-1:299b-22: kyi dbyings kyi dgongs pa ma rdzogs shing sems can
T02D2663b-1:299b-23: gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral par dam bca' ba
T02D2663b-1:299b-24: mdzad pas zhes pa byung nas kyang phyogs bcu kun
T02D2663b-1:299b-25: du bskor te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2663b-1:299b-26: sku'i nang rang gi gnas rnams su zhugs so zhes
T02D2663b-1:299b-27: pa'i bar du ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi
T02D2663b-1:299b-28: don du snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-1:299b-29: bri ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i
T02D2663b-1:299b-30: ting nge 'dzin bstan pa la bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:299b-31: ting nge 'dzin bstan pa yang snying rje chen po
T02D2663b-1:299b-32: 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i slob dpon gyis ting
T02D2663b-1:299b-33: nge 'dzin 'di lta bu mngon du byas te /
T02D2663b-1:299b-34: de nas sa tshon gyis sku'i cha lugs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i tshul bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:299b-35: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chos
T02D2663b-1:299b-36: kyi dbyangs kyi dongs pa ma rdzogs pa chos kyi
T02D2663b-1:299b-37: dbyings ni / stong pa nyid dang ;
T02D2663b-1:299b-40: de'i dgos pa'i sku la sogs pas mi za dpa'i
T02D2663b-1:299b-41: rgyan gyis sems can gyi khams gtams cad kun du
T02D2663b-1:299b-42: khyab par bstan nas sems can de rnams bla na
T02D2663b-1:299b-43: med pa'i byang chub tu bsgral ba la bya ste
T02D2663b-1:300a-1: kyang da dung ma lus par ma bsgral bas dgos pa ma rdzogs zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:300a-2: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral par dam bca' pa mdzad pas zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:300a-3: de ltar chos kyi dgos pa de ma rdzogs pa
T02D2663b-1:300a-4: yang rdzogs shing zad pa ma yin gyi bcom ldan
T02D2663b-1:300a-5: 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
T02D2663b-1:300a-6: na thugs kyi yi dam mdzad pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:300a-7: bdag gis byang chub thob nas sems can ma lus pa yang bsgral bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:300a-8: de bas na sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar dam bca' ba mdzad ces so //
T02D2663b-1:300a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thabs cig yang dag par mol nas zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:300a-10: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar bzhugs
T02D2663b-1:300a-11: pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang chos kyi sku
T02D2663b-1:300a-12: dang 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas mnyam pa nyid de
T02D2663b-1:300a-13: / de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad gsung gcig tu 'chad par bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:300a-14: gnyis su na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
T02D2663b-1:300a-15: thabs cig yang dag par mol nas zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-1:300a-16: / chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid mngon du byas nas zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:300a-17: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thabs cig mol sna zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:300a-18: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba nga rgyal can rnams nga
T02D2663b-1:300a-19: rgyal gcag pa dang zhu gtug mi byed pa rnams
T02D2663b-1:300a-20: bla ma dang grogs po la dri zhing zhu gtug
T02D2663b-1:300a-21: byed pa la brtson pa bskyed pa'i phyir te /
T02D2663b-1:300a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang gzhan dang bka' gros mdzad cing chos ston na /
T02D2663b-1:300a-23: bdag cag chod lta ci zhig snyam nas gzhan la 'dri ba la brtson par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663b-1:300a-24: snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya
T02D2663b-1:300a-25: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes
T02D2663b-1:300a-26: pa ni / ting nge 'dzin de las snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'am /
T02D2663b-1:300a-27: snying rje chen po las ting nge 'dzin 'byung ba la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:300a-28: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku'i
T02D2663b-1:300a-29: yan lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
T02D2663b-1:300a-30: sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
T02D2663b-1:300a-31: sa bcu'i bar du sems can la phan ba'i don mdzad pa rnams byung ngo //
T02D2663b-1:300a-32: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu kun du bskor te slar
T02D2663b-1:300a-33: log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i nang rang gi
T02D2663b-1:300b-0: gnas rnams su zhugs so zhes pa ni @300b bcom
T02D2663b-1:300b-1: ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa de'i tshe
T02D2663b-1:300b-2: ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang de bzhin
T02D2663b-1:300b-3: gshegs pa'i sku 'dra ba rnam par sprul pa byung
T02D2663b-1:300b-4: ste sems can gyi don byed pa ni sa dang
T02D2663b-1:300b-5: po nas brtsams nas sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par
T02D2663b-1:300b-7: de dag slar bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la so
T02D2663b-1:300b-8: so'i gnas su zhugs pa yang ting nge 'dzin brtan
T02D2663b-1:300b-9: pa'i mthus pa spu'i bu ga gang nas byung ba
T02D2663b-1:300b-10: de nyid du slar ma 'khrul bar zhugs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:300b-11: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
T02D2663b-1:300b-12: dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'
T02D2663b-1:300b-13: stsal to // lag na rje dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod pa nyon cig ces pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:300b-14: ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas phyag na rdo rje la dkyil 'khor bshad pa la bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:300b-15: dkyil 'khor bri ba bshad pa de yang rgyu dang
T02D2663b-1:300b-16: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu rnam pa gsum du blta
T02D2663b-1:300b-17: ste / de la rgyu ni slob dpon no //
T02D2663b-1:300b-18: rang bzhin ni dkyil 'khor sa bcad cing bri ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:300b-19: 'bras bu ni slob ma 'jug cing dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:300b-20: de la dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rgyu'i gtso bo ni slob dpon yin te /
T02D2663b-1:300b-21: de bas na slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid thog mar bshad do //
T02D2663b-1:300b-22: slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa yang slob dpon du 'jug pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2663b-1:300b-23: slob dpon du grub pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang de'i rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2663b-1:300b-24: de la slob dpon du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni
T02D2663b-1:300b-25: yid byang chub kyi sems la zhugs pa la sogs
T02D2663b-1:300b-26: pa'o // slob dpon du grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni
T02D2663b-1:300b-27: dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i las byed par gnang zhing dbang
T02D2663b-1:300b-29: rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2663b-1:300b-30: byang chub sems la rnam par gnas //
T02D2663b-1:300b-32: de dag kyang lus kyi yon tan dang ngag gi yon tan dang yid kyi yon tan gsum ste /
T02D2663b-1:300b-33: ji ltar rigs par spyar bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:300b-34: yid byang chub kyi sems la zhugs pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:300b-35: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:300b-36: chos rnam pa stong par 'jigs pa dang 'jug pa
T02D2663b-1:300b-37: dang ldan pa'o // shes rab dang ldan pa zhes pa la shes rab rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663b-1:300b-38: rang bzhin gyis shes rab rno ba dang thos pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa'i shes rab ste /
T02D2663b-1:300b-39: de dag gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa'o//
T02D2663b-1:301a-0: @301a * // snying rje can zhes pa snying rje ni sems can sdug bsngal las 'don par 'dod pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:301a-1: de yang rang bzhin gyi snying rje can dang mngon
T02D2663b-1:301a-2: par 'dus byas pa'i snying rje ste de dag dang
T02D2663b-1:301a-3: ldan pa'o // sgyu rtsal dag la mkhas pa zhes
T02D2663b-1:301a-4: pa ni spyir 'jig rten gyi dgra thabs la sogs
T02D2663b-1:301a-5: pa rnam pa mang mod kyi skabs 'dir ni dkyil
T02D2663b-1:301a-6: 'khor bri ba dang mchod pa'i yan lag rnams la
T02D2663b-1:301a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la
T02D2663b-1:301a-9: rtag tu mkhas pa zhes pa ni don dam pa
T02D2663b-1:301a-10: dang kun rdzob rnam pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis mkhas
T02D2663b-1:301a-11: pa ste / don dam par ni shes rab kyi
T02D2663b-1:301a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad gzod
T02D2663b-1:301a-13: ma nas ma byung ma skyes pa stong pa nyid
T02D2663b-1:301a-14: kyi rang bzhin du bsgom pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:301a-15: kun rdzob tu ni de ltar stong pa nyid bsgom
T02D2663b-1:301a-16: pa las langs nas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha
T02D2663b-1:301a-17: rol tu phyin pa rnams spyad nas de la yang
T02D2663b-1:301a-18: mi chags par 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul
T02D2663b-1:301a-19: du sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:301a-20: theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pa zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:301a-21: ni nyan thos kyi theg pa gang zag la bdag
T02D2663b-1:301a-22: med par rtogs nas phung po dang khams la sogs
T02D2663b-1:301a-23: pa la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang
T02D2663b-1:301a-24: bdag med par rtogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:301a-25: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa phung po la sogs
T02D2663b-1:301a-26: pa de rnams kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
T02D2663b-1:301a-27: rang bzhin du rtogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:301a-28: theg pa chen po chos thams cad gzod ma nas
T02D2663b-1:301a-29: ma byung ma skyes par rtog pa rnams kyi mtshan
T02D2663b-1:301a-30: nyid bye brag tu 'byed mkhas pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:301a-31: de la cir theg pa gcig la gsum du dbye
T02D2663b-1:301a-32: ci yod ce na theg pa nyid gsum du dbye
T02D2663b-1:301a-34: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi so so'i
T02D2663b-1:301a-35: ji ltar rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'byed mkhas pa la
T02D2663b-1:301a-36: bya'o // gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi
T02D2663b-1:301a-37: don la mkhas zhes pa ni sngags rnams kyi spyi'i
T02D2663b-1:301a-38: de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni byang chub
T02D2663b-1:301a-39: bya'o // kyi sems te / de la mkhas pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:301a-42: ting nge 'dzin rnams la mkhas pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:301a-43: sngags la mkhas pa ni sngags kyi tshig rnams bskul ba dang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin 'byed mkhas pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:301a-44: yi ge sa bon la mkhas pa ni lha rnams
T02D2663b-1:301a-45: so so'i sa bon snying po gang yin pa dang
T02D2663b-1:301b-0: / de rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi @301b sgo dang /
T02D2663b-1:301b-1: las gang yin pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:301b-2: ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa ni ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663b-1:301b-3: du zhugs pa las dbang chen dang chu la sogs
T02D2663b-1:301b-4: pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod cing de rnams kyi las sgrub
T02D2663b-1:301b-6: bsam pa shes pa ni slob ma rnams kyi bsam
T02D2663b-1:301b-7: pa shes pa ste de yang gzhan gyi sems shes
T02D2663b-1:301b-8: pa'i tshul gyis shes pa la ni mi bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:301b-9: sngags kyi cha brtag pa'i tshul gyis slob ma rnams
T02D2663b-1:301b-10: kyi spyod pa dang tshul la brtags nas lha zhi
T02D2663b-1:301b-11: ba dang khro bo rnams gang bsnyen par 'os pa
T02D2663b-1:301b-12: dang / grub pa rab 'bring gsum las gang bsgrub
T02D2663b-1:301b-13: par 'os pa la sogs pa'i tshul la mkhas pa'o
T02D2663b-1:301b-14: dang / // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D2663b-1:301b-15: rnams la dad pa zhes pa ni de rnams kyi
T02D2663b-1:301b-16: yon tan bshad pa la yid ches pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:301b-17: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las byed par gnang zhing dbang
T02D2663b-1:301b-18: bskur ba zhes pa la dbang bskur ba ni dbang
T02D2663b-1:301b-19: bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor du dri dang me tog dang
T02D2663b-1:301b-20: sman dang rin po che la sogs pas brgyan pa'i
T02D2663b-1:301b-21: bum par chu blugs te dbang bskur ba la bya'o
T02D2663b-1:301b-22: // gnang ba ni de ltar dbang bskur nas khyod
T02D2663b-1:301b-23: kyis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang sgrub pa la spyod
T02D2663b-1:301b-24: par gyis shig ces tshig gis gnang ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:301b-25: de la gnang zhing dbang bskur ba zhes pa dbang ma bskur bar ni gnang ba mi 'thob ste /
T02D2663b-1:301b-26: gnang ba smos pas dbang bskur ba ma smos kyang
T02D2663b-1:301b-27: zhar la go bar 'gyur na gnyis ka ci'i phyir
T02D2663b-1:301b-28: smos she na / gdon sel ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:301b-29: las phran tshegs la dbang ma bskur kyang byos shig
T02D2663b-1:301b-30: pa'i gnang ba thob pa srid de /
T02D2663b-1:301b-31: de bas na gnang ba thob cing dbang bskur ba zhes smos so//
T02D2663b-1:301b-32: brtan pa ni shes pa dang longs spyod la sogs
T02D2663b-1:301b-33: pa dang ldan pa yang de dag gis dregs par
T02D2663b-1:301b-34: mi 'gyur la de dag dang mi ldan na yang
T02D2663b-1:301b-36: sbyor ba la mkhas zhes pa ni sgrub pa dang
T02D2663b-1:301b-37: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sbyor ba la
T02D2663b-1:301b-38: mkhas pa'o // byang chub sems la rnam par gnas //
T02D2663b-1:301b-39: zhes pa ni stong ba nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nus pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:301b-40: gsang ba pa'i bdag po slob dpon de lta bu rgyal ba'i sras yin te /
T02D2663b-1:301b-41: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab
T02D2663b-1:301b-42: tu bsngags so zhes pa la slob dpon de lta
T02D2663b-1:301b-43: bu ni gong du smos pa'i yon tan rnams dang
T02D2663b-1:302a-1: / rgyal ba'i sras zhes pa ni rgyal ba'i bdag
T02D2663b-1:302a-2: nyid las skyes pa ste rgyal ba ni sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-1:302a-4: de'i bdag nyid ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T02D2663b-1:302a-5: chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid la mos pa las
T02D2663b-1:302a-6: byung ba ni rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes pa
T02D2663b-1:302a-7: zhes bya'o // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-1:302a-8: rnams kyis rab tu bsngags so zhes pa ni de
T02D2663b-1:302a-9: lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i slob dpon de
T02D2663b-1:302a-10: ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
T02D2663b-1:302a-12: de lta bu'i slob dpon de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags na /
T02D2663b-1:302a-13: mi bsngags pa'i slob dpon yang yod dam zhe na
T02D2663b-1:302a-14: yod de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2663b-1:302a-15: kyis rab tu bsngags so zhes pa'i tshig des slob
T02D2663b-1:302a-16: dpon rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya ste zab
T02D2663b-1:302a-17: cing rgya che ba la mos pa dang dmigs pa
T02D2663b-1:302a-18: can no // de la skabs 'dir slob dpon yon
T02D2663b-1:302a-19: tan de lta bu dang ldan pa sangs rgyas dang
T02D2663b-1:302a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa ni zab
T02D2663b-1:302a-21: cing rgya che ba'i slob dpon la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:302a-22: dmigs pa can gyi slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid ni
T02D2663b-1:302a-23: 'og nas slob dpon gnyi ga'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'i
T02D2663b-1:302a-25: da ni slob dpon de lta bus dkyil 'khor du gzung ba'i slob ma rnams brtag par bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:302a-26: slob ma de rnams brtag pa yang rang bzhin gyi yon tan dang /
T02D2663b-1:302a-27: mngon par 'dus byas pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas so //
T02D2663b-1:302a-28: de lta bas na gsang ba pa'i bdag po de
T02D2663b-1:302a-29: la slob dpon la gzhan gyis gsol ba btab kyang
T02D2663b-1:302a-30: rung zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2663b-1:302a-31: dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams kyis gsol ba btab
T02D2663b-1:302a-33: yang na bdag gis sems can dag / snod du rung zhing nyes bral ba //
T02D2663b-1:302a-34: de mthong nas ni bdag nyid kyis //
T02D2663b-1:302a-35: ma gsol bar ni de bos te //
T02D2663b-1:302a-36: zhes sbyar te snod du rung zhing zhes pa ni sngags bshad pa'i snod du 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:302a-37: nyes bral ba zhes pa ni sdig pa med pa
T02D2663b-1:302a-38: ste de la sdig pa ni sems kyi rgyud la
T02D2663b-1:302a-39: yod na ji ltar slob dpon des mthong bar 'gyur
T02D2663b-1:302a-40: zhan / sems kyi rgyud la gzhan pa'i sdig pa med par mthong ba la ni mi bya'i /
T02D2663b-1:302a-41: sdig pa'i rgyu mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
T02D2663b-1:302a-42: mi spyod par mthong ba ni sdig pa med par
T02D2663b-1:302b-0: @302b mthong ba'o // par bya'o // mos mang zhes
T02D2663b-1:302b-1: pa ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la
T02D2663b-1:302b-2: sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan
T02D2663b-1:302b-3: gyi chos rnams ma rtogs shing mngon du byas kyang
T02D2663b-1:302b-4: thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa'i sgo nas
T02D2663b-1:302b-5: 'di nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes
T02D2663b-1:302b-6: pa ni mos pa mang ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:302b-7: brtan zhes pa ni gong du slob dpon gyi brtan pa nyid bshad pa dang mthun no //
T02D2663b-1:302b-8: dad pa zhes pa ni dkon mchog gsum la yid
T02D2663b-1:302b-9: ches pa'i rnam pa dang sngags kyi tshul la yid
T02D2663b-1:302b-11: gzhan la phan dga' zhes pa ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:302b-12: gzhan sdug bsngal dang bral bar dga' ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:302b-13: slob ma de lta bu dang ldan par shes shing
T02D2663b-1:302b-14: mthong nas bdag nyid kyis ma gsol bar ni de
T02D2663b-1:302b-15: bos te zhes gong du smos pa'i yon tan gyi
T02D2663b-1:302b-16: mtshan nyid dang ldan par mthong nas shes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:302b-17: 'di skad bya zhes pa ni gal te slob ma
T02D2663b-1:302b-18: de bdag cag sngags grub pa'i 'bras bu rig 'dzin
T02D2663b-1:302b-19: la sogs pa 'dod pa ma yin gyi bla na
T02D2663b-1:302b-20: med pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod do snyam du
T02D2663b-1:302b-21: sems pa la / sngags kyi sgo nas bla na
T02D2663b-1:302b-22: med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos
T02D2663b-1:302b-24: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis //
T02D2663b-1:302b-25: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02D2663b-1:302b-26: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02D2663b-1:302b-27: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D2663b-1:302b-28: zhes pa ni sngags spyad pa'i tshul 'di theg pa chen po yin la /
T02D2663b-1:302b-29: de yang slob ma snod du gyur pa'i phyir bshad pas na yang dag par bshad pa yin gyi /
T02D2663b-1:302b-30: khe dang bkur sti'i phyir bshad pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2663b-1:302b-31: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02D2663b-1:302b-32: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02D2663b-1:302b-33: da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams //
T02D2663b-1:302b-34: 'gro pan phyir bzhugs pa dag / ces pa ni
T02D2663b-1:302b-35: 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma byon pa'i yang
T02D2663b-1:302b-36: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsang sngags
T02D2663b-1:302b-37: kyi spyad pa'i cho ga mchog 'di las byang chub
T02D2663b-1:302b-38: kyi shing drung du bdud rnam pa bzhi bcom nas
T02D2663b-1:302b-39: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes te /
T02D2663b-1:303a-0: de bas na slob ma khyed rnams kyis kyang cho ga mchog 'di las @303a * //
T02D2663b-1:303a-1: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan ba ste de bas na /
T02D2663b-1:303a-2: de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi //
T02D2663b-1:303a-3: cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas //
T02D2663b-1:303a-4: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02D2663b-1:303a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02D2663b-1:303a-6: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02D2663b-1:303a-7: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D2663b-1:303a-8: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02D2663b-1:303a-9: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02D2663b-1:303a-10: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2663b-1:303a-11: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-1:303a-12: de dag kun gyis zhes pa ni 'das pa dad
T02D2663b-1:303a-13: da ltar dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis
T02D2663b-1:303a-14: zhes pa'o // byang chub shing drung du thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02D2663b-1:303a-15: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi shing gi drung du
T02D2663b-1:303a-16: thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan ma med pa thob pa'o
T02D2663b-1:303a-17: // sngags kyi sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02D2663b-1:303a-18: zhes pa ni gang dang yang mi mnyam pa'i sngags
T02D2663b-1:303a-19: kyi sbyor ba des thams cad mkhyen pa thob par
T02D2663b-1:303a-20: shes par bya'o // de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2663b-1:303a-21: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces pa
T02D2663b-1:303a-22: ni de ltar sh'akya seng ges kyang sngags kyi spyod
T02D2663b-1:303a-23: pa'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes pas na
T02D2663b-1:303a-24: khyod kyis kyang 'di'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa
T02D2663b-1:303a-25: thob par gyis shig ces bshad pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:303a-26: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa yang bcom
T02D2663b-1:303a-27: ldan 'das kyis 'og min gyi gnas la sogs par
T02D2663b-1:303a-28: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa gzhan yang yod
T02D2663b-1:303a-29: mod kyi / skabs 'dir mi rnams la bshad pa'i
T02D2663b-1:303a-30: phyir sprul pa'i skus byang chub kyi shing drung du
T02D2663b-1:303a-31: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan to //
T02D2663b-1:303a-32: de ltar lan mang gzengs bstod de /
T02D2663b-1:303a-33: zhes pa ni gong du smos pa'i tshul gyis slob ma de mang du spro ba bskyed cig ces pa'o//
T02D2663b-1:303a-34: snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni /
T02D2663b-1:303a-35: zhes pa khe dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin gyi
T02D2663b-1:303a-36: slob ma de dag la snying rje ba'i phyir ro
T02D2663b-1:303a-37: // slob ma de brtan shes nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:303a-38: zhes pa ni slob ma de rnams de ltar gong
T02D2663b-1:303a-39: du smos pa'i tshul gyis yid ches te gzhan du
T02D2663b-1:303a-40: mi 'gyur bar gyur na slob ma de dag gi
T02D2663b-1:303a-41: ched du dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa rnams brtag par
T02D2663b-1:303a-42: bya ste / de yang sa nyid kyi yon tan gyis dga' ba dang //
T02D2663b-1:303a-43: 'phags pa rnams kyis bcags pas dang /
T02D2663b-1:303a-44: lha dang mi rnams kyis bsnyen pas dga' ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:303a-45: sngags mkhan nyid gang du dad pas dga' ba'o//
T02D2663b-1:303b-0: @303b de las nyid kyi yon tan gyis dga' ba'i gnas ni //
T02D2663b-1:303b-1: me tog 'bras bu ldan pa'i ri //
T02D2663b-1:303b-2: gtsang zhing yid 'ong chu yi gnas //
T02D2663b-1:303b-4: gang na 'bab chu mang po dag / ngang pa bzhad kyis brgyan yod pa //
T02D2663b-1:303b-5: der ni sngags pa blo can gyis //
T02D2663b-1:303b-8: sangs rgyas rnams dang rang mgon dang //
T02D2663b-1:303b-9: de bzhin rgyal ba'i na yan thos kyis //
T02D2663b-1:303b-10: sa phyogs gang dag bsten pa ni //
T02D2663b-1:303b-11: de dag thub pas rtag tu bsngags //
T02D2663b-1:303b-12: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni 'phags pa rnams kyis zhabs kyis bcags pas dga' ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:303b-13: phyogs gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa//
T02D2663b-1:303b-14: lha khang kun dga' bzang po dang //
T02D2663b-1:303b-15: khyim dang yang tog nyams dga' dang //
T02D2663b-1:303b-17: lha yi gnas rnams thams cad dang //
T02D2663b-1:303b-18: de bzhin khang pa stong par yang //
T02D2663b-1:303b-19: slob ma dag la phan 'dod phyir //
T02D2663b-1:303b-20: nan tan du ni dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2663b-1:303b-21: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni lha dang mi rnams kyis bsnyen pas dga' ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:303b-22: yang na yid du 'ong ba'i sa //
T02D2663b-1:303b-23: gang yang rung bar bri bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:303b-24: zhes pa ni gong du smos pa rnam pa gsum
T02D2663b-1:303b-25: las gzhan sngags pa nyid gang du dad pa'i sa
T02D2663b-1:303b-26: der dkyil 'khor bri ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-1:303b-27: de la sa gzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba
T02D2663b-1:303b-28: ni zhes pa sbyang ba rnam pa gnyis te phyi
T02D2663b-1:303b-29: dang nang gi'o ; / de bas na slob dpon yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663b-1:303b-30: zang cing rgya che ba la mos pa dang dmigs pa can no //
T02D2663b-1:303b-31: de la zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa'i
T02D2663b-1:303b-32: slob dpon gyis ni byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas
T02D2663b-1:303b-33: phyi'i nyes pa rnams kyi dngos po gzod ma nas
T02D2663b-1:303b-34: ma byung ma skyes par rtogs te nang gi sems
T02D2663b-1:303b-35: sbyangs pas dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir phyi'i zug rdu
T02D2663b-1:303b-36: bsal ba la sogs pa mi dgos mod kyi slob
T02D2663b-1:303b-37: ma rnams kyi yid dang sbyar ba'i phyir phyi'i sa
T02D2663b-1:303b-38: rnams brtag pa yang de rnams la ma zhen par
T02D2663b-1:303b-39: bya ste / de bas na slob dpon zab cing
T02D2663b-1:303b-40: rgya che ba la mos pas ni phyi nang gnyis
T02D2663b-1:303b-42: dmigs pa can gyi slob dpon gyis ni byang chub
T02D2663b-1:303b-43: kyi sems goms par ma byas pas phyi'i sa rnams
T02D2663b-1:303b-44: sbyang bar bya'o // de la nang gis sbyang ba ni byang chub kyi sems goms par byed pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:303b-45: phyi'i sa sbyang ba ni rdo dang bong ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:304a-0: gyo mo dang gseg ma med cing zhes pa nas nyes pa thams cad spangs pa'i @304a * //
T02D2663b-1:304a-1: gnas ni lha rnams la rab tu shis so zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2663b-1:304a-2: de la tshes grangs dang zhes pa nas snga dro'i
T02D2663b-1:304a-3: dus kyi ches ltas bzang pos mtshon pa la zhes
T02D2663b-1:304a-4: pa'i bar du ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa brtag
T02D2663b-1:304a-5: pa tshar nas / yongs su gzung ba rtsom pa'i
T02D2663b-1:304a-6: tshes grangs dang skar ma brtag pa la bya ste
T02D2663b-1:304a-7: pa tshar nas / / rgyu skar shis pa ni skar ma 'ba' zhig shis pa la mi bya'i /
T02D2663b-1:304a-8: nyi ma dang tshes grangs kun kyang ste shis pa zhes pa so sol sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:304a-9: snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ltas bzang pos mtshon pa
T02D2663b-1:304a-10: la zhes pa ltas bzang po brtags pa rab 'bring
T02D2663b-1:304a-12: lha'i dang bar snang gi dang sa las byung ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:304a-13: de la lha'i ni nam mkha' las sgra snyan pa la sogs pa 'byung ba ste mchog go //
T02D2663b-1:304a-14: bar snang gi ni bkra shis pa'i tshig dang bram
T02D2663b-1:304a-15: ze'i rig byed la sogs pa thob pa ste 'bring
T02D2663b-1:304a-16: ngo // sa las byung ba ni sa la dung
T02D2663b-1:304a-17: la sogs pa 'dug par mthong ba mthong ba ste
T02D2663b-1:304a-18: ngo // tha ma'o // de ltar thog rtsom pa'i
T02D2663b-1:304a-19: snga dro'i dus na ltas de rnams las gang yang
T02D2663b-1:304a-20: rung ba zhig byung na bzang ste /
T02D2663b-1:304a-21: sa yongs su gzung ba la sogs pa'i las rnams brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:304a-22: sa'i lha mo sbran pa'i tshig su bcad pa gnyis
T02D2663b-1:304a-23: bsgrag par bya'o zhes pa ni snga dro'i dus na
T02D2663b-1:304a-24: ltas bzang po dang ldan na dkyil 'khor gang du
T02D2663b-1:304a-25: bri bar bya ba'i sa gzhi der sa'i lha mo
T02D2663b-1:304a-26: la khyod kyi steng du dkyil 'khor bri'i zhes gsol
T02D2663b-1:304a-27: ba btab ste / bstod pa'i tshig su bcad pa'i sgo nas so //
T02D2663b-1:304a-28: sangs rgyas thob pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2663b-1:304a-29: spyod pa'i tshul gyis khyad par ni //
T02D2663b-1:304a-30: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:304a-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D2663b-1:304a-32: spyad pa spyod pa na sa dang pha rol tu
T02D2663b-1:304a-33: phyin pa rnams kyi tshul khyad par du spyad pa
T02D2663b-1:304a-34: dang / de ltar spyad nas byang chub kyi shing
T02D2663b-1:304a-35: drung du bdud rnam pa bzhi bcom ste mngon par
T02D2663b-1:304a-36: sangs rgyas pa yangs khyod kyi steng du yin pas
T02D2663b-1:304a-37: na lha mo khyod kyis ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2663b-1:304a-38: shes te dbang du gyur to zhes pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:304a-40: spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par ni //
T02D2663b-1:304a-41: sa dang pha rol phyin dag la //
T02D2663b-1:304a-43: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D2663b-1:304a-44: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02D2663b-1:304a-46: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02D2663b-1:304a-47: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2663b-1:304a-48: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas sa
T02D2663b-1:304b-0: @304b dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams spyad de
T02D2663b-1:304b-1: / byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud rnam pa
T02D2663b-1:304b-2: bzhi btul nas mngon par byang chub par byas pa
T02D2663b-1:304b-3: de bzhin du bdag kyang ma lus pa'i sems can
T02D2663b-1:304b-4: gyi khams rnams bsgral ba'i phyir sa khyod kyi steng
T02D2663b-1:304b-6: rim gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:304b-7: sa la lag pa reg byas shing //
T02D2663b-1:304b-8: de ltang lan mang sbran nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:304b-9: pus mo gnyis ni der btsugs nas //
T02D2663b-1:304b-10: me tog spos kyis mchod par bya //
T02D2663b-1:304b-11: mchod nas sngags pas de nas de //
T02D2663b-1:304b-12: de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2663b-1:304b-13: zhes pa sa'i lha mo la tshigs su bcad pas
T02D2663b-1:304b-14: bskul te gsol ba gdab pa la yang sngar de
T02D2663b-1:304b-15: bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lha mo de la mchod
T02D2663b-1:304b-16: cing phyag byas la lag pa sa la bzhag nas
T02D2663b-1:304b-17: / gdod gong du smos pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bskul te gsol ba gdab po /
T02D2663b-1:304b-18: de nas cho ga 'di dag gis //
T02D2663b-1:304b-19: mkhas pas sa gzhi sbyang bar bya ;
T02D2663b-1:304b-20: / zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul gyis sa sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:304b-21: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2663b-1:304b-22: zhabs la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
T02D2663b-1:304b-23: ces gsol to zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-1:304b-24: 'di lta'i tshul ni mi shes pas //
T02D2663b-1:304b-25: yul dang dus dang bya ba las //
T02D2663b-1:304b-26: dge dang mi dge'i mtshan ma yis ;
T02D2663b-1:304b-28: sems dpa' chen po de dag phyir //
T02D2663b-1:304b-29: cho ga 'di ni brjod pa yin //
T02D2663b-1:304b-30: zhes pa'i bar ni gong du nyi ma dang tshes grangs dang /
T02D2663b-1:304b-31: skar ma la sogs pa'i ltas rnams ni bshad na
T02D2663b-1:304b-32: sngags rnams kyi rang bzhin ni don dam par byang
T02D2663b-1:304b-34: mtshan ma med pa de dag las 'das pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:304b-35: kun rdzob tu yang dkyil 'khor dang sgrub pa dang
T02D2663b-1:304b-36: sngags spyad pa'i yan lag rnams mtshan ma can yin
T02D2663b-1:304b-37: mod kyi / don gyi bya ba byed la skar
T02D2663b-1:304b-38: ma dang tshes grangs la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'di
T02D2663b-1:304b-39: rnams ni don dam pa dang yang 'gal la kun
T02D2663b-1:304b-40: rdzob tu yang don gyi bya ba byed ma yin
T02D2663b-1:304b-41: mod kyi / na / ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-1:304b-42: kyis mtshan ma de dag bshad ces gsol ba dang
T02D2663b-1:304b-43: mod kyi / na / / bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D2663b-1:304b-44: kyang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas don dam
T02D2663b-1:304b-45: pa'i mtshan nyid de lta bu yin mod kyi ma
T02D2663b-1:304b-46: 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don dam pa'i tshul
T02D2663b-1:305a-1: pas 'gro ba de rnams drang ba'i phyir mtshan ma rnams bshad pa'i rigs pa bstan pa ste //
T02D2663b-1:305a-2: 'gro ba de rnams kyang rnam pa gnyis te //
T02D2663b-1:305a-3: dngos po la chags pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:305a-4: dngos po med pa la chags pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:305a-5: dngos po la chags pa rnams la yang tshes grangs
T02D2663b-1:305a-6: dang dus dang yul la sogs pa dngos po dang
T02D2663b-1:305a-7: rjes su mthun par bshad cing drang ba dang dngos
T02D2663b-1:305a-8: po med pa la chags pa rnams kyang de las
T02D2663b-1:305a-9: bzlog ste dngos po'i sgo nas drang ba'i phyir ro
T02D2663b-1:305a-10: // sangs rgyas mtshan ma mi mnga' ste //
T02D2663b-1:305a-11: zhes pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma mi mnga' ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:305a-12: chos kyi sku la rnam par bzhugs //
T02D2663b-1:305a-13: zhes pa ni de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T02D2663b-1:305a-14: mtshan ma mi mnga' bas dmigs su med pa ste
T02D2663b-1:305a-16: de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku'i
T02D2663b-1:305a-17: rang bzhin du gyur pa ni chos kyi sku la
T02D2663b-1:305a-18: rnam par bzhugs pa shes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:305a-19: gsang ba ba'i bdag po de la ji skad bstan
T02D2663b-1:305a-20: pa'i gnas gang yang rung bar sa gzhi rab tu
T02D2663b-1:305a-22: bdag nyed la na 'di skad du /
T02D2663b-1:305a-23: sems can chen po bu khyod legs //
T02D2663b-1:305a-24: dkyil 'khor myur du bris shig ces //
T02D2663b-1:305a-25: spro ba bskyed pa mthong yang rung //
T02D2663b-1:305a-26: zhes pa'i bar zhag bdun gyi sngon rol du snang ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:305a-27: mi snang ba la dkyil 'khor sa blang ste de
T02D2663b-1:305a-28: la snang ba ni rgyal po la sogs pi'i ma
T02D2663b-1:305a-29: rnams so // mi snang ba ni 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2663b-1:305a-30: lha dang gnod spyin dang sha za la sogs pa
T02D2663b-1:305a-31: rnams so // ste / lha la sogs pa la
T02D2663b-1:305a-32: ma blangs par dkyil 'khor bris na dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2663b-1:305a-33: lha khro bo la sogs pa'i zer gyis 'jig rten
T02D2663b-1:305a-34: pa'i lha de rnams la gnod par 'gyur te /
T02D2663b-1:305a-35: de ltar gnod par 'gyur na lha de dag sgrub pa la bgegs kyis skabs 'tshol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2663b-1:305a-36: gnyis su na de dag la gnod bzhin du dkyil
T02D2663b-1:305a-37: 'khor bris na sgrub pa po snying rje med par
T02D2663b-1:305a-38: 'gyur te / de bas na de dag gis sbyin
T02D2663b-1:305a-39: pa'i ched du sdar lha la sogs pa rnams sbran
T02D2663b-1:305a-40: zhing sa bslangs na lha la sogs pa de rnams
T02D2663b-1:305a-41: kyang bag byed cing de nas gzhan du 'dong ste
T02D2663b-1:305a-43: rgyal po la sogs pa mi rnams la yang sngar
T02D2663b-1:305a-44: sa sngar sa blangs na phyis brtsad pa mi 'gyur
T02D2663b-1:305b-0: pa'i phyir ro // der sdar bslangs @305b nas phyis
T02D2663b-1:305b-1: dkyil 'khor bri ba las zhag gsum gyi sngon rol
T02D2663b-1:305b-2: du ji skad du smos pa'i sa der ji ltar
T02D2663b-1:305b-3: rigs par brtags nas sa yongs su gzung ba'i rim
T02D2663b-1:305b-5: thog mar ba'i lci bas la ma lhung ba dang ba'i gcin du bsres pas dkyil 'khor bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:305b-6: de nas sa de sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:305b-7: de nas phyogs mtshams kun du bgegs bsal bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:305b-8: de'i 'og tu dri'i dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa gru bzhi rnams bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:305b-9: de nas sngags pa 'grengs te dkyil 'khor de'i dbus
T02D2663b-1:305b-10: kyi nam mkha' la sangs rgyas rnams bsam par bya
T02D2663b-1:305b-11: ste / de yang rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D2663b-1:305b-12: sdud par gyur pa dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya
T02D2663b-1:305b-14: sngags pa 'grengs te sangs rgyas lnga po rnams nam
T02D2663b-1:305b-15: mkha' la bsam pa ni mi gnas pa'i ston pa
T02D2663b-1:305b-17: de nas der dri dang me tog la sogs pas
T02D2663b-1:305b-18: mchod de sangs rgyas kyi spyan sdar 'phags pa mi
T02D2663b-1:305b-19: g-yo ba 'am / khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'am /
T02D2663b-1:305b-20: gang yang rung ba'i sngags kyis sa de yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:305b-21: des na sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa slob ma
T02D2663b-1:305b-22: rnams dkyil 'khor du gzud pa'i nub mo gshegs su
T02D2663b-1:305b-23: gsol lo // de nas sngags pa de nub phyogs
T02D2663b-1:305b-24: kyi ngos su nyal la byang chub kyi sems dang
T02D2663b-1:305b-25: snying rje dang ldan par bya ste rmi lam blta
T02D2663b-1:305b-26: gsol lo // bar bya'o // de yang rab 'bring gsum du shes par bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:305b-27: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthong ni rmi lam tha ma'o //
T02D2663b-1:305b-28: sangs rgyas rnams mthong na 'bring ngo //
T02D2663b-1:305b-29: sangs rgyas de rnams shin tu dgyes shing sngags pa
T02D2663b-1:305b-30: la bu khyod legs so dkyil 'khor myur du bris
T02D2663b-1:305b-31: shig ces bskul ma 'debs par mthong na rmi lam
T02D2663b-1:305b-33: 'di rnams rgyud nyid kyi nang nas zhib tu 'byung ste /
T02D2663b-1:305b-34: rgyud kyi nang na ltag 'og 'khrugs par 'byung bas
T02D2663b-1:305b-35: 'dir las su bya ba'i rim pa bzhin du bkod
T02D2663b-1:305b-36: do // de nas de yi phyi de'i nyin //
T02D2663b-1:305b-38: gcig gnyis bzhi las lhag kyang rung ;
T02D2663b-1:305b-39: dpyad mi dgos par gzung bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:305b-40: shes pa'i bar du slob ma rnams brtag pa ste //
T02D2663b-1:305b-41: de yang bye brag gi mtshan nyid dang rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02D2663b-1:305b-44: slob ma dang cing rigs btsun pa //
T02D2663b-1:306a-0: zhes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ji skad du @306a * //
T02D2663b-1:306a-1: bshad pa rnams ni bye brag gi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2663b-1:306a-2: rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'og nas 'chad la //
T02D2663b-1:306a-3: phal pa'i mtshan nyid de sngar ji skad du bshad pa dang grangs su bcad pa gzhan pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:306a-4: 'og nas 'on kyang slob dpon snying rje chen po
T02D2663b-1:306a-5: dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa
T02D2663b-1:306a-6: bsgral bar yi dam bca' ba kho nar bya ste
T02D2663b-1:306a-7: / des byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyur 'gyur bar
T02D2663b-1:306a-8: bya ba'i phyir sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs
T02D2663b-1:306a-9: su gzung bar bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no //
T02D2663b-1:306a-10: slob ma de rnams las kyang rgyud la sogs pa
T02D2663b-1:306a-11: la mkhas shing byang chub kyi sems goms pa ni
T02D2663b-1:306a-12: dkyil 'khor du bcug pa de nyid kyi tshe na
T02D2663b-1:306a-13: de slob dpon nam sgrub par dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D2663b-1:306a-14: // rgyud la sogs pa rnams la ni mkhas kyang
T02D2663b-1:306a-15: byang chub kyi sems ma bsgoms na byang chub kyi
T02D2663b-1:306a-16: sems sgom du bcug ste phyis dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D2663b-1:306a-17: // // de las gzhan snga nas kyang rgyud mi shes byang chub kyi sems kyang ma bsgoms //
T02D2663b-1:306a-18: phyis kyang rgyud shes par mi 'gyur la byang chub
T02D2663b-1:306a-19: kyi sems kyang sgom par mi 'gyur ba ni phal
T02D2663b-1:306a-20: pa ste / dus gnyis gar yang dbang mi bskur gyi //
T02D2663b-1:306a-21: byang chub kyi sa bon du 'gyur ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du gzud do //
T02D2663b-1:306a-23: slob ma dad cing rigs btsun pa //
T02D2663b-1:306a-24: zhes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang du
T02D2663b-1:306a-25: slob ma'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni bshad zin pas

T02D2663b-1:314b-8: gzhan zhig blangs nas dkyil 'khor phyi ma bri ba'i
T02D2663b-1:314b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran zhing //
T02D2663b-1:314b-11: shar phyogs bltas te bre bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:314b-12: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor mi 'khrul bar gtan la
T02D2663b-1:314b-13: dbab pa'i phyir dbus nas rgya gram du thig btab
T02D2663b-1:314b-14: ste dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bab par phur bus
T02D2663b-1:314b-15: btsugs la de nas srad bu de blta ba ste
T02D2663b-1:314b-16: dbus kyi phur bu la brtod la grva bzhi gtan
T02D2663b-1:314b-18: de ltar gtan la phab nas grva bzhi'i mtshan mar
T02D2663b-1:314b-19: yang phur bu bzhi gzugs srad bu yang mdud pa
T02D2663b-1:314b-20: mi por bar skud pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
T02D2663b-1:314b-21: gdags par bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran zhing //
T02D2663b-1:314b-22: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la byas nas zhas pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:314b-23: de nas lho phyogs song nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:314b-24: byang phyogs su ni bre bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:314b-25: zhes pa yang rgya gram nyid gdab pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:314b-26: blo can de nas slar log nas //
T02D2663b-1:314b-27: bden bral phyogs su gnas nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:314b-28: byang phyogs su ni bre bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:314b-29: zhes pa ni slob dpon de lho nub kyi mtshams
T02D2663b-1:314b-30: su 'dug nas kha byang phyogs su bltas te nub
T02D2663b-1:314b-31: kyi ngos su thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:314b-32: de nas g-yas su bsgyur bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:314b-33: bsgyur te de ru 'dug nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:314b-34: lho phyogs su ni bre bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:314b-35: zhes pa ni slob dpon lho nub kyi mtshams de
T02D2663b-1:314b-36: nyid du 'dug cing kha byang phyogs su bltas pa
T02D2663b-1:314b-37: las kha shar phyogs su bsgyur te srad bu 'dzin
T02D2663b-1:314b-38: pa'i grogs po dkyil 'khor bskor nas shar lho'i mtshams
T02D2663b-1:314b-39: su song ste lho phyogs kyi ngos su thig gdab
T02D2663b-1:314b-40: par bya'o // de nas gnas de btang nas su //
T02D2663b-1:314b-41: me yi phyogs su gnas nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:314b-42: sngags pa gsang sngags cho gar gnas //
T02D2663b-1:314b-43: shar du srad bu bre bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:314b-44: zhes pa ni slob dpon des lho nub kyi mtshams
T02D2663b-1:314b-45: de bor nas shar lho mtshams su 'dug ste shar
T02D2663b-1:315a-0: phyogs kyi ngos thig gdab par @315a * //
T02D2663b-1:315a-2: / sngags pa gsang sngags cho gar gnas //
T02D2663b-1:315a-3: zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2663b-1:315a-4: de nas de bzhin dbang ldan phyogs //
T02D2663b-1:315a-5: song nas nub tu kha bltas te //
T02D2663b-1:315a-6: rlung gi phyogs kyi bar du ni //
T02D2663b-1:315a-7: byang gi phyogs su bre bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:315a-8: zhes pa na slob dpon byang shar gyi mtshams su
T02D2663b-1:315a-9: 'dug nas byang phyogs kyi ngos thig gdab bar bya'o
T02D2663b-1:315a-10: // sngags pa yis ni de lta bur //
T02D2663b-1:315a-11: kun nas grva bzhi lham par bya //
T02D2663b-1:315a-12: zhes pa ni de ltar gong du gsungs pa'i mtshan
T02D2663b-1:315a-13: nyid kyis dkyil 'khor de kun nas gru bzhir bya'o
T02D2663b-1:315a-14: zhes pa'o // de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab
T02D2663b-1:315a-15: pa na thog mar nub phyogs dang de nas lho
T02D2663b-1:315a-16: zhes pa'o // phyogs dang / de'i 'og tu shar
T02D2663b-1:315a-17: phyogs dang de nas byang phyogs su bya ba ci
T02D2663b-1:315a-19: nub phyogs kyi ngos ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su brtags la /
T02D2663b-1:315a-20: lho phyogs ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su
T02D2663b-1:315a-21: brtags shing shar phyogs ni me long lta bu'i ye
T02D2663b-1:315a-22: shes su brtags la byang phyogs ni bya ba sgrub
T02D2663b-1:315a-23: pa'i ye shes su brtags te de bas na thog
T02D2663b-1:315a-24: mar so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su 'gyur la
T02D2663b-1:315a-25: de rdzogs pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
T02D2663b-1:315a-27: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las me long lta bu'i ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur la /
T02D2663b-1:315a-28: me long lta bu'i ye shes las lus dang longs
T02D2663b-1:315a-29: spyod dang gnas kyi mtshan nyid bya ba sgrub pa'i
T02D2663b-1:315a-30: ye shes 'byung ste de bas na rim pa de
T02D2663b-1:315a-31: ltar smos so // ye shes bzhi'i dmigs pa'i yul yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:315a-32: de bas na srad bu rgya gram du bres pa'i
T02D2663b-1:315a-33: ri mo ngos bzhi nas re re 'byung ba ni
T02D2663b-1:315a-35: rgya gram gcig tu 'dus pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2663b-1:315a-36: de ltar thig btab ste sa bcad nas tshon sna
T02D2663b-1:315a-37: gcig pa'i skud pa gcig chal la bsgres te ngos
T02D2663b-1:315a-38: kyi ri mo ma byi bar gsal bar bya ba'i
T02D2663b-1:315a-39: phyir gdab po / de nas dbus su zhugs nas su //
T02D2663b-1:315a-40: de la cha ni gsum du btag / ces pa
T02D2663b-1:315a-41: ni slob dpon dkyil 'khor de'i nang du zhugs nas
T02D2663b-1:315a-42: snam bu gsum du bcad de /
T02D2663b-1:315a-43: snam bu gsum pa de las cha bzhir bgos te cha re re yang ngos re rer sbyar ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:315a-44: de bzhin du snam bu gnyis la yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:315b-0: snam bu gsum @315b du bya ba ni //
T02D2663b-1:315b-1: sa rnams thams cad kun du yang //
T02D2663b-1:315b-2: cha gsum dag tu brtags nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:315b-3: zhes pas de ltar dkyil 'khor de kho ra khor yug tu rim pa gsum du bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:315b-4: cha rnams kyang ni re re la //
T02D2663b-1:315b-5: cha gsum du ni rab tu brtag / ces pa
T02D2663b-1:315b-6: ni snam bu gsum pa re re la yang cha
T02D2663b-1:315b-7: gsum du bgos pa la cha gcig ni bskor ba'i
T02D2663b-1:315b-8: snam bur bzhag cha gnyis ni lha rnams kyi gnas
T02D2663b-1:315b-9: su bya ba ste de bas na /
T02D2663b-1:315b-10: cha gcig gis ni bskor ba yis //
T02D2663b-1:315b-11: 'khor sar byas te lhag pa yi //
T02D2663b-1:315b-12: cha gnyis po ni lha nyid yi //
T02D2663b-1:315b-13: gnas su nges par bya ba yin //
T02D2663b-1:315b-14: zhes gsungs pa yin te de dag ni snam bu'i dbye ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:315b-15: blo dang ldan pas phyogs bzhi ru //
T02D2663b-1:315b-16: so so'i phyogs char sgo khyud ni //
T02D2663b-1:315b-17: sdom brtson can gyis nan tan du //
T02D2663b-1:315b-18: lha rnams gtso bo'i gnas su bya //
T02D2663b-1:315b-19: zhes pa ni sgo khyud rnams rnam par dbye ba
T02D2663b-1:315b-20: ste sgo khyud de rnams kyi tshad kyang dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-1:315b-21: snam bu'i dgu cha gcig tu brtag go /
T02D2663b-1:315b-22: nang gi snying po'i dkyil gyi sgo khyud rnams las
T02D2663b-1:315b-23: shar phyogs kyi sgo khyud kyi nang du chos kyi
T02D2663b-1:315b-24: sku'i phyag rgya gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:315b-25: byang phyogs kyi nang du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
T02D2663b-1:315b-26: po bzhag la lho phyogs kyi nang du phyag na
T02D2663b-1:315b-28: de'i phyir rim gyi sgo khyud rnams las shar phyogs
T02D2663b-1:315b-29: kyi sgo khyud kyi nang du sh'akya thub pa sprul
T02D2663b-1:315b-30: pa'i sku bzhag cing lho phyogs kyi nang du gshin
T02D2663b-1:315b-31: rje bzhag la byang phyogs kyi nang du dbang po
T02D2663b-1:315b-32: bzhag ste gshin rje dang dbang po la sogs pa
T02D2663b-1:315b-33: de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor bar ma'i snam bu la
T02D2663b-1:315b-34: sgo khyud kyi nang du 'dug pa yang bcom ldan
T02D2663b-1:315b-35: 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku nyid du rig par bya
T02D2663b-1:315b-36: ste / gshin rje la sogs pas 'dul ba'i sems
T02D2663b-1:315b-37: can rnams gdul ba'i phyir yi dags rnams kyi rgyal
T02D2663b-1:315b-38: po gshin rje'i gzugs gtso bor byas nas sgo khyud
T02D2663b-1:315b-39: ste / na gnas so // dbang po yang lha
T02D2663b-1:315b-40: rnams kyi rgyal po ste gtso bor bya zhing sgo
T02D2663b-1:315b-42: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa yang mi rnams kyi gtso bor gyur cing sgo khyud na bzhugs so //
T02D2663b-1:315b-43: snying po'i dkyil 'khor gzhugs [*gzhug] pa'i gtso bo rnams
T02D2663b-1:315b-44: ni ye shes bzhi'i rang bzhin du shes par bya
T02D2663b-1:315b-45: ste bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par
T02D2663b-1:315b-46: byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid dbus na bzhugs pa ni
T02D2663b-1:315b-47: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no
T02D2663b-1:316a-1: kyi sku'i phyag rgya shar na gnas pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2663b-1:316a-2: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang phyogs na gnas
T02D2663b-1:316a-3: pa ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D2663b-1:316a-5: phyag na rdo rje lho phyogs na gnas pa ni
T02D2663b-1:316a-6: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du
T02D2663b-1:316a-7: rig par bya'o // dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu gsum
T02D2663b-1:316a-8: pa la shar phyogs kyi sgo khyud kyi nang na
T02D2663b-1:316a-9: 'phags pa 'jam dbyangs gtso bo'i gzugs su bzhugs so
T02D2663b-1:316a-10: rig par bya'o // // lho phyogs kyi sgo khyud
T02D2663b-1:316a-11: na byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam
T02D2663b-1:316a-13: de bzhin du nub dang byar na yang nam mkha'i
T02D2663b-1:316a-14: snying po dang sa'i snying po dag gtso bo'i gzugs
T02D2663b-1:316a-15: kyis sgo khyud na bzhugs par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:316a-16: de ltar rim par legs phye ba //
T02D2663b-1:316a-17: 'di dag thams cad byas nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:316a-18: zhes pa gang du smos pa ltar dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu bgo ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:316a-19: sgo khyud rnams rnam par dbye ba dang sgo khyud rnams su lha gtso bo rnams /
T02D2663b-1:316a-20: shin du bye brag phyed pas dgod //
T02D2663b-1:316a-22: dbus su padma dkar po mchog / de ni snying po zhes su bsgrags //
T02D2663b-1:316a-24: des ni snying po can du byas //
T02D2663b-1:316a-25: zhes pa ni dbus kyi padma dkar po ni bcom
T02D2663b-1:316a-26: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu bsod nams
T02D2663b-1:316a-28: dkar ba ni tshogs de nyid rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:316a-29: snying po ni 'byung ba'i gnas te bsod nams kyi
T02D2663b-1:316a-30: tshogs de bcom ldan 'das kyi snying rje chen po'i
T02D2663b-1:316a-31: bdag nyid 'byung ba'i gnas yin la /
T02D2663b-1:316a-32: snying rje chen po de las dkyil 'khor 'di 'byung ste /
T02D2663b-1:316a-33: des ni snying po can du byas //
T02D2663b-1:316a-35: de yi tshad kyang sor bcu drug / yan chad du ni bshad pa yin //
T02D2663b-1:316a-36: zhes pa ni dbus kyi padma'i tshad sor bcu drug ste /
T02D2663b-1:316a-37: yan chad du zhes pa ni de las lhag par byas kyang rung zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:316a-38: de'i dgos pa yang 'di lta ste /
T02D2663b-1:316a-39: bcu drug ni sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa yin la /
T02D2663b-1:316a-40: yan chad du ni zhes pa de dag las lhag
T02D2663b-1:316a-41: pa kun du bzang po'i sa la sogs pa dang
T02D2663b-1:316a-42: ldan pa zhes pa ste mdor na padma de bcom
T02D2663b-1:316a-43: ldan 'das kyi rgyu bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
T02D2663b-1:316b-0: tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshon @316b par byed pa
T02D2663b-1:316b-2: 'dab ma brgyad pa legs par rdzogs //
T02D2663b-1:316b-3: zhes pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs de ye shes
T02D2663b-1:316b-4: brgyad dang ldan pas 'dab ma brgyad du gsungs so
T02D2663b-1:316b-5: // de la ye shes brgyad ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang //
T02D2663b-1:316b-6: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang so sor rtog
T02D2663b-1:316b-7: pa'i ye shes dang bya ba grub pa'i ye shes
T02D2663b-1:316b-8: ni sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa lngar 'gyur pas
T02D2663b-1:316b-9: rnam pa lngar phye ste ye shes rnam pa de
T02D2663b-1:316b-10: brgyad dang ldan pas 'dab ma brgyad du gyes pa'o
T02D2663b-1:316b-11: // ye shes rnams kyang chos thams cad dmigs su
T02D2663b-1:316b-12: med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa ste de ltar
T02D2663b-1:316b-13: thams cad dmigs su med par rtogs pas sbyin par
T02D2663b-1:316b-14: bya ba dang sbyin pa'i dngos po dang sbyin par
T02D2663b-1:316b-15: byed pa gsum char yang dmigs su med par rtogs
T02D2663b-1:316b-16: // so // de bas na sbyin pa la sogs
T02D2663b-1:316b-17: pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ye shes de lta
T02D2663b-1:316b-18: bu dang ldan pas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i
T02D2663b-1:316b-19: rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:316b-20: ze bar ldan la shin tu bzang //
T02D2663b-1:316b-21: zhes pa ze ba rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D2663b-1:316b-22: 'das kyi rgyu'i yon tan ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs
T02D2663b-1:316b-23: dang rnam par thar pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:316b-24: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan mar
T02D2663b-1:316b-25: brtags pa yin la bsod nams kyi tshogs de yon
T02D2663b-1:316b-26: tan de rnams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:316b-27: 'dab ma'i bar ni thams cad du //
T02D2663b-1:316b-28: kun nas rdo rje bri bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:316b-29: zhes pa ni rdo rje ni ye shes kyi mtshan
T02D2663b-1:316b-30: ma ste gong du bshad pa'i ye shes brgyad po
T02D2663b-1:316b-31: de dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:316b-32: de yi snying po'i dbus su ni //
T02D2663b-1:316b-33: rgyal mchog gtso bo zhes pa bcom ldan 'das mngon
T02D2663b-1:316b-34: par byang chub pa'i rang bzhin padma'i snying po'i steng
T02D2663b-1:316b-35: du bri ba'o // rgyal mchog gtso bo zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:316b-36: ni bdud rnams las rgyal ba ste de rnams kyi
T02D2663b-1:316b-37: nang na yang mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:316b-38: gser gyi mdog /'bar bcas thor tshugs dbu rgyan can //
T02D2663b-1:316b-39: 'od zer dag gis kun nas bskor //
T02D2663b-1:316b-40: mgon po nad dang bral ba ni //
T02D2663b-1:316b-41: ting nge 'dzin du gnas par bri //
T02D2663b-1:316b-42: zhes pa la 'bar bcas ni 'bar zhing sreg pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2663b-1:316b-43: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa sreg pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:316b-44: gser gyi mdog ni rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663b-1:317a-1: gnas na bzhugs pa yin te 'og min gyi lha rnams ni thor tshugs dang bcas pa yin la /
T02D2663b-1:317a-2: de dag dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir thor tshugs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:317a-3: dbu rgyan can zhes pa ni chos kyi rgyal po'am
T02D2663b-1:317a-4: dbang por dbang bskur bas rin po che'i cod pan
T02D2663b-1:317a-5: gsol ba'o // 'od zer dag gis kun nas bskor //
T02D2663b-1:317a-6: zhes pa ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2663b-1:317a-7: rang bzhin gyi 'od dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'phro
T02D2663b-1:317a-8: ba rnams kyis bskor zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:317a-9: nad dang bral ba zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gdon dang bral ba'o /
T02D2663b-1:317a-10: ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa zhes pa ni so
T02D2663b-1:317a-11: so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes las mi g-yo
T02D2663b-1:317a-12: zhing rtse gcig tu gnas la gzugs kyang ting nge
T02D2663b-1:317a-14: de yi shar du blo ldan gyis //
T02D2663b-1:317a-15: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya ne //
T02D2663b-1:317a-16: gru gsum thams cad dkar po nyid //
T02D2663b-1:317a-17: padma'i steng gnas khor yug tu //
T02D2663b-1:317a-18: 'od zer dkar pos yongs bskor ba //
T02D2663b-1:317a-19: rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:317a-20: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663b-1:317a-21: kyi shar phyogs su sngon mngon par sangs rgyas pa
T02D2663b-1:317a-22: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag rgya gru
T02D2663b-1:317a-23: gsum pa'i mtshan nyid du bri ste shar phyogs su
T02D2663b-1:317a-24: gzhag pa ni rgya gar gyi skad du shar la
T02D2663b-1:317a-25: p'u rba zhes bya ba la /
T02D2663b-1:317a-26: 'das pa la yang p'urba zhes bya ste de bas
T02D2663b-1:317a-27: na sngon 'das pa'o zhes gleng ba'i phyir shar phyogs
T02D2663b-1:317a-28: su gzhag go // padma'i steng du gru gsum bri
T02D2663b-1:317a-29: ba ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
T02D2663b-1:317a-30: dang smon pa med pa ste rnam par thar pa'i
T02D2663b-1:317a-31: sgo gsum yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2663b-1:317a-32: phyag rgya de'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D2663b-1:317a-33: dgod pa dang grva gnyis nas 'od gnyis 'byung bar
T02D2663b-1:317a-34: bya'o zhes gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'byung ba la
T02D2663b-1:317a-35: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dgod pa ni ye shes
T02D2663b-1:317a-36: lnga'i mtshan ma'o // 'od gnyis 'byung ba bya ba ni phyag rgya de chos sku'i mtshan nyid do //

T02D2663b-1:317b-1: rgya de nyid dkar por bya ste yongs su dag

T02D2663b-1:317b-13: rnams te shes rab de las byung bas na de
T02D2663b-1:317b-14: skyob pa rnams kyi yum mo //

T02D2663b-1:317b-16: sgrib pa sreg pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'bar ba dang
T02D2663b-1:317b-17: bcas pa'o // gser mdog can ni rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no //

T02D2663b-1:317b-27: mgon po yi ni byang phyogs su //

T02D2663b-1:318a-8: // dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra //

T02D2663b-1:318a-37: sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed ba'i gzugs su
