T02D2663b-1:320a-20: thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid bzhin
T02D2663b-1:320a-21: gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i phyir yid bzhin nor
T02D2663b-1:320a-23: yang na phyag rgya nyid yid bzhin nor bu lta bur bri zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:320a-24: padma dkar la 'dug pa ni bsod nams dang ye
T02D2663b-1:320a-25: shes kyi tshogs rnam par dkar ba las byung ba'o
T02D2663b-1:320a-26: // mgon po rnam snang mdzad chen gyis //
T02D2663b-1:320a-27: lho yi phyogs su do rje 'dzin //
T02D2663b-1:320a-28: re ba thams cad skong byed pa //
T02D2663b-1:320a-29: mdog ni pri yang ku lta bur //
T02D2663b-1:320a-30: ljang ser ram ni margad ltar //
T02D2663b-1:320a-31: sngo bsangs mgon po dbu rgyan can //
T02D2663b-1:320a-32: sems dpa' chen po rgyan kun gyis //
T02D2663b-1:320a-33: rnam par brgyan zhing mtha' yas bar //
T02D2663b-1:320a-34: 'jug pa rgya chen rdo rjer bcas //
T02D2663b-1:320a-35: 'od zer dag gis bskor bar bri //
T02D2663b-1:320a-36: zhes pa ni phyag rgya rdo rje'i khyad par te
T02D2663b-1:320a-37: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lho phyogs
T02D2663b-1:320a-38: su bri ste de yang bya ba grub pa'i ye
T02D2663b-1:320a-40: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon phyogs su bri ba ni
T02D2663b-1:320a-41: rgyan sna tshogs kyi brgyan la 'gying ba'i tshul du
T02D2663b-1:320a-42: gnas pas bcom ldan 'das zhi ba dang rjes su
T02D2663b-1:320a-43: mthun pa'i phyir g-yon du bri ba yin no //
T02D2663b-1:320a-44: re ba thams cad skong byed pa //
T02D2663b-1:320a-45: zhes pa ni sems can gyi don byed pa la
T02D2663b-1:320a-46: nan tan byed pas na sems can thams cad kyi
T02D2663b-1:320b-0: bsam pa yongs @320b su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:320b-1: mtha' yas 'jug pa rgya chen zhes pa ni sems
T02D2663b-1:320b-2: can gyi don du mtha' yas par rgyu ba ste
T02D2663b-1:320b-3: de yang rgya che ba'i rgyu'o //
T02D2663b-1:320b-4: rdo rjer bcas zhes pa ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:320b-5: 'od gzer dag gis bskor ba ni ye shes kyi 'od 'phro bas bskor ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:320b-6: de yi g-yas su lha mo'i ming //
T02D2663b-1:320b-7: m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba de //
T02D2663b-1:320b-8: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
T02D2663b-1:320b-9: lag na rdo rje thogs par bri //
T02D2663b-1:320b-10: zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i yum bya ba
T02D2663b-1:320b-11: grub pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi
T02D2663b-1:320b-12: pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663b-1:320b-13: m'a ma ka zhes pa la m'a ma ka ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D2663b-1:320b-14: m'a ma k'i mo yin pas m'a ma k'i zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:320b-15: phyag na rdo rje ji ltar m'a ma ka yin zhe na /
T02D2663b-1:320b-16: gdug pa dang ma rungs pa rnams gdug pa'i bya
T02D2663b-1:320b-17: ba byed pa na ma byed ma byed ces 'gog
T02D2663b-1:320b-18: pa ste ma byed pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:320b-19: ma byed pa de'i yum yin pas na ma byed ma zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:320b-20: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan zhes pa ni rgyan rnams
T02D2663b-1:320b-21: la rdo rje'i mtshan mas btab pa ste rdo rje
T02D2663b-1:320b-23: rdo rje thogs pa ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin
T02D2663b-1:320b-24: gyi phyag rgya rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'chang ba'o
T02D2663b-1:320b-25: // de yi 'og tu lha mo ni //
T02D2663b-1:320b-26: rdo rje rtse mo stobs chen de //
T02D2663b-1:320b-27: pho nya rnams kyis yongs bskor zhing //
T02D2663b-1:320b-28: bzhin ni bag tsam 'dzum par bri //
T02D2663b-1:320b-29: zhes pa ni yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2663b-1:320b-30: phyin pa de'i bar chad med pa'i lam gyi rang
T02D2663b-1:320b-31: bzhin yin pas de'i 'og tu bri ba ste rdo
T02D2663b-1:320b-32: rje rtse mo zhes pa ni chos nyid la 'bigs
T02D2663b-1:320b-33: par byed pa'i dang tshul can no //
T02D2663b-1:320b-34: stobs chen zhes pa ni de'i yon tan no //
T02D2663b-1:320b-35: pho nya rnams kyis yongs bskor zhing //
T02D2663b-1:320b-36: zhes pa ni bar chad med pa'i lam gyi yan lag rnams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:320b-37: yang na rgyal po'i 'khor yin pas na mang ga gzhug la sogs pa sring pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:320b-38: bzhin bag tsam 'dzum pa ni ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2663b-1:320b-39: ma bzhugs par sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir
T02D2663b-1:320b-40: ro // g-yon rol du ni sngags pa yis //
T02D2663b-1:320b-41: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ces bya //
T02D2663b-1:320b-42: lag na rdo rje lu gu rgyud //
T02D2663b-1:320b-43: rang gi pho nya rnams kyis bskor //
T02D2663b-1:320b-44: pri yang ku ltar ljang ser mdog / rdo rje'i mtshan mas legs mtshan bri //
T02D2663b-1:320b-45: zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i g-yon du rdo
T02D2663b-1:320b-46: rje lu gu rgyud ces pa ni bri ba ste
T02D2663b-1:320b-47: / lu gu rgyud ma ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin yin la //
T02D2663b-1:321a-1: 'dren cing 'dzud par byed pa'i mtshan ma can no //
T02D2663b-1:321a-2: yang na rgyal po'i 'khor gyi phul yin pas gdug
T02D2663b-1:321a-3: pa dang ma rungs pa rnams gzung zhing 'dogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:321a-4: mtshan nyid do // rang gi pho nya rnams kyis bskor //
T02D2663b-1:321a-5: zhes pa ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma de
T02D2663b-1:321a-6: nyid kyi 'khor mang ga gzhug pa la sogs pa
T02D2663b-1:321a-8: rdo rje mtshan mas legs mtshan bri //
T02D2663b-1:321a-9: zhes pa ni rgyan rnams la rdo rje'i mtshan mas btab pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:321a-10: lag na rdo rje'i 'og logs su //
T02D2663b-1:321a-14: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni bya ba grub pa'i ye
T02D2663b-1:321a-15: shes phyag na rdo rje'i bar chad med pa'i lam
T02D2663b-1:321a-16: gyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa khro bo zla gtso
T02D2663b-1:321a-17: zhes bya ba'i khyad par te 'og logs su bri
T02D2663b-1:321a-18: ba ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor
T02D2663b-1:321a-19: ba bar chad med pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin yin
T02D2663b-1:321a-20: pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis ram phyin
T02D2663b-1:321a-22: de ni zla ba thig le 'am zla gtso zhes
T02D2663b-1:321a-23: bya ste zla ba ltar yongs su dag cing sems
T02D2663b-1:321a-24: can thams cad kyi rgyud tshim par byed pa'i rang
T02D2663b-1:321a-25: bzhin no // thig le ni thig le'u mtshan ma dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:321a-26: yang na rgya gar skad du ti la ka zhes pa gtso bo'i rnam pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:321a-27: bgegs chen dgra ni zhi byed pa //
T02D2663b-1:321a-28: zhes pa ni lha dang gnod spyin las gyur pa'i
T02D2663b-1:321a-29: bgegs rnams dang mi la sogs pa'i dgra sel bar
T02D2663b-1:321a-30: byed pa'o // khro bo 'jig rten gsum du grags //
T02D2663b-1:321a-31: zhes pa ni yon tan gyis 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:321a-32: mig gsum pa ni ye shes kyi spyan lhag par mnga' ba 'am /
T02D2663b-1:321a-34: mche ba bzhi pa ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan
T02D2663b-1:321a-35: ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang rang
T02D2663b-1:321a-36: bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thang ba'i sgo
T02D2663b-1:321a-37: dang ldan pa'o // kha dog dbyar gyi sprin 'dra ba //
T02D2663b-1:321a-38: zhes pa ni dbyar gyi sprin la rlung dang char
T02D2663b-1:321a-39: par bcas pa'i bag gnas pas de dang 'dra bar
T02D2663b-1:321a-40: las thams cad byed pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663b-1:321a-41: rab tu dgod pa'i sgra yang 'byin //
T02D2663b-1:321a-42: zhes pa ni gad mo'i sgras thams cad 'gengs shing gnod par 'gyur ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:321a-43: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D2663b-1:321a-44: zhes pa ni rgyan rnams la rdo rje'i mtshan mas btab pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:321a-45: 'khor ni mtha' yas khro bo yi //
T02D2663b-1:321a-46: dbang phyug rnams kyis yangs bskor ba //
T02D2663b-1:321b-0: @321b zhes pa ni 'khor phal pa dang khro bo grangs med pas bskor ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:321b-1: lag pa stong phrag brgya dag ni //
T02D2663b-1:321b-2: zhes pa lam gyi yan lag brgya stang du mas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam la 'dzud pa'am /
T02D2663b-1:321b-3: yan lag de rnams kyis lam gyi sgrib pa mang po sel ba'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663b-1:321b-4: mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing gdengs //
T02D2663b-1:321b-5: zhes pa ni lam gyi yan lag gi yon tan
T02D2663b-1:321b-6: de rnams rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshon char gyur
T02D2663b-1:321b-7: pa'o // khro bo chen po 'di 'dra ba //
T02D2663b-1:321b-9: zhes pa ni gong du smos pa'i tshul du bri
T02D2663b-1:321b-10: ba ste 'khor dang yan lag mang po rnams ni
T02D2663b-1:321b-11: yid kyis bsam par bya ste nyung zad ci 'os
T02D2663b-1:321b-13: de yi nub tu song nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:321b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa mang po dag / lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs //
T02D2663b-1:321b-15: kha dog sna tshogs stobs po che //
T02D2663b-1:321b-16: 'od gzer dag gis yongs bskor ba //
T02D2663b-1:321b-17: sems can kun don byed pa bri //
T02D2663b-1:321b-18: zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i 'khor rdo rje
T02D2663b-1:321b-19: 'dzin pa rnams bri ba ste ming dang cha lugs
T02D2663b-1:321b-20: dag ni gsang ba'i dkyel 'khor las 'byung ba dang
T02D2663b-1:321b-21: sbyar bar bya'o // gsang sngags mgon po'i 'og logs su //
T02D2663b-1:321b-22: bden bral gyi ni phyogs kyi char //
T02D2663b-1:321b-23: mi g-yo zhes bya lag na ni //
T02D2663b-1:321b-24: ral gri zhags pa legs par thogs //
T02D2663b-1:321b-25: zur phud spyi bo'i g-yon du 'chang //
T02D2663b-1:321b-26: rab tu brgyan zhing mig gcig yo //
T02D2663b-1:321b-27: rang gi 'od kyi nang na gnas //
T02D2663b-1:321b-28: khro dang bcas pa brag la 'dug / bzhin ni khro gnyer rab tu bsnyer //
T02D2663b-1:321b-29: byis pa'i gzugs can mkhrang bag bri //
T02D2663b-1:321b-30: zhes pa'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2663b-1:321b-31: mdzad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar chad
T02D2663b-1:321b-32: med pa'i lam du gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2663b-1:321b-33: 'og ma zad du 'phags pa mi g-yo mgon bri
T02D2663b-1:321b-34: ba'i bye brag gsungs pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:321b-35: lag na ral gri thogs pa ni shes bya dang
T02D2663b-1:321b-36: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa gcod pa'i shes rab kyi
T02D2663b-1:321b-37: mtshan nyid do // zhags pa ni lam gyi mtshan
T02D2663b-1:321b-38: nyid de lam der sems can thams cad 'dren cing
T02D2663b-1:321b-39: mtshan nyid do // 'dzud pa'o // mig gcig yo
T02D2663b-1:321b-40: ba ni bar chad med pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin
T02D2663b-1:321b-41: yin pas chos kyi dbyings rnam pa thams cad ma
T02D2663b-1:321b-42: rtogs shing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su
T02D2663b-1:321b-44: rang gi 'od kyi nang na gnas //
T02D2663b-1:322a-1: sgrib pa sel ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:322a-2: mkhrang bag phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub
T02D2663b-1:322a-3: pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin yin pas brtan zhing mi
T02D2663b-1:322a-4: 'gyur ba'o // gzhon nu'i gzugs ni bar chad med
T02D2663b-1:322a-5: pa'i lam la dang por zhugs pas lam rgyas pa'i
T02D2663b-1:322a-6: mtshan ma ste de bas na bar chad med pa'i
T02D2663b-1:322a-7: lam rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal
T02D2663b-1:322a-8: ba rlung gi phyogs su gzhag go //
T02D2663b-1:322a-9: bris nas blo ldan rlung phyogs su //
T02D2663b-1:322a-11: zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnas pa //
T02D2663b-1:322a-12: nan tan du ni bri bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:322a-13: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2663b-1:322a-14: snang mdzad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar
T02D2663b-1:322a-15: chad med pa'i lam rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin khams gsum
T02D2663b-1:322a-16: rnam par rgyal ba bri ba'i bye brag gsungs pa
T02D2663b-1:322a-17: ste / zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnas zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:322a-18: ni zad pa'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba med
T02D2663b-1:322a-19: pas de mun nag tu gyur te khro bo de'i
T02D2663b-1:322a-20: kha dog mun pa dang 'dra ba nag por bri
T02D2663b-1:322a-22: de ltar nang du bri ba ni ;
T02D2663b-1:322a-23: / rgyas dang bcas par bshad pa yin //
T02D2663b-1:322a-24: zhes pa ni snying po'i dkyil 'khor du sku mi
T02D2663b-1:322a-25: zad pa la sogs pa'i rgyan rang bzhin gyi dkyil
T02D2663b-1:322a-26: 'khor rnams sdud par byed pa ye shes lnga'i mtshan
T02D2663b-1:322a-27: ma rnams 'khor dang bcas par bshad ces pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:322a-28: da ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i snam bu la sku
T02D2663b-1:322a-29: mi zad pa'i rgyan sdud par byed pa sprul pa'i
T02D2663b-1:322a-31: dbang po dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i tshul du
T02D2663b-1:322a-32: bstan pa rnams 'khor dang bcas par bri ba bshad
T02D2663b-1:322a-33: par bya ste / de nas sngags pa phyir byung nas //
T02D2663b-1:322a-34: nges par gnyis pa'i cha dag la //
T02D2663b-1:322a-35: shar gyi phyogs kyi nang du ni //
T02D2663b-1:322a-36: cha ni gnyis su phye ba la //
T02D2663b-1:322a-37: sgo khyud kyi ni nang rol du //
T02D2663b-1:322a-38: sngags pas rgyal ba sh'akya thub //
T02D2663b-1:322a-39: gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas //
T02D2663b-1:322a-40: mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan //
T02D2663b-1:322a-41: mgon po na bza' dur smrig mnabs //
T02D2663b-1:322a-42: khyab bdag bstan pa'i don mdzad pa //
T02D2663b-1:322a-43: padma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2663b-1:322a-44: chos 'chad tshul du bzhugs par bri //
T02D2663b-1:322a-45: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor rim pa gnyis pa'i shar
T02D2663b-1:322a-46: gyi ngos cha gnyis su bgos pa'i dbus su bab
T02D2663b-1:322a-47: pa'i sgo khyud kyi nang du bcom ldan 'das sh'akya
T02D2663b-1:322a-49: sh'akya thub pa zhes pa ni sh'akya'i rigs las byung
T02D2663b-1:322a-50: zhing lus dang ngag dang yid gsum thub pa'i ngang
T02D2663b-1:322b-1: / shar phyogs su bri ba ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-1:322b-2: rnam par snang mdzad pas sngar byang chub kyi shing
T02D2663b-1:322b-3: drung du mngon par byang chub par bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:322b-4: gser gyi kha dog ni rgyas pa'i mtshan ma ste
T02D2663b-1:322b-5: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgyas pa'i rang
T02D2663b-1:322b-7: 'bar dang bcas pa ni kun du sangs rgyas pas
T02D2663b-1:322b-8: sgrib pa sreg pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes dang
T02D2663b-1:322b-9: ldan pa'o // mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan //
T02D2663b-1:322b-10: zhes pa ni spyi gtsug ba ltar mi mngon pa
T02D2663b-1:322b-11: la sogs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gzhung las
T02D2663b-1:322b-13: na bza' ngur smrig mnabs pa ni 'khor ba la
T02D2663b-1:322b-14: ma chags pa dang snying rje'i dbang gis sems can
T02D2663b-1:322b-15: la chags par bstan pa ste chos gos tshon can
T02D2663b-1:322b-16: gyis ni snying rjes sems can la chags par bstan
T02D2663b-1:322b-17: pa yin la / dmar po 'ba' zhig par mi
T02D2663b-1:322b-18: gsal bar dur smrig tu gyur pa ni 'khor ba
T02D2663b-1:322b-19: la ma chags par bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:322b-20: khyab bdag bstan pa'i don mdzad pa //
T02D2663b-1:322b-21: zhes pa ni 'khor rnams la slob cing ston pa'i don byed pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:322b-22: padma dkar po'i gdan ni bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs
T02D2663b-1:322b-23: su dag pa'i mtshan ma ste snga ma bzhin no
T02D2663b-1:322b-24: // chos 'chad tshul du bzhugs pa ni gzhung las grags pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:322b-25: de yig yas su lha mo ni //
T02D2663b-1:322b-26: sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba ste //
T02D2663b-1:322b-27: lha mo cung zad 'dzum pa'i zhal //
T02D2663b-1:322b-29: mtshungs med sku ni rab tu dangs //
T02D2663b-1:322b-30: de ni sh'akya thub pa'i yum //
T02D2663b-1:322b-31: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yum gyi gzugs su
T02D2663b-1:322b-32: gyur pa ni sh'akya thub pa'i g-yas rol gyi byang
T02D2663b-1:322b-34: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa shes rab de las byung ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yum zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:322b-35: sangs rgyas spyan zhes pa ni gzigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas shes rab la bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:322b-36: cung zad 'dzum pa'i zhal zhes pa cung zad ni
T02D2663b-1:322b-37: shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag pa'o
T02D2663b-1:322b-38: // cung zad 'dzum pa ni chos ston pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663b-1:322b-39: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba ni kun du
T02D2663b-1:322b-40: sangs rgyas pa la shes bya dang nyon mongs pa
T02D2663b-1:322b-41: sreg pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:322b-42: mtshungs med ni rnam pa med pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2663b-1:322b-43: rang bzhin yin pas tshad 'di tsam mo zhes gzung
T02D2663b-1:322b-45: de yi g-yas su lha mo ni //
T02D2663b-1:322b-46: rig sngags mdzod spu zhes grags pa //

T02D2663b-1:334a-5: kyi rten la yungs kar gyi 'bras bu mi chags
T02D2663b-1:334a-6: pa dang 'dra ste brtag mi bzod pas rgyu dang
T02D2663b-1:334a-7: 'bras bu dngos po med par rtogs so //
T02D2663b-1:334a-8: brjod du med pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas pa
T02D2663b-1:334a-9: rnams ni chos thams cad brjod du med do snyam
T02D2663b-1:334a-10: pa'i ye shes 'jug ste zhes pa ni de ltar
T02D2663b-1:334a-11: chos rnams yod pa ma yi pas tshig gi brjod
T02D2663b-1:334a-12: du med par mthong pa'i ye shes skyes nas tshig
T02D2663b-1:334a-13: tu brjod pa yag 'gog par byed de de bas
T02D2663b-1:334a-14: na chod thams cad brjod du med do snyam pa'i
T02D2663b-1:334a-15: ye shes 'jug ste dag shin tu 'gog pa'i ting
T02D2663b-1:334a-16: nge 'dzin la yang dag par reg par byed ce
T02D2663b-1:334a-18: mdor na 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas rnams rgyu dang
T02D2663b-1:334a-19: 'bras bu'i dngos po bshig nas rang bzhin med par
T02D2663b-1:334a-20: mthong bas chos la bdag med par rtogs kyang ngag
T02D2663b-1:334a-21: dgag pa tsam la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-1:334a-22: ltar rnam pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba
T02D2663b-1:334a-24: nyan thos ltar gnag zag la bdag med par rtogs pa tsam yang ma yin no //
T02D2663b-1:334a-25: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang 'jig rten pa rnams rgyu las 'bras bu dang las 'byung ba'am /
T02D2663b-1:334a-26: ldog par rtogs shing gzhan gyi dbang gis stong pa
T02D2663b-1:334a-27: nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kun du skye par 'gyur
T02D2663b-1:334a-28: te 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ting nge
T02D2663b-1:334a-29: 'dzin gyi tshul lo zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa
T02D2663b-1:334a-30: rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul te 'jig rten
T02D2663b-1:334a-31: pa rnams ni las dang 'bras bu la sogs pa
T02D2663b-1:334a-32: rgyu las skyes kyang ded kyi bdag ces bya ba
T02D2663b-1:334a-33: dbang po dang tshangs pa la sogs pas bskyed par
T02D2663b-1:334a-34: rtogs la / chos rnams dngos po med de stong
T02D2663b-1:334a-35: pa nyid du mthong pa de yang rang bzhin gyis
T02D2663b-1:334a-36: stong pa ma yin gyi dbang po la sogs pas
T02D2663b-1:334a-37: stong par byas so snyam nas stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2663b-1:334a-38: ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed do //
T02D2663b-1:334a-39: gnas ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul yin te zhes pa nas //
T02D2663b-1:334a-40: 'jig rten pa yi lha gang yin //
T02D2663b-1:334a-41: gsang sngags spyad pa'i cho ga'i tshul //
T02D2663b-1:334a-42: sems can rnam la phan 'dogs pas //
T02D2663b-1:334a-43: dpa' po de tshe 'chad par byed //
T02D2663b-1:334a-44: ces pa'i bar gyis ni sngar bshad pa rnams bsdus
T02D2663b-1:334a-45: nas bshad pa yin te de dag gis so so'i
T02D2663b-1:334b-0: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid @334b kyi tshul du
T02D2663b-1:334b-1: rtogs pa'i stong pa de la gnas te stong pa'i
T02D2663b-1:334b-2: chos da nyid tshig dang yig 'bru la sogs pa
T02D2663b-1:334b-3: sa sems can rnams kyi don du ston cing 'chad
T02D2663b-1:334b-4: do zhes pa'o // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-1:334b-5: kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje
T02D2663b-1:334b-7: gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid nyon cig ces pa nas /
T02D2663b-1:334b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'ang de bzhin te /
T02D2663b-1:334b-9: khyad par dag ni bshad bya na //
T02D2663b-1:334b-10: ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las //
T02D2663b-1:334b-11: las tshe rnam par sbyong zhes bya //
T02D2663b-1:334b-12: zhes pa'i bar gyis de bzhi gshegs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:334b-13: kun du sangs rgyas pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:334b-14: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2663b-1:334b-15: nyon thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi so so'i sngags kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:334b-16: sngags kyi mtshan nyid de yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:334b-20: de la sngags kyi lha ni snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du bshad zin te /
T02D2663b-1:334b-21: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang kun du sangs
T02D2663b-1:334b-22: rgyas pa dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-1:334b-23: dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa
T02D2663b-1:334b-24: rnams nyid de / song rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-1:334b-25: du rigs gsum bkod pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-1:334b-26: rnams nyid de / pa'o // dkyil 'khor bar ma
T02D2663b-1:334b-27: na sh'akya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa
T02D2663b-1:334b-28: ni kun du sangs rgyas so //
T02D2663b-1:334b-29: dkyil 'khor tha man 'phags pa 'jam dpal la sogs
T02D2663b-1:334b-30: pa sa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663b-1:334b-31: dpa' gtso bo dag bzhugs pa rnams ni sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-1:334b-32: rnams so // de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2663b-1:334b-33: dpa' phyag na rin chen la sogs pa ni byang
T02D2663b-1:334b-34: rnams so // chub sems dpa'o // nyan thos dang
T02D2663b-1:334b-35: rang sangs rgyas yongs su ma smos kyang sprul pa'i
T02D2663b-1:334b-36: skus gdul ba'i nang du bdog pas na dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-1:334b-37: bar ma'i nan gdu 'dus par rig par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:334b-38: 'jig rten pa rnams kyang dkyil 'khor bar ma de nyid kyi nang na dngos su 'khod pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:334b-39: sngags kyi don ni kun du sangs rgyas pa nas
T02D2663b-1:334b-40: 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi bar gyi ting nge
T02D2663b-1:334b-42: de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:335a-1: par thar pa'i sgo stong pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663b-1:335a-3: dgos pa'i sa la gnas de rnams //
T02D2663b-1:335a-4: zhes pa la sogs pa sems can gyi don du chos 'chad pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:335a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams so //
T02D2663b-1:335a-6: sngags kyi rang bzhin rnam pa bzhir shes par bya
T02D2663b-1:335a-7: ste tshig dang 'bru dang dbyangs dang yul gyi skad
T02D2663b-1:335a-8: rnams so // de la tshig ni yi ge'i 'bru
T02D2663b-1:335a-9: mang po 'dus pa las tshig tu longs par smra
T02D2663b-1:335a-10: rnams so // ba'o // 'bru ni yi ge ka
T02D2663b-1:335a-11: la sogs pa sngags kyi yi ge 'bru re re'o
T02D2663b-1:335a-12: rnams so // ba'o // // dbyangs ni aa dang
T02D2663b-1:335a-13: ai la sogs pa gug skyed kyi rigs su gtogs
T02D2663b-1:335a-15: gyi skad ni yul so so na skad gang gis
T02D2663b-1:335a-16: spyod pa de nyid dang mthun par gsungs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:335a-17: sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid nyon cig ces pa ni sngar /
T02D2663b-1:335a-18: gsang sngags mtshan nyid ji 'dra lags //
T02D2663b-1:335a-19: zhes bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba deng ngas bshad
T02D2663b-1:335a-20: kyis nyon cig pa ste sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid
T02D2663b-1:335a-21: ces smos pa ni sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid sngags
T02D2663b-1:335a-22: kyi lha dang sngags kyi don gong du bshad pas
T02D2663b-1:335a-23: na da 'dir sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid gsang bar
T02D2663b-1:335a-24: smra ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshig rnams nyon cig ces
T02D2663b-1:335a-25: pa'o // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags ni //
T02D2663b-1:335a-26: tshig dang ming dang brda yis mtshan //
T02D2663b-1:335a-27: zhes pa dzin dzik ces pa la sogs pa'i tshig
T02D2663b-1:335a-28: smos pas 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ming gi mtshan
T02D2663b-1:335a-29: ma ste sangs rgyas kyi sngags su byed par shes
T02D2663b-1:335a-30: pa'o // tshig de dbang du gyur pas na //
T02D2663b-1:335a-31: gsang sngags don rnams thams cad sgrub //
T02D2663b-1:335a-32: ces pa ni kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sngags kyi
T02D2663b-1:335a-33: tshig smos pa yang dbang chen gyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663b-1:335a-34: gyi mtshan ma ste rgyas pa'i don thams cad 'grub
T02D2663b-1:335a-36: kha cig skul ba tshig dang ldan //
T02D2663b-1:335a-37: kha cig rang ming thog mar smos //
T02D2663b-1:335a-38: zhes pa ni sngags kyi tshig las sngags kyi lha yi mthu dang yon tan rnams smos pa dang ;
T02D2663b-1:335a-39: sh'intam ku ru zhes pa la sogs pa'i las rnams
T02D2663b-1:335a-40: la bskul ba smos pa dang 'dzin dzik ces pa
T02D2663b-1:335a-41: la sogs pa lha'i mtshan smos pas lha gang gi
T02D2663b-1:335a-42: sngags yin bar rig bar 'gyur pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:335a-43: h'um phat ces pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D2663b-1:335a-44: tshig rnams ni gong du gtsug tor brgyad smos pa
T02D2663b-1:335b-0: la sogs pa'i @335b sngags su shes par bya ste
T02D2663b-1:335b-1: / gtsug tor gyi sngags rnams gzhung gzhan las h'um dang phat med pa yang 'byung /
T02D2663b-1:335b-2: gtsug tor ma yin pa'i lha rnams kyi sngags h'um
T02D2663b-1:335b-3: dang phat du bcas pa yang 'byung ba sna h'um
T02D2663b-1:335b-4: dang phat du bcas pa'i gtsug tor gyi sngags 'di
T02D2663b-1:335b-5: rnams ni rgyud 'di nyid du smos pa'i gtsug tor
T02D2663b-1:335b-6: gyi sngags su shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:335b-7: zung zo chom sa shig ces pa dang //
T02D2663b-1:335b-8: snun sod drol cig ces pa ni //
T02D2663b-1:335b-9: phyag brnyan rnams dang khro bo yi //
T02D2663b-1:335b-10: gsang sngags yin par 'dren pas gsungs //
T02D2663b-1:335b-11: zhes pa ni tshig de lta bu drag shul can
T02D2663b-1:335b-12: dang ldan pa'i sngags ni khro bo rnams dang ci
T02D2663b-1:335b-13: bgyi rnams kyi sngags su shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:335b-14: na ma:sv'a h'a la sogs ldan /
T02D2663b-1:335b-16: byang chub sems dpa' skyob ba'i yin //
T02D2663b-1:335b-17: zhes pa'i bar ni sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i
T02D2663b-1:335b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgya shes bya ba dang
T02D2663b-1:335b-19: / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2663b-1:335b-20: kyi sngags te mgo na phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan
T02D2663b-1:335b-21: zhing tshig gi mjug na sv'a h'a dang bcas pa
T02D2663b-1:335b-22: / dang / byang chub sems dpa' so so'i ting
T02D2663b-1:335b-23: nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyi tshig rnams smos pa
T02D2663b-1:335b-24: / dang / dang / zung shig chom sa shig
T02D2663b-1:335b-25: la sogs pa'i tshig drag shul can rnams med cing
T02D2663b-1:335b-26: zhi ba'i tshig rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
T02D2663b-1:335b-27: tshig dang ldan pa'i sngags ni sangs rgyas byang chub
T02D2663b-1:335b-28: sems dpa' rnams kyi yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:335b-29: nyan thos rnams kyi gsang sngags ni //
T02D2663b-1:335b-30: gcig pu gzhi ni gcig la gnas //
T02D2663b-1:335b-31: zhes pa ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi gsang sngags
T02D2663b-1:335b-32: rnams ni spyi po spyi gtsug la sogs pa yan
T02D2663b-1:335b-33: lag gi sngags rnams med pas na gcig pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:335b-34: byang chub sems dpa' ltar gzugs sna tshogs su mi 'gyur gyi /
T02D2663b-1:335b-35: dge slong gi tshul gcig pu 'dzin pa'am /
T02D2663b-1:335b-36: gang zag la bdag med pa gcig pu rtogs pas na gcig la gnas zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:335b-37: rang sangs rgyas kyi'ang de bzhin te //
T02D2663b-1:335b-38: khyad bar dag ni bshad bya na //
T02D2663b-1:335b-39: ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las //
T02D2663b-1:335b-40: las tshe rnam par sbyong zhes bya //
T02D2663b-1:335b-41: zhes pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sngags rnams kyang mtshan nyid gzhan ni nyan thos dang mthun la /
T02D2663b-1:335b-42: spyad par ni rgyu dang 'bras bu bshig nas chos
T02D2663b-1:335b-43: rnams stong par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan
T02D2663b-1:336a-1: de la 'dir kun du sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni bshad na /
T02D2663b-1:336a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid ci'i phyir dngos su ma smos she na /
T02D2663b-1:336a-3: kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sngags de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin te ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2663b-1:336a-4: kun du sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa de rnams
T02D2663b-1:336a-5: pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa las 'byung ba
T02D2663b-1:336a-6: yin na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu yin pas
T02D2663b-1:336a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dang tha mi dad la /
T02D2663b-1:336a-8: 'on te ye shes kyi sems can yin na yang
T02D2663b-1:336a-9: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'bras bu yin pas
T02D2663b-1:336a-10: tha mi dad pa'i phyir de dag de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-1:336a-11: pa'i sngags so // don dam par byang chub sems
T02D2663b-1:336a-12: dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge
T02D2663b-1:336a-13: 'bru re re pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2663b-1:336a-14: sgo stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du ston par
T02D2663b-1:336a-15: gcig pas na tha mi dad do //
T02D2663b-1:336a-16: yang na 'og nas bshad pa'i yi ge aa rnam
T02D2663b-1:336a-17: pa bzhi po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags so
T02D2663b-1:336a-18: // gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang gsang sngags
T02D2663b-1:336a-19: rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
T02D2663b-1:336a-20: ma byas byed du ma bcug //
T02D2663b-1:336a-21: rjes su yi rang ba ma yin no zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:336a-22: nas gsang sngags kyi tshul 'chad do zhes pa'i bar
T02D2663b-1:336a-23: gyis ni gsang sngags rnams kyi rang bzhin bshad pa
T02D2663b-1:336a-24: ste / tshig dang ming dang brdas mtshan pa'i mtshan
T02D2663b-1:336a-25: nyid kyi gsang sngags bskung pa la sogs pa dang
T02D2663b-1:336a-26: ldan pa'i tshig gis don gang bskul ba de grub
T02D2663b-1:336a-27: par byed pa'i mthu'i rang bzhin rnams mthu 'dis don
T02D2663b-1:336a-28: 'di 'grub par bya'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas sngags
T02D2663b-1:336a-29: kyi rang bzhin de byas sam /
T02D2663b-1:336a-30: de bzhin du gzhan la byed du bcug gam /
T02D2663b-1:336a-31: gzhan byed pa la rjes su yi rang na yang
T02D2663b-1:336a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid mtshan ma dang bral bas
T02D2663b-1:336a-33: byas pa'am byed du bcug pa 'am /
T02D2663b-1:336a-34: rjes su yi rang ba ma yin no //
T02D2663b-1:336a-36: sngags kyi rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad par
T02D2663b-1:336a-37: gyur na ni de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can
T02D2663b-1:336a-38: thams cad kyi don mdzad pas na sgrub par brtsams
T02D2663b-1:336a-39: pa thams cad kyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur te
T02D2663b-1:336a-40: / de ltar sgrub po thams cad kyis 'grub pa
T02D2663b-1:336a-41: ma yin pas de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad pa ma
T02D2663b-1:336a-42: / yin no // de ste sngags kyi mthu'i don
T02D2663b-1:336b-0: dang @336b mthu gnyis rtag tu phan tshun 'grel pa
T02D2663b-1:336b-1: yin tshig brjod pa tsam gyis don de nyid 'grub
T02D2663b-1:336b-2: / yin no // par 'gyur te / dper na
T02D2663b-1:336b-3: me zhes tshig tu brjod pa na me'i rang bzhin
T02D2663b-1:336b-4: sred par byed pa yin yang tshig tu brjod pas
T02D2663b-1:336b-5: kha tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o //
T02D2663b-1:336b-6: de bas na sngags kyi mthu ni de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad pa yang ma yin /
T02D2663b-1:336b-8: gzhan byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba ma yin zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:336b-10: 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de /
T02D2663b-1:336b-11: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang byung yang
T02D2663b-1:336b-12: rung ma byung yang rung chos nyid de ni ye
T02D2663b-1:336b-14: de yang 'di ltar gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi chos nyid do zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:336b-15: ming dang tshig dang brdas mtshan pa'i sngags de bskul
T02D2663b-1:336b-16: ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang don du ldan na
T02D2663b-1:336b-17: gang bskul ba'i don de nyid sus kyang byas pa
T02D2663b-1:336b-18: ma yin te / rgyu gzhan la mi ltos par
T02D2663b-1:336b-19: chos de de ltar ye nas gnas pa yin te
T02D2663b-1:336b-20: ma yin te / / dper na bu ram gyi
T02D2663b-1:336b-21: ro mngar ba dang lan tshva'i ro bro ba'i rang
T02D2663b-1:336b-22: bzhin rnams rgyu gang gis kyang 'dus ma byas par
T02D2663b-1:336b-23: mngar ba'i rang bzhin du ye nas gnas pa yin
T02D2663b-1:336b-24: ma yin te / / no // de ltar de
T02D2663b-1:336b-25: bzhin gshegs pas byas pa yin na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-1:336b-26: pa byung ba na sngags kyi rang bzhin de yang
T02D2663b-1:336b-27: ma yin te / / no // yod la /
T02D2663b-1:336b-28: ma byung na ni med par 'gyur te de ltar
T02D2663b-1:336b-29: yang ma yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

T02D2663b-1:342b-15: dri'i mchod pa dbul ba'i sngon du yang me tog gi mchod pa rnams dbul bar bya'o //

T02D2663b-1:345a-4: lha'am bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la bul
T02D2663b-1:345a-5: bar bya ste / de dag kyang zhib tu ni bsdus pa'i don du bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-1:345a-6: me tog dor nas lha gang la bab pa de'i
T02D2663b-1:345a-7: cha brtag pa yang gsang ba spyi'i rgyud kyi nang
T02D2663b-1:345a-9: dkyil 'khor dang po'i sgo drung du //
T02D2663b-1:345a-10: sgo khyud kyi ni dbus kyi cha //
T02D2663b-1:345a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo gnyis kyi //
T02D2663b-1:345a-12: bar du slob ma gzung bar bya //
T02D2663b-1:345a-13: der gnas pa la cho ga kun //
T02D2663b-1:345a-14: rim pa bzhin du legs par bya //
T02D2663b-1:345a-15: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i sgo khyud kyi
T02D2663b-1:345a-16: dbus su slob ma der gzung de der gnas nas
T02D2663b-1:345a-17: gong du smos pa'i las thams cad bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:345a-18: sgo khar slob ma la chus gdab pa 'ba' zhig ma gtogs so //
T02D2663b-1:345a-19: dkyil 'khor gyi nang du ma zhugs par sgo gnas
T02D2663b-1:345a-20: las de rnams bya ba dang lha rnams la me
T02D2663b-1:345a-21: tog 'dor ba yang sgo nas bor ba na nang
T02D2663b-1:345a-23: nang du zhugs te bor na lha kha cig rgyab tu las par 'gyur la /
T02D2663b-1:345a-24: bdag dbus su zhugs te bor na me tog phyi rol du bab par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:345a-26: skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni //
T02D2663b-1:345a-27: zhes kyang 'byung bas bdag nang du zhugs nas kha cig gi spyan sngar yang mi 'gyur la /
T02D2663b-1:345a-28: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams
T02D2663b-1:345a-29: kha cig la rgyab kyis blta ba mi rigs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:345a-30: phyir ro // gsum du na 'di ni chos kyir
T02D2663b-1:345a-31: gyal po'i 'khor yin pas thog ma nas nang du
T02D2663b-1:345a-32: zhugs na ko long du 'gyur te rgyal chos dang
T02D2663b-1:345a-34: slob ma sdig dang bral ba kun //
T02D2663b-1:345a-35: de ltar legs par btsun nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:345a-36: de dag zhi bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2663b-1:345a-38: sbyin sreg rjes la sngags pa yis //
T02D2663b-1:345a-39: zhes pa'i bar gyis dkyil 'khor du btsud pa'i slob
T02D2663b-1:345a-40: ma de dag zhi bar bya ba'i sbyin sreg bya
T02D2663b-1:345a-41: ste slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs pas sdig
T02D2663b-1:345a-42: pa rnams byang zhing rgyud dag pa des bcom ldan
T02D2663b-1:345a-43: 'das kyis ku mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan la
T02D2663b-1:345a-44: sogs pa la sbyin sreg gi sgo nas yon phul
T02D2663b-1:345a-45: na bsod nams 'phel te sdig pa 'byang bas zhi
T02D2663b-1:345a-46: bar 'gyur ro // de'i rim pa yang thog mar snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun rol /
T02D2663b-1:345a-47: dkyil 'khor bar ma'i sgo'i phyi rim /
T02D2663b-1:345b-0: @345b gsum pa'i nang rol du me thab khru gang ba bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:345b-1: de ste dkyil 'khor chung nas nang du mi shong
T02D2663b-1:345b-2: na dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim gyi sgo gar bya'o
T02D2663b-1:345b-3: // khang thog la sogs par brkor mi rung na tshon dmar pos thab bri bar bya la /
T02D2663b-1:345b-4: de nas thab de'i tha mar lho phyogs nas brtsams
T02D2663b-1:345b-5: te ku sha g-yas skor du dgras zhing gcig gi
T02D2663b-1:345b-6: rtsa bas gcig gi rtse mo non par byas te
T02D2663b-1:345b-7: bskor ro // de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i dri'i chu gtor la /
T02D2663b-1:345b-8: de nas thab der 'jig rten pa'i mi mri ta
T02D2663b-1:345b-9: zhes bya ba las thams cad byed pa mgrin pa
T02D2663b-1:345b-10: ring la spu can kha dog kham par 'dug pa
T02D2663b-1:345b-11: me tog gcig thab der bor la me de byin
T02D2663b-1:345b-13: de nas me lha de la zhal bsil dang gang
T02D2663b-1:345b-14: ba'i sbyin sreg gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin du byin
T02D2663b-1:345b-15: nas de nyid du 'dar ba'i rang bzhin dub zhag
T02D2663b-1:345b-16: la / de nas thab der me tog gcig bor
T02D2663b-1:345b-17: nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhi ba'i mer byin
T02D2663b-1:345b-18: la / gyis brlabs te / zhal bsil dang gang
T02D2663b-1:345b-19: ba'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du
T02D2663b-1:345b-20: byas nas slob ma re re'i phyir yang sbyin sreg
T02D2663b-1:345b-21: lan nyi shu rtsag cig re slob ma'i lag pa
T02D2663b-1:345b-22: g-yas pa'i mthe bon nas slob dpon gyi lag pa
T02D2663b-1:345b-25: yan lag gi don bshad par bya ste sdig dang
T02D2663b-1:345b-26: bral ba kun zhes pa ni slob ma de rnams
T02D2663b-1:345b-27: dkyil 'khor du gzhug par rtsom pa na gsum la
T02D2663b-1:345b-28: skyabs su 'gro ba la sgos pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:345b-29: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:345b-30: zhugs nas kyang phyis sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa
T02D2663b-1:345b-31: na sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang rjes gsum ga
T02D2663b-1:345b-32: dge ste sdig pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:345b-33: sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin du bya //
T02D2663b-1:345b-34: zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga gzhung las
T02D2663b-1:345b-35: ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du bya ba ste 'og
T02D2663b-1:345b-37: snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun //
T02D2663b-1:345b-38: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i rgyab rol gyi //
T02D2663b-1:345b-39: dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char //
T02D2663b-1:345b-40: ma g-yengs pa yi sems kyis bya //
T02D2663b-1:345b-41: me thab khru gang tsam gyi ni //
T02D2663b-1:345b-42: tshad du rab tu bsgrags pa yin //
T02D2663b-1:345b-43: zhes pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-1:345b-44: 'dir khru gang pa 'ba' zhig gsungs kyi zlum po'am
T02D2663b-1:345b-45: gru bzhir bya ba ma smos kyang zhi ba dang
T02D2663b-1:345b-46: rgyas pa'i thab ji ltar grags pa la bya ste
T02D2663b-1:346a-0: / skabs 'dir ni zhi ba'i las yin @346a * //
T02D2663b-1:346a-2: yang na zhi ba dang rgyas pa gnyis ka'i bzhi mthun na gru bzhi yang nyes pa med do //
T02D2663b-1:346a-3: kha ran so bzhi'i tshad dub ya //
T02D2663b-1:346a-4: zhes pa ni thab gru bzhi'i ni kha ran yang gru bzhir bya la /
T02D2663b-1:346a-5: thab zlum po la kha ran yang zlum por bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:346a-6: dbus su rdo rje rab tu brtag / ces pa
T02D2663b-1:346a-7: ni ye shes lnga'i phyag rgyar gyur pa rdo rje
T02D2663b-1:346a-9: de nas sngags pa'i g-yas logs su //
T02D2663b-1:346a-10: sbyin sreg gi nyo byad gzhag / g-yon gyi phyogs su slob ma rnams //
T02D2663b-1:346a-11: zhes pa ni bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas rnams sngags pa'i g-yas su gzhag go //
T02D2663b-1:346a-12: g-yon du slob ma bkod pa na slob dpon slob ma'i g-yas su 'bab ste /
T02D2663b-1:346a-13: slob dpon des slob ma la phan 'dogs pa dang rjes su mthun par bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:346a-14: tsog tsog por ni 'khod du gzhug / ces pa
T02D2663b-1:346a-15: ni cho ga'i las rnams ma zin gyi bar du
T02D2663b-1:346a-16: bag phag ste mi 'dug pa'am gus pa bstan pa'o
T02D2663b-1:346a-17: // sdom brtson bdag nyid sa steng du //
T02D2663b-1:346a-18: ku sha bting ba'i stan la 'dug / ces pa
T02D2663b-1:346a-19: ni slob dpon rtsva ku sha steng du 'dug pa'o
T02D2663b-1:346a-20: // yang na tshon rtsi dmar po mchog / ces pa nas /
T02D2663b-1:346a-21: nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2663b-1:346a-22: zhes pa'i bar ni go rims bzhin du gong dub shad zin la /
T02D2663b-1:346a-23: yid ni mnyam par bzhag nas su //
T02D2663b-1:346a-24: zhes pa ni zhi ba'i las la byams pa'i dang tshul bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:346a-25: sbyin sreg rjes la sngags pa yis //
T02D2663b-1:346a-26: slob ma rnams la yon bslang ba //
T02D2663b-1:346a-28: sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i dge 'dun la //
T02D2663b-1:346a-29: ci nus par ni mchod bstod bya //
T02D2663b-1:346a-30: zhes pa'i bar ni sdig pa dang bral ba'i slob
T02D2663b-1:346a-31: ma de dag slob dpon gyis bsod nams kyi zhing
T02D2663b-1:346a-32: dam pa la sbyin pa byed du gzhug ste /
T02D2663b-1:346a-33: mchog tu phan 'dogs pa'i slob dpon de la slob
T02D2663b-1:346a-34: ma rnams kyis gus par yon phul na bsod nams
T02D2663b-1:346a-35: mchog tu 'gyur ba'i phyir gser dang dngul dang rin
T02D2663b-1:346a-36: po che la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o zhes bskul
T02D2663b-1:346a-37: ma btab bo // de ltar slob dpon la yon
T02D2663b-1:346a-38: phul nas kyang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni sbyin pa'i
T02D2663b-1:346a-39: gnas dam pa yin pas 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la
T02D2663b-1:346a-40: yon 'bul ba dang chos ston gsol bar bya ba
T02D2663b-1:346a-41: ma btab bo // yang / 'di ni bsod nams zhig yin zhes //
T02D2663b-1:346a-42: sems can kun gyi dong yi phyir //
T02D2663b-1:346a-43: skyob pa rnams ni nan gyis gsungs //
T02D2663b-1:346b-0: zhes bya ba la sogs @346b pas bstan pa yin no //
T02D2663b-1:346b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
T02D2663b-1:346b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag nar
T02D2663b-1:346b-3: do rje la bka' stsal pa /
T02D2663b-1:346b-4: sems dpa' chen po dbang bskur ba //
T02D2663b-1:346b-5: sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa //
T02D2663b-1:346b-6: rgyas pa ru ni bshad par bya //
T02D2663b-1:346b-7: yid gcig bsdus te legs par nyon //
T02D2663b-1:346b-9: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02D2663b-1:346b-10: khyod la rnam pa kun du srung //
T02D2663b-1:346b-11: zhes pa'i bar gyis slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i skabs 'chad de /
T02D2663b-1:346b-12: de la mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-1:346b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam
T02D2663b-1:346b-14: pa nyid mi zad pa'i rgyan rang bzhin gyi dkyil
T02D2663b-1:346b-15: 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa'i spyan sngar
T02D2663b-1:346b-16: rin po che la sogs pa'i bum pas chu blugs
T02D2663b-1:346b-17: pas chu blugs pa ste mngon par blugs zhes pa'i
T02D2663b-1:346b-19: de yang rnam pa gsum du brtag par bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:346b-20: dbang bskur ba'i ming ji lta bu yin pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:346b-21: su la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:346b-23: de la dbang bskur ba'i ming ji lta bu yin
T02D2663b-1:346b-24: pa ni spyir dbang bskur ba'i rnam pa mang ste
T02D2663b-1:346b-25: / sngags pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir rig pa sbyin pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:346b-26: las kyi dbang bskur ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas
T02D2663b-1:346b-27: pa dang mngon spyod kyi las bya ba'i phyir dang
T02D2663b-1:346b-28: / gdon bsam pa la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:346b-29: de dag las skabs 'dir ni slob dpon du dbang bskur bag zhes bya ste de ni ming ngo //
T02D2663b-1:346b-30: su la dbang bskur ba ni slob ma phal pa
T02D2663b-1:346b-31: thams cad la dbang bskur bar bya ba ma yin
T02D2663b-1:346b-32: gyi dam tshig can lnga'i skabs nas /
T02D2663b-1:346b-33: dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong //
T02D2663b-1:346b-34: las dang bya ba la yang sbyar //
T02D2663b-1:346b-35: zhes sngags kyi rgyud rnams thos shing dkyil 'khor la
T02D2663b-1:346b-36: sogs pa 'dri bar nus pa khyad par can gyi
T02D2663b-1:346b-37: slob ma dang / yongs su grub pa'i slob ma rnams la dbang bskur te /
T02D2663b-1:346b-38: su la dbang bskur ba zhes pa ni de rnams la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:346b-39: ci'i phyir dbang bskur zhes pa ni chos kyi mig mi 'tshub par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02D2663b-1:346b-40: 'jig rten na yang 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag lung bstan pa dang rtog pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:346b-41: sman la sog pa rnams kyang slob mas rdzogs pa
T02D2663b-1:346b-42: rlobs nas slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i cho ga
T02D2663b-1:346b-43: 'jig rten pa rnams la ji ltar srid pa bzhin
T02D2663b-1:346b-44: du byas na bshad pa la sogs pa bya bar
T02D2663b-1:347a-0: @347a * // slob ma la lung sbyin pa srid do //
T02D2663b-1:347a-1: de dag kyang so so'i gtsug lag rdzogs par mi
T02D2663b-1:347a-2: shes shing dbang ma bskur bar bshad pa la sogs
T02D2663b-1:347a-3: pa byas na gtsug lag de dag ji lta ba
T02D2663b-1:347a-4: bzhin du bshad mi nus pas de dag gis mi
T02D2663b-1:347a-6: de bzhin du 'dir yang slob ma rnams rgyud la sogs pa rdzogs par shes par bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:347a-7: de dag nyid slob dpon gyi mdo mngon sum du
T02D2663b-1:347a-8: bzlas nas rgyud bshad pa dang dkyil 'khor bri ba
T02D2663b-1:347a-9: la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par
T02D2663b-1:347a-10: slob dpon nyid yid ches te /
T02D2663b-1:347a-11: sems can gyi don byed nus par gyur pa rnams
T02D2663b-1:347a-12: la dbang bskur na chos kyi mig mi 'tshub par
T02D2663b-1:347a-14: gnyis su na de ltar mngon par 'dus byas pa'i
T02D2663b-1:347a-15: slob ma de slob dpon du gyur na 'jig rten
T02D2663b-1:347a-16: pa rnams kyang khungs de lta bu las byung ba'i
T02D2663b-1:347a-17: slob dpon de la yid ches shing btsun par byed
T02D2663b-1:347a-18: do // rim pa 'di lta bus dbang ma bskur
T02D2663b-1:347a-19: la rgyud la sogs pa mi shes par btsan thabs
T02D2663b-1:347a-20: su sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa 'chad cing dkyil
T02D2663b-1:347a-21: 'khor 'drin ji lta ba nyid du mi shes te
T02D2663b-1:347a-22: do // / don log par 'gyur pas sngags kyi
T02D2663b-1:347a-23: lha la sogs pas kyang byin gyis mi rlob pa'i
T02D2663b-1:347a-24: phyir ci bsams pa'i don mi 'grub la /
T02D2663b-1:347a-25: gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams yid mi ches shing mi phyogs pas chos kyi mig 'tshub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663b-1:347a-26: ci'i phyir dbang bskur ba zhes pa ni de'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:347a-27: de la dbang bskur ba yang ji ltar 'jig rten
T02D2663b-1:347a-28: gyi rgyal po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi
T02D2663b-1:347a-30: mngon par mtho ba'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa
T02D2663b-1:347a-31: de ji ltar rgyal thabs su dbang bskur bar bya
T02D2663b-1:347a-32: ba de bzhin bya ba ste /
T02D2663b-1:347a-33: 'dir yang mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs
T02D2663b-1:347a-34: pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa'i chos kyi rgyal
T02D2663b-1:347a-35: por dbang bskur ba'i phyir te /
T02D2663b-1:347a-36: de yang rim pa 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:347a-37: thog mar rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du bar
T02D2663b-1:347a-38: khru dos bcad de der dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-1:347a-39: rim pa gcig pa sgo gcig pa bris la /
T02D2663b-1:347a-40: de'i nang du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris te /
T02D2663b-1:347a-41: dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bri
T02D2663b-1:347a-42: zhing padma'i 'dab ma brgyad po la yang byang chub
T02D2663b-1:347a-43: sems dpa' bzhi dang phyag brnyan bzhi ste brgyad bri'o
T02D2663b-1:347a-44: // padma'i dbus su chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge ram bris la der slob ma bzhag ste /
T02D2663b-1:347b-0: dri dang me tog la @347b sogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:347b-1: bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:347b-2: gleng gzhi rgya chen po snyan pa rnams bsgrags shing
T02D2663b-1:347b-3: kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i sems dpa' rnams
T02D2663b-1:347b-4: kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che bzhi'i bum
T02D2663b-1:347b-5: pa dkyil 'khor chen po lan re bskor nas slob
T02D2663b-1:347b-6: ma de'i spyi bo nas blugs so //
T02D2663b-1:347b-7: de'i 'og tu 'dir dngos su ma smos kyang de
T02D2663b-1:347b-8: bzhin gshegs pa'i gtug tor dang spyan dang ljags dang
T02D2663b-1:347b-9: go cha rnams kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2663b-1:347b-10: sngags kyis kyang slob ma de la padma'i steng na
T02D2663b-1:347b-11: 'dug pa nyid nas rim pa bzhin du byin gyis
T02D2663b-1:347b-12: brlab par bya'o // de nas gnas de bslab ste
T02D2663b-1:347b-13: dkyil 'khor de'i nyi 'khor du dri bzang po gcig
T02D2663b-1:347b-14: bzhag ste gos gsar pa brjes nas gos gsar pa
T02D2663b-1:347b-15: phrugs cig gon nas khri'i steng du bzhag go //
T02D2663b-1:347b-16: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas /
T02D2663b-1:347b-17: slob dpon nyid mig dbye ba'i thur ma thogs nas mdun du 'dug ste /
T02D2663b-1:347b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bu khyod kyis mi
T02D2663b-1:347b-19: shes pa'i rab rib rnams bsal to zhes pa la
T02D2663b-1:347b-21: de nas me long thogs la chos rnams gzugs brnyan
T02D2663b-1:347b-22: dang 'dra bar rang bzhin med pa'i stong pa nyid
T02D2663b-1:347b-23: kyi tshul du sgoms shig ces pa'i tshig brjod do
T02D2663b-1:347b-24: // de nas de ltar bdag gi don yongs su
T02D2663b-1:347b-25: rdzogs nas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bya
T02D2663b-1:347b-26: ba'i phyir rkang pa'i 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo
T02D2663b-1:347b-27: // bzhag ste / chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig
T02D2663b-1:347b-28: ces bsgrag go / de nas chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D2663b-1:347b-29: bskor ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi gsung mchog 'jig
T02D2663b-1:347b-30: rten gyi khams thams cad du grags par bskor bar
T02D2663b-1:347b-31: // bzhag ste / bya ste / gsung mchog de'i
T02D2663b-1:347b-32: phyag rgyar gyur pa dung bzang po cig lag pa
T02D2663b-1:347b-34: khyod kyi chos kyi dung bus shig / ces brjod do //
T02D2663b-1:347b-35: de ltar sems can gyi don byas nas sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-1:347b-36: rnams la byas pa gzo ba la sogs pa'i tshig
T02D2663b-1:347b-37: de'i 'og tu brjod par bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:347b-38: de rnams ni las su bya ba'i rim pa bsdus te bshad pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:347b-39: yan lag gi don bshad par bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:347b-40: sems dpa' chan po dbang bskur ba //
T02D2663b-1:347b-41: rgyas pa ru ni bshad par byas //
T02D2663b-1:347b-42: yid gcig bsdus te legs par nyon //
T02D2663b-1:347b-43: zhes pa la dbang bskur ba'i tshig gi don gong du bshad zin la /
T02D2663b-1:347b-44: rgyas pa ru ni bshad par byas //
T02D2663b-1:348a-0: zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga @348a * //
T02D2663b-1:348a-1: 'og nas 'byung ba rnams dang ldan par 'chad pas shes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:348a-2: sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis bshad ces pa ni sangs
T02D2663b-1:348a-3: rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas bya ba gcig
T02D2663b-1:348a-4: du bstan pa'o // gsang ba'i pa'i bdag po slob
T02D2663b-1:348a-5: dpon gyis rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du bar
T02D2663b-1:348a-6: khru do bor nas phyi rol gyi sa la dkyil
T02D2663b-1:348a-7: 'khor gnyis pa gru bzhi la sgo gcig pa bri
T02D2663b-1:348a-8: bar bya'i zhes pa la don gzhan ni sngar bshad
T02D2663b-1:348a-9: du bstan pa'o // zin te / 'dir dngos su
T02D2663b-1:348a-10: ma smos kyang spyi'i mtshan nyid ltar byas na nang
T02D2663b-1:348a-11: gi dkyil 'khor gyis shar phyogs su gzhol na dbang
T02D2663b-1:348a-12: bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor byang phyogs su bri bar bya
T02D2663b-1:348a-13: du bstan pa'o // zin te / / nang gi
T02D2663b-1:348a-14: dkyil 'khor byang phyogs su gzhol na dbang bskur ba'i
T02D2663b-1:348a-15: dkyil 'khor nub phyogs su bri bar bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:348a-16: 'dir ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du dbang
T02D2663b-1:348a-17: bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba mtha' gcig tu gsungs
T02D2663b-1:348a-18: pas nang gi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i tshu
T02D2663b-1:348a-19: mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir nang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-1:348a-20: gyi sa byang phyogs su gzhol bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:348a-21: 'on te shar phyogs su gzhol na yang bar sa rgal gyis bcad par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:348a-22: grva bzhir rdo rje 'dzin sngar bzhin dgod de zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:348a-23: rdo rje 'dzin pa de rnams dang 'og nas byang
T02D2663b-1:348a-24: chub sems dpa' bzhi dang phyag brnyan bzhi 'byung ba
T02D2663b-1:348a-25: rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan las gyur
T02D2663b-1:348a-26: pa ste de rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir
T02D2663b-1:348a-27: spros pa med par gnas pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:348a-28: nam mkha' dri ma med pa ni stong pa nyid
T02D2663b-1:348a-29: kyi spyod yul nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ste shes
T02D2663b-1:348a-30: bya dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma spangs pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:348a-31: dri ma med pa'i mig ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'am /
T02D2663b-1:348a-32: shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i shes rab can zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:348a-33: gos sna tshogs gyon pa ni ngo tshab sgrib par byed pas gos te /
T02D2663b-1:348a-34: gang zhig ngo tsha ba yod na mi byed pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:348a-35: bya ba'i rigs pa rnams byed pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:348a-36: dam pa rnams kyis bsngags pa ste de lta bu'i ngo tsha dang ldan pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:348a-37: dbus su padma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa ze
T02D2663b-1:348a-38: ba dang bcas pa gzhag pa ste zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-1:348a-39: / ye shes brgyad kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:348a-40: ze ba ni yon tan rnams so //
T02D2663b-1:348a-41: 'dab ma bzhi la byang chub sems dpa' grogs su
T02D2663b-1:348b-0: gyur pa sngon @348b gyi smon lam gyi mthu can
T02D2663b-1:348b-1: du gyur pa bzhi bri bar bya ste zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:348b-2: ni / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams de bzhin
T02D2663b-1:348b-3: nyid kyi yon tan las gyur pa ste gnyis ni
T02D2663b-1:348b-4: rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa /
T02D2663b-1:348b-5: gnyis ni gzhan gyi don du phun sum tshogs pa'i
T02D2663b-1:348b-6: rang bzhin te smon lam gyi dbang gis chos kyi
T02D2663b-1:348b-7: rgyal por dbang skur ba de'i padma'i gdan gyi gnas
T02D2663b-1:348b-8: su gyur pa'o // de la gzungs kyi dbang phyug
T02D2663b-1:348b-9: rgyal po zhes pa la gzungs ni shes rab ste
T02D2663b-1:348b-11: dran pa dang shes bzhin can ni shes rab de
T02D2663b-1:348b-12: nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang
T02D2663b-1:348b-13: bzhin sems can rnams la rgyun mi 'chad do //
T02D2663b-1:348b-14: phan pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa can rnams la phan par sems pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:348b-15: snying rje can ni snying rje'i dpang gis sems can
T02D2663b-1:348b-16: rnams la phan par sems pa ste de gnyis ni
T02D2663b-1:348b-17: / gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
T02D2663b-1:348b-18: snga ma gnyis ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663b-1:348b-19: 'dab ma gzhan rnams la ni phyag brgyan bzhi bris
T02D2663b-1:348b-20: te zhes pa yang de bzhin nyid yon tan du
T02D2663b-1:348b-21: shes par bya ste smon lam gyi dbang gis gyur
T02D2663b-1:348b-22: pa ni gong ma bzhin no //
T02D2663b-1:348b-23: sems can gyi khyad par la spyod pa ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663b-1:348b-24: 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:348b-25: sems can rnams kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par shes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:348b-26: ma chags pa dang rnam par grol ba zhes pa
T02D2663b-1:348b-27: ni 'bras bu'i yon tan te stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2663b-1:348b-28: rang bzhin ni chags pa med pa yin la chags
T02D2663b-1:348b-29: pa med pas na rnam par grol ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:348b-30: gong ma gnyis ni rgyu'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2663b-1:348b-31: dbus su ni chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs gzhag go zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:348b-32: chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge ra kha dog dkar po padma'i snying po la gzhag go //
T02D2663b-1:348b-33: rin po che'i bum pa bzhi zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:348b-37: ma ra ka ti'i bum pa gser dang /
T02D2663b-1:348b-38: dbul la sogs pa de dag gis brgyan pa'i bum pa bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:348b-40: de rnams kyi kha dog dang mthun pa'i sa'i bum pa bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:349a-0: de dag la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams @349a * //
T02D2663b-1:349a-1: 'byor bzhin du ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin ma sbyar na /
T02D2663b-1:349a-2: 'jungs pa'i sems dang ldan te sems ma dag pas
T02D2663b-1:349a-3: lha rnams kyang byin gyis mi rlob ces gzhung las
T02D2663b-1:349a-4: 'byung ngo // snying nas med kyang mi 'byor du
T02D2663b-1:349a-5: mi rung snyam nas mi spobs te mi byed dam
T02D2663b-1:349a-7: nad kyi rkyen sman gyi zong yang mi 'jog par byed na /
T02D2663b-1:349a-8: yang dgongs pa'am cho ga mi shes pa yin la /
T02D2663b-1:349a-10: nad kyi rkyen sman gyi zong du snyad btags nas
T02D2663b-1:349a-11: lhag par yod pa gtong mi phod na gong du
T02D2663b-1:349a-13: mdor na sems la sgyu med pa'i gtsang spra shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:349a-14: kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems
T02D2663b-1:349a-15: dpa' rnams kyis bun gyis brlabs pa yang slob ma
T02D2663b-1:349a-16: de ngan song spang bar bstan pa'i phyir thog ma
T02D2663b-1:349a-17: nyid du ngan song thams cad spong ba'i byang chub
T02D2663b-1:349a-18: sems dpa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pas bkru'o //
T02D2663b-1:349a-19: ngan song spangs nas shes bya dang /
T02D2663b-1:349a-20: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur cig pa'i don du /
T02D2663b-1:349a-21: de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i sngags kyis btab la bkru'o //
T02D2663b-1:349a-22: de nas kun du bzang po'i sa thob par gyur
T02D2663b-1:349a-23: cig pa'i don du kun du bzang po'i sngags kyis
T02D2663b-1:349a-25: de nas chos kyi rgyal tshab tu gyur cig pa'i
T02D2663b-1:349a-26: don du byams pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pas
T02D2663b-1:349a-27: bkru'o // padma dam pa de la ni //
T02D2663b-1:349a-28: sngags pa dag gis de bzhag nas //
T02D2663b-1:349a-30: spos dang me tog bzang po yis //
T02D2663b-1:349a-31: de la yang ni mchod par bya //
T02D2663b-1:349a-32: zhes pa'i bar du don gzhan ni gong du bshad zin la /
T02D2663b-1:349a-33: slob ma de dbang bskur bar bya ba'i tshe /
T02D2663b-1:349a-34: 'dir dngos su ma gsungs kyang dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2663b-1:349a-35: pa'i tshe na rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgyur te
T02D2663b-1:349a-36: / de las gzhan pa'i skur bsgyur ba ma gsungs
T02D2663b-1:349a-37: pas rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgyur te dbang bskur
T02D2663b-1:349a-38: / bar bya'o // dbang bskur ba'i tshe padma'i gdan
T02D2663b-1:349a-39: la bzhag pa yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i
T02D2663b-1:349b-0: rkang pa g-yon pa khri'i steng du bzhag la g-yas pa sa la @349b gzhag cing /
T02D2663b-1:349b-1: lag pa g-yon pa khri la brten la /
T02D2663b-1:349b-2: g-yas pa pus mo la bzhag ste gdong yang mi mtho mi dma' bar drang por blta bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:349b-3: de nas gser gyi thur ma ni //
T02D2663b-1:349b-5: ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02D2663b-1:349b-6: zhes pa'i bar du rim pa gzhan ni gong du bshad la //
T02D2663b-1:349b-7: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02D2663b-1:349b-8: ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02D2663b-1:349b-10: sngon thos pa dang bsams pa'i shes rab kyis rgyud
T02D2663b-1:349b-11: la sogs pa mi shes pa rgyal ba'i lung slob
T02D2663b-1:349b-12: dpon gyis bshad pas mi shes pa bsal to zhes
T02D2663b-1:349b-13: pa'o // sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D2663b-1:349b-14: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba bzhin //
T02D2663b-1:349b-17: de ltar mig gi sman pa'i rgyal pos 'jig rten
T02D2663b-1:349b-18: pa rnams kyi mig gi rab rib bsal te gzugs
T02D2663b-1:349b-19: la sogs pa'i rang dngos ji lta ba nyid du
T02D2663b-1:349b-20: 'dug pa mi mthong ba las mthong bar byas pa
T02D2663b-1:349b-21: bzhin du / rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang bu khyod
T02D2663b-1:349b-22: kyi ma rig pa chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ji
T02D2663b-1:349b-23: lta ba bzhin du 'dug pa mi shes pa las
T02D2663b-1:349b-25: de nas me long blangs nas su //
T02D2663b-1:349b-26: chos kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya //
T02D2663b-1:349b-27: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D2663b-1:349b-31: sye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ste /
T02D2663b-1:349b-32: bltar yang snang la yang dag par brtags na dngos po yod pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:349b-34: 'di ltar phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams phung
T02D2663b-1:349b-35: po'i rang bzhin du dmigs su med pas dang ba
T02D2663b-1:349b-36: zhes pa'o // dag pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:349b-37: shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2663b-1:349b-38: rnyog pa med pa'i sgrib pa dang de dag gi bag chags kyang med ces pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:349b-39: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D2663b-1:349b-41: de lta bu'i stong pa'i rang bzhin la rnam par
T02D2663b-1:349b-42: shes pa drug gis gzung du med cing tshig gis
T02D2663b-1:349b-44: rgyu dang las las byung ba ste /
T02D2663b-1:350a-1: po la sogs pa'i chos rnams rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i rang bzhin ma yin gyi /
T02D2663b-1:350a-2: rgyu dang las las byung ba sna gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ste /
T02D2663b-1:350a-3: yod pa ma yin pas brjod du med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gong ma rnams dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663b-1:350a-4: ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa //
T02D2663b-1:350a-5: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02D2663b-1:350a-7: gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bas rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:350a-8: rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas skad cig ma'i char mi gnas par shes pas te /
T02D2663b-1:350a-9: chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid de ltar shes nas de
T02D2663b-1:350a-10: lta bu'i tshul du sgom pa'i shes rab kyis sgoms
T02D2663b-1:350a-11: shig ces pa'o // sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D2663b-1:350a-13: chos kyi dung ba ni bla med pa //
T02D2663b-1:350a-15: de ltar bdag gi don phun sum tshogs nas gzhan
T02D2663b-1:350a-16: gyi don phun sum tshogs par byos shig ces pa
T02D2663b-1:350a-17: ste gong du bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-1:350a-18: sangs rgyas sras su skye zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-1:350a-19: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes las skyes so zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:350a-20: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02D2663b-1:350a-21: dog pa med pa'i sems kyis khyod //
T02D2663b-1:350a-23: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing sems can gyi don
T02D2663b-1:350a-24: bya ba de ltar yin nam ma yin snyam pa'i
T02D2663b-1:350a-25: the tshom dang yid gnyis mi skye ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:350a-26: 'khor rnams la bag tshab med par 'jig rten pa
T02D2663b-1:350a-27: rnams la gsang sngags sprad pa'i tshul gyi chos rab
T02D2663b-1:350a-29: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02D2663b-1:350a-30: phan thogs byas pa gzo zhes bya //
T02D2663b-1:350a-32: de ltar sems can gyi don byas na sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-1:350a-33: rnams kyi bya ba byas pas byas pa dran zhing
T02D2663b-1:350a-34: sangs rgyas la lan ldon par bshad do zhes pa'o
T02D2663b-1:350a-35: // rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02D2663b-1:350a-36: khyod la rnam pa kun du srung ;
T02D2663b-1:350a-38: dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor grva bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhi bkod pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:350a-39: padma'i 'dab ma la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-1:350a-40: de rnams kyang las byas pa don yod do snyam
T02D2663b-1:350a-41: nas srung bar byed do zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:350b-0: de nas slob ma de @350b bslangs la //
T02D2663b-1:350b-1: sngags pa snying rjer gyur pa yi //
T02D2663b-1:350b-3: shin tu nges pa yid kyis ni //
T02D2663b-1:350b-4: de dag thams cad khas blang ngo //
T02D2663b-1:350b-5: zhes pa'i bar gyis slob ma la dam tshig bstan pa ste /
T02D2663b-1:350b-6: de yang sngon dam tshig mnos pa dang ma mnos pa gnyis ka la bstan no //
T02D2663b-1:350b-7: de la slob dpon dam tshig bzhi dang lnga dag tu ldan la /
T02D2663b-1:350b-8: las dang bya ba dag sbyar ba rgyud la sogs
T02D2663b-1:350b-9: pa dang dam tshig shes shing mnos zin pa la
T02D2663b-1:350b-11: 'jig rten na rgyal por nams kyang rgyal chos su
T02D2663b-1:350b-12: bya ba rnams snga nas kyang shes shing srung mod
T02D2663b-1:350b-13: kyi ; nam rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i tshe na /
T02D2663b-1:350b-14: yang slob dpon la sogs pas bstan zhing gsol bar byed do //
T02D2663b-1:350b-15: de bzhin du 'dir yang snga nas kyang dam tshig 'di rnams srung mod kyi /
T02D2663b-1:350b-16: chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i chos kyis bstan par bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:350b-17: gnyis su na yang dang yang du bstan na brtan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-1:350b-18: de nas slob ma de bslangs la //
T02D2663b-1:350b-19: sngags pa snying rjer gyur pa yi //
T02D2663b-1:350b-20: yid kyis nang du bcug nas ni //
T02D2663b-1:350b-21: de la dam tshig bstan par bya //
T02D2663b-1:350b-23: me long dang 'khor lo la sogs pa bstan pa'i
T02D2663b-1:350b-24: gnas de nas slob ma de bslang ste slob dpon
T02D2663b-1:350b-25: gyis slob ma'i gdugs bzung nas dkyil 'khor dang po'i
T02D2663b-1:350b-26: sgo khyud kyi nang du khyud kyi nang der bzhag
T02D2663b-1:350b-27: nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i dam tshig rnams bstan par
T02D2663b-1:350b-28: bya zhes pa'o // de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis ;
T02D2663b-1:350b-29: / dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems //
T02D2663b-1:350b-30: srog gi phyir yang da phyin chad //
T02D2663b-1:350b-31: yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:350b-33: dam pa'i chos btang ba yang rnam pa gsum gyis 'gyur te /
T02D2663b-1:350b-34: theg pa chen po las log par lta ba dang /
T02D2663b-1:350b-35: chos smra ba la mngon du dbang za zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:350b-36: nyin re zhing dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /
T02D2663b-1:351a-0: mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las gang yang rung ba zhig ma byas na @351a * //
T02D2663b-1:351a-1: dam pa'i chos gtad pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2663b-1:351a-2: de rnams khyod kyis srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-1:351a-3: de nas gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems gtang bar mi bya'o zhes sbyar te /
T02D2663b-1:351a-4: byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi las sems can
T02D2663b-1:351a-5: rnams la phan pa'i phyir bdag sangs rgyas su gyur
T02D2663b-1:351a-6: cig ces pa'i smon lam gyi sems dang chos thams
T02D2663b-1:351a-7: cad stong pa nyid du rtag tu bsgom par bya'o
T02D2663b-1:351a-8: zhes pa'i 'jug pa'i sems mi gtong ba la bya'o
T02D2663b-1:351a-9: // khyod kyis ser sna mi bya'o zhes sbyar te
T02D2663b-1:351a-10: chos dang nor bdag la bdog cing gzhan la byin
T02D2663b-1:351a-11: par rigs pa las mi sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:351a-12: gang sems can la gnod pa mi bya'o zhes te /
T02D2663b-1:351a-15: yid gsum gyi sgo nas sems can rnams la 'phral
T02D2663b-1:351a-16: gyi gnod pa dang yun gyi gnod pa mi bya
T02D2663b-1:351a-17: zhes pa'o // slob mas bla ma'i rkang pa la //
T02D2663b-1:351a-18: dad cing gus par phyag byas nas //
T02D2663b-1:351a-19: shin tu nges pa'i yid kyi ni //
T02D2663b-1:351a-20: de dag thams cad khas blang ngo //
T02D2663b-1:351a-22: gong du slob dpon gyis dam tshig bsgo ba de rnams lus dang /
T02D2663b-1:351a-24: yid gsum gyi sgo nas sgyu med par khas blang ngo zhes pa ste lus kyis /
T02D2663b-1:351a-25: slob mas bla ma'i rkang pa la //

T02D2663b-1:351a-29: de dag thams cad khas blang ngo //
T02D2663b-1:351a-30: zhes pa ste bkal stsal pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smra bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-1:351a-32: shin tu nges pa'i yid kyis ni //
T02D2663b-1:351a-33: zhes pa ste slob dpon gyi ngo tsam khas blang ba ma yin gyi /
